column2:

Engineered catalysing agents, used by refineries to improve the efficiency of a large number of chemical reactions.

Engineered catalysing agents, used by refineries to improve the efficiency of a large number of chemical reactions.

Agentes utilizados por refinerías para mejorar la eficacia de un gran número de reacciones químicas.

ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Перерабатывающая

Промышленные катализаторы. Используются на перерабатывающих заводах для ускорения широкого спектра химических реакций.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：精炼

经过工程改造的催化媒介，被用于在精炼中增加多种化学反应的效率。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: All but High Tech

These medicines are specially tailored to counteract the most virulent of diseases, whilst causing the minimum of damage to the host.

Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: All but High Tech

These medicines are specially tailored to counteract the most virulent of diseases, whilst causing the minimum of damage to the host.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología
Consumido por: Todos, excepto Alta Tecnología

Estas medicinas están especialmente diseñadas para contrarrestar las enfermedades más virulentas y ocasionar los menores percances al individuo.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: All but High Tech

These medicines are specially tailored to counteract the most virulent of diseases, whilst causing the minimum of damage to the host.
pt:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: All but High Tech

These medicines are specially tailored to counteract the most virulent of diseases, whilst causing the minimum of damage to the host.

Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Все, кроме Высоко-технологичная

Эти лекарства специально разработаны для противодействия опаснейшим болезням с минимальным ущербом для заболевшего.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：高科技之外所有

这些药物为治愈那些最为致命的疾病而特化，同时又只对病人造成最少的伤害。

column2: These new processor prototypes have already demonstrated their versatility and capability. The combination of organic and nano-fabrication makes them difficult to manufacture.
de: These new processor prototypes have already demonstrated their versatility and capability. The combination of organic and nano-fabrication makes them difficult to manufacture.
es: Estos nuevos prototipos de procesadores ya han demostrado su versatilidad y capacidad. La combinación de orgánica y nanofabricación hace que sean muy difíciles de fabricar.
fr: These new processor prototypes have already demonstrated their versatility and capability. The combination of organic and nano-fabrication makes them difficult to manufacture.
pt: These new processor prototypes have already demonstrated their versatility and capability. The combination of organic and nano-fabrication makes them difficult to manufacture.
ru: Эти новые экспериментальные процессоры уже доказали свою универсальность и производительность. Из-за сочетания нано- и органических технологий их крайне сложно производить.
zh: 这些新型的处理器原型已经显示出了它们的多功能性与能力。有机物和纳米织物的组合让它们难以被制造。

column2: A native plant that bears fruit resembling an apple with a silver lustre. Originally inedible, but through genetic modification the neurotoxins have been stripped away leaving what is now seen as a delicacy.
de: A native plant that bears fruit resembling an apple with a silver lustre. Originally inedible, but through genetic modification the neurotoxins have been stripped away leaving what is now seen as a delicacy.
es: Una planta nativa de Aerial que produce un fruto parecido a una manzana de color plata. Originalmente no eran comestibles, pero gracias a la modificación genética se ha conseguido eliminar sus neurotóxicas, convirtiéndolas en un preciado manjar.
fr: A native plant that bears fruit resembling an apple with a silver lustre. Originally inedible, but through genetic modification the neurotoxins have been stripped away leaving what is now seen as a delicacy.
pt: A native plant that bears fruit resembling an apple with a silver lustre. Originally inedible, but through genetic modification the neurotoxins have been stripped away leaving what is now seen as a delicacy.
ru: Местное растение, плоды которого напоминают отливающие серебром яблоки. Изначально фрукты были несъедобными, но путём генетической модификации удалось избавиться от опасных для жизни нейротоксинов. В наше время эти яблоки считаются деликатесом.
zh: 一种当地植物，生长着拥有银色光泽，类似苹果的果实。它原本不能食用，但经过基因改造，神经毒素已被清除干净，只剩下现在被视为珍馐的美食。

column2: A neurological stimulant only available in Aganippe. Often used to temporarily increase the user’s memory retention and awareness, it is a favourite amongst students and scholars. Recent reports have revealed that excessive use and abuse of the compound has been linked with psychotic episodes and hallucinations.
de: A neurological stimulant only available in Aganippe. Often used to temporarily increase the user’s memory retention and awareness, it is a favourite amongst students and scholars. Recent reports have revealed that excessive use and abuse of the compound has been linked with psychotic episodes and hallucinations.
es: Es un estimulante neurológico que sólo está disponible en Aganippe. Es utilizado a menudo para aumentar la retención de la memoria y la conciencia, haciendo que sea el favorito entre los estudiantes y académicos. Estudios recientes han revelado que el uso continuado y el abuso excesivo del compuesto producen episodios psicóticos y alucinaciones.
fr: A neurological stimulant only available in Aganippe. Often used to temporarily increase the user’s memory retention and awareness, it is a favourite amongst students and scholars. Recent reports have revealed that excessive use and abuse of the compound has been linked with psychotic episodes and hallucinations.
pt: A neurological stimulant only available in Aganippe. Often used to temporarily increase the user’s memory retention and awareness, it is a favourite amongst students and scholars. Recent reports have revealed that excessive use and abuse of the compound has been linked with psychotic episodes and hallucinations.
ru: Стимулятор нервной системы, который можно приобрести только на Аганиппе. Часто используется, чтобы временно увеличить запоминающую способность и внимательность — настоящий хит среди студентов и школяров. Недавние исследования показали, что длительное использование или чрезмерные дозы препарата могут стать причиной психических расстройств и галлюцинаций.
zh: 一种仅在Aganippe产出的神经刺激剂。常用于暂时增加使用者的记忆保持力和敏感度，是学生和学者的最爱。近期的报告发现过量使用和滥用这种化合物和精神病发作与幻觉有关。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

A range of engineered substances created to prevent or treat common diseases and ailments among livestock and fisheries. These are produced on High Tech worlds and consumed on Agricultural worlds.
de:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

A range of engineered substances created to prevent or treat common diseases and ailments among livestock and fisheries. These are produced on High Tech worlds and consumed on Agricultural worlds.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología
Consumido por: Agrícola

Una gama de sustancias elaboradas para prevenir o tratar enfermedades y dolencias comunes en ganadería y pesca. Se producen en mundos de alta tecnología y se consumen en mundos agrícolas.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

A range of engineered substances created to prevent or treat common diseases and ailments among livestock and fisheries. These are produced on High Tech worlds and consumed on Agricultural worlds.
pt:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

A range of engineered substances created to prevent or treat common diseases and ailments among livestock and fisheries. These are produced on High Tech worlds and consumed on Agricultural worlds.
ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Сельско-хозяйственная

Ряд искусственных веществ, применяемых для профилактики и лечения распространённых заболеваний скота и рыб. Производятся в высокотехнологичных и применяются в сельскохозяйственных мирах.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：农业

一系列工程改造过的物质，用于防止或治疗牲口与鱼群的普通疾病和虚弱。它们在高科技星系被生产，并在农业星系被使用。

column2: This material has been specifically engineered to revive plants affected by contaminants.
de: Dieses Material wurde speziell für die Behandlung kontaminierter Pflanzen entwickelt.
es: Este material se ha elaborado específicamente para recuperar plantas afectadas por productos contaminantes.
fr: This material has been specifically engineered to revive plants affected by contaminants.
pt: This material has been specifically engineered to revive plants affected by contaminants.
ru: Состав, специально разработанный для восстановления растений, пострадавших от вредоносных агентов.
zh: 这种材料被特殊改造以恢复被污染影响的植物。

column2: A collection of highly illegal AI remnants. These items are of extreme interest to various shady organisations and remote cults. Their almost mythical status has led to a huge amount of counterfeiting, further inflating the value of items with a clear and proven history. It is uncertain whether any of these pieces actually retain the AI personality that was originally present within.
de: A collection of highly illegal AI remnants. These items are of extreme interest to various shady organisations and remote cults. Their almost mythical status has led to a huge amount of counterfeiting, further inflating the value of items with a clear and proven history. It is uncertain whether any of these pieces actually retain the AI personality that was originally present within.
es: Una colección de restos de inteligencia artificial extremadamente ilegales. Estos objetos tienen mucho interés para varias organizaciones de origen dudoso y cultos remotos. Su estatus casi mítico ha llevado a una increíble cantidad de falsificaciones, contribuyendo a aumentar aún más su valor con una historia clara y probada. No está claro si estas piezas han retenido la personalidad de la IA que estuvo originalmente presente dentro de ella.
fr: A collection of highly illegal AI remnants. These items are of extreme interest to various shady organisations and remote cults. Their almost mythical status has led to a huge amount of counterfeiting, further inflating the value of items with a clear and proven history. It is uncertain whether any of these pieces actually retain the AI personality that was originally present within.
pt: A collection of highly illegal AI remnants. These items are of extreme interest to various shady organisations and remote cults. Their almost mythical status has led to a huge amount of counterfeiting, further inflating the value of items with a clear and proven history. It is uncertain whether any of these pieces actually retain the AI personality that was originally present within.
ru: Набор контрабандных фрагментов ИИ. Данные предметы представляют огромный интерес для всевозможных подозрительных организаций и тёмных культов. Их почти мифический статус привёл к появлению очень большого количества подделок, что ещё сильнее взвинтило цены на экземпляры с чистым, отслеживаемым прошлым. Доподлинно неизвестно, сохранился ли хотя бы в одном из этих предметов психологический профиль ИИ, некогда находившегося внутри.
zh: 一系列高度非法的AI残余物，各种阴影组织和偏僻的邪教组织都对它有极大的兴趣。它们神话般的地位导致了大量赝品，进一步提高了具有明确和经过证明的历史的这类物品的价值。其中是否有任何一个碎片真的保留了其中原本的AI人格尚不清楚。

column2: Used by Aisling’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system. They are of no value to anyone but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
de: Used by Aisling’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system. They are of no value to anyone but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
es: Used by Aisling’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system. They are of no value to anyone but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

pt: Used by Aisling’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system. They are of no value to anyone but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
ru: Сторонники Айслинг доставляют их в нужные системы для их подготовки. Никому другому они не нужны. Этот предмет устареет в конце недели Политики.
zh: 用于给Aisling的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来准备星系供占据。这对于她的追随者以外的人没有任何价值。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Used by Aisling’s supporters to gain control by delivering to systems undergoing expansion., If you are with another Imperial power you can oppose Aisling by delivering this cargo to one of your control systems., Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

ru: Сторонники Айслинг доставляют их в нужные системы для их подготовки. Если вы поддерживаете другую державу Империи, то можете доставить этот груз в одну из контролируемых ей систем, чтобы ослабить позиции Айслинг. Никому другому они не нужны. Этот предмет устареет в конце недели Политики.
zh: 用于给Aisling的支持者通过将其运输至正在扩张至的星系来取得其控制。如果你支持另一个帝国人物，你可以通过将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Aisling，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

ru: Сторонники Айслинг доставляют их в нужные контролируемые ими системы для их укрепления. Если вы поддерживаете другую державу Империи, то можете доставить этот груз в одну из контролируемых ей систем, чтобы ослабить позиции Айслинг. Никому другому они не нужны. Этот предмет устареет в конце недели Политики.
zh: 用于给Aisling的支持者通过将其运输至已占据的目标星系来加强控制。如果你支持另一个帝国人物，你可以通过将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Aisling，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Micro-thin sheets that are absorbed into the skin. A mixture of bioengineering and micro-electronics allow the user to programme art on their skin that reacts to their surroundings and mood. The Body Décor company of Alacarakmo has specialised in this for hundreds of years.
de: Micro-thin sheets that are absorbed into the skin. A mixture of bioengineering and micro-electronics allow the user to programme art on their skin that reacts to their surroundings and mood. The Body Décor company of Alacarakmo has specialised in this for hundreds of years.
es: Laminas microdelgadas que son absorbidas por la piel. Una mezcla de bioingeniería y microelectrónica que permite al usuario programar el dibujo en su piel, el cual reacciona al entorno y a su estado de ánimo. La compañía Body Décor de Alacarakmo se ha especializado en esto durante cientos de años.
fr: Micro-thin sheets that are absorbed into the skin. A mixture of bioengineering and micro-electronics allow the user to programme art on their skin that reacts to their surroundings and mood. The Body Décor company of Alacarakmo has specialised in this for hundreds of years.
pt: Micro-thin sheets that are absorbed into the skin. A mixture of bioengineering and micro-electronics allow the user to programme art on their skin that reacts to their surroundings and mood. The Body Décor company of Alacarakmo has specialised in this for hundreds of years.
ru: Тончайшие листки, поглощаемые кожей. Смесь биотехнологий и микроэлементов, которая позволяет носителю менять изображения на его коже в зависимости от окружения и настроения. Компания Body Décor с Алакаракмо производит подобные продукты уже не одну сотню лет.
zh: 可被吸收入皮肤的，极薄的板材。一种生物工程与微电子的混合使用户能在他们的皮肤上编辑艺术品来对他们的周围和心情做出反应。Alacarakmo的The Body Décor公司数百年来专精于此。

column2: Specially adapted to the cold climate, these enormous animals, originally created from modified genetic material from ancient Earth, are now flourishing on Quechua. The albino form has been encouraged to dominance due to the tenderness of its flesh.
de: Specially adapted to the cold climate, these enormous animals, originally created from modified genetic material from ancient Earth, are now flourishing on Quechua. The albino form has been encouraged to dominance due to the tenderness of its flesh.
es: Estos gigantescos animales, especialmente adaptados a climas fríos y creados a partir de material genético modificado de la vieja Tierra, ahora prosperan en Quechua. Se ha hecho predominar sobre todo a la subespecie albina, debido a la suavidad y ternura de su carne.
fr: Specially adapted to the cold climate, these enormous animals, originally created from modified genetic material from ancient Earth, are now flourishing on Quechua. The albino form has been encouraged to dominance due to the tenderness of its flesh.
pt: Specially adapted to the cold climate, these enormous animals, originally created from modified genetic material from ancient Earth, are now flourishing on Quechua. The albino form has been encouraged to dominance due to the tenderness of its flesh.
ru: Созданные с использованием изменённого генетического материала с Земли, эти огромные животные отлично приспособились к суровому климату на Quechua. Было решено помочь белой породе занять верхушку своей пищевой цепи, так как мясо её представителей оказалось очень мягким.
zh: 这些巨大的动物原本通过古代地球上修改过的基因材料而创造，专门适应寒冷气候，现在于Quechua茁壮生长。由于其肉质柔软，白化的种类受到鼓励占据族群的主体地位。

column2: Alexandrite is a form of chrysoberyl characterised by the fact that it exhibits different colours when viewed from different angles and under different light conditions.
de:
Produktion: nur Abbau
Nachfrage: Tourismus und Raffinerie

Alexandrit ist eine Art Chrysoberyll, also ein Material, das bei unterschiedlichen Betrachtungswinkeln und Lichtbedingungen verschiedene Färbungen zeigt.
es: La alejandrita es un tipo de crisoberilo que se caracteriza por mostrar distintos colores cuando se observa a través de ángulos distintos y en condiciones de luz distintas.
fr: Alexandrite is a form of chrysoberyl characterised by the fact that it exhibits different colours when viewed from different angles and under different light conditions.
pt: Alexandrite is a form of chrysoberyl characterised by the fact that it exhibits different colours when viewed from different angles and under different light conditions.
ru: Александрит — это хризоберил, который меняет цвет в зависимости от освещения и угла обзора.
zh: Alexandrite是一种金绿宝石，特征是在不同观察角度和不同关照条件下会放出不同的颜色。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial and Military

Algae are a range of biological organisms grown in water. Considered edible and often locally produced to sustain life in many poorer outposts. Usually commercially processed to provide more appetising foodstuffs as a constituent of food cartridges for ’chefs’ (cheap 3D food printers).
de:
Produktion: Landwirtschaft
Nachfrage: Industrie und Militär

Als Algen werden eine ganze Reihe im Wasser lebender Bioorganismen bezeichnet. Die oftmals als essbar eingeschätzten Algen werden auf unwirtlichen Außenposten selbst hergestellt und zur Ernährung verwendet. In aller Regel werden sie mechanisch verarbeitet und den "Küchenchefs" (billigen 3D-Nahrungsdruckern) als Teil der Nahrungskartuschen zugeführt.
es:
Producido por: Agrícola
Consumido por: Industrial y Militar

Las algas son un grupo de organismos biológicos que crecen en el agua. Consideradas comestibles y a menudo producidas localmente para sustentar la vida en muchos de los destacamentos más pobres. Usualmente son procesadas comercialmente para proporcionar alimentos más apetitosos, como cartuchos económicos para impresoras 3D de alimentos utilizadas por ’chefs’.
fr:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial and Military

Algae are a range of biological organisms grown in water. Considered edible and often locally produced to sustain life in many poorer outposts. Usually commercially processed to provide more appetising foodstuffs as a constituent of food cartridges for ’chefs’ (cheap 3D food printers).
pt:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial and Military

Algae are a range of biological organisms grown in water. Considered edible and often locally produced to sustain life in many poorer outposts. Usually commercially processed to provide more appetising foodstuffs as a constituent of food cartridges for ’chefs’ (cheap 3D food printers).
ru:
Производится: Сельско-хозяйственная
Потребляется: Промышленная и Военная

Понятие «водоросли» объединяет в себе множество растущих в воде биологических организмов. Часто съедобны и производятся местным населением для поддержания жизни на бедных станциях. Часто перерабатываются в более аппетитную пищевую массу, которую позже используют при создании пищевых брикетов для «поваров» (дешёвых пищевых 3D-принтеров).
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：工业与军事

水藻是一类生长于水中的有机生物。它被认为是可食用的，并常在较为贫困的前哨站被生产来维持当地的生命。经常被商业化处理来作为“厨师” (廉价的3D食物打印机) 制作食物盒的一种原料以提供更令人有食欲的食物。

column2: Advertised as genuine fossilised xeno ovum, scientists were quickly able to show that the eggs traded are actually the product of a team of highly talented prop designers. For some collectors, owning one of these eggs is their top priority, with all other priorities rescinded.
de: Advertised as genuine fossilised xeno ovum, scientists were quickly able to show that the eggs traded are actually the product of a team of highly talented prop designers. For some collectors, owning one of these eggs is their top priority, with all other priorities rescinded.
es: Aunque son anunciados como auténticos óvulos de xeno fosilizados, los científicos demostraron rápidamente que realmente eran obra de un equipo de diseñadores de gran talento. Para algunos coleccionistas poseer uno de estos huevos es una de sus máximas prioridades.
fr: Advertised as genuine fossilised xeno ovum, scientists were quickly able to show that the eggs traded are actually the product of a team of highly talented prop designers. For some collectors, owning one of these eggs is their top priority, with all other priorities rescinded.
pt: Advertised as genuine fossilised xeno ovum, scientists were quickly able to show that the eggs traded are actually the product of a team of highly talented prop designers. For some collectors, owning one of these eggs is their top priority, with all other priorities rescinded.
ru: Учёные быстро смогли доказать, что то, что раньше считалось окаменевшими инопланетными яйцами, на самом деле плод работы команды талантливых реквизиторов. Некоторые коллекционеры ставят себе главной целью обзаведение одним из таких яиц.
zh: 这些蛋被广告称为一种真正的，化石化的外星卵，然而科学家们很快证明它们实际上是一群天赋异禀的道具设计师的产品。对于一些收藏家而言，得到一个这种蛋是他们的头等大事，其他一切都得向后稍稍。

zh: 用于给Mahon的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来准备星系，这对于他的追随者以外的人几乎没有任何价值。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: A small colony of brightly coloured micro-organisms form a mesmerising, ever changing decorative fashion statement. Capable of self sustaining, the colony will feed on dirt and skin flakes, keeping the wearer clean and healthy. When mature, the micro-organisms lose their bright colours and excrete a heady natural perfume.
de: A small colony of brightly coloured micro-organisms form a mesmerising, ever changing decorative fashion statement. Capable of self sustaining, the colony will feed on dirt and skin flakes, keeping the wearer clean and healthy. When mature, the micro-organisms lose their bright colours and excrete a heady natural perfume.
es: Una pequeña colonia de microorganismos de colores vivos que forma una fascinante, y siempre cambiante, exposición de moda decorativa. Capaz de autosostenerse, la colonia se alimenta de suciedad y escamas de la piel, manteniendo al portador limpio y saludable. Cuando maduran, los microorganismos pierden su brillantes colores y excretan un fuerte y agradable aroma natural.
fr: A small colony of brightly coloured micro-organisms form a mesmerising, ever changing decorative fashion statement. Capable of self sustaining, the colony will feed on dirt and skin flakes, keeping the wearer clean and healthy. When mature, the micro-organisms lose their bright colours and excrete a heady natural perfume.
pt: A small colony of brightly coloured micro-organisms form a mesmerising, ever changing decorative fashion statement. Capable of self sustaining, the colony will feed on dirt and skin flakes, keeping the wearer clean and healthy. When mature, the micro-organisms lose their bright colours and excrete a heady natural perfume.
ru: Небольшая колония ярко окрашенных микроорганизмов образует шикарное модное украшение, завораживающее своим видом и постоянно меняющее цвет. Колония поддерживает сама себя, она питается грязью и чешуйками кожи, сохраняя её носителю чистоту и здоровье. Достигнув зрелости, микроорганизмы теряют свою яркую окраску и выделяют крепкий натуральный парфюм.
zh: 一小群色彩鲜明的微生物组成了一种迷人的，不断变化的装饰性时尚宣言。该群落能自给自足，通过脏污和皮屑便足以生存，并能够保持穿戴者干净而健康。当成熟时。这些微生物会失去明亮的颜色而释放出一种强烈的自然香气。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: Industrial and Military

Aluminium, Al, atomic number 13. Melting point 933K. A silvery-white ductile metal that is regularly used by many industries in alloys for its lightness and strength.

zh:
产出于：精炼
消耗于：工业与军事

铝，Al，原子序数13，熔点933开尔文。一种银白色的，具有延展性的金属，由于其轻质量和高强度常以合金形态用于各种产业。

column2: Guaranteed to give a cleaner you. The deep cleansing action works both inside and out, with this fully digestible soap! Rumoured to be made from human fat.
de: Guaranteed to give a cleaner you. The deep cleansing action works both inside and out, with this fully digestible soap! Rumoured to be made from human fat.
es: Limpieza garantizada. La profunda acción de limpieza de este jabón comestible actúa tanto por dentro como por fuera. Se rumorea que está fabricado a partir de grasa humana.
fr: Guaranteed to give a cleaner you. The deep cleansing action works both inside and out, with this fully digestible soap! Rumoured to be made from human fat.
pt: Guaranteed to give a cleaner you. The deep cleansing action works both inside and out, with this fully digestible soap! Rumoured to be made from human fat.
ru: Гарантированно делает вас чище. Это полностью перевариваемое мыло чистит вас не только снаружи, но и внутри! Ходят слухи, что оно изготовлено из человеческого жира.
zh: 保证能让你变干净。这块可消化的肥皂会在你的身体内外都进行深度清洁！谣言称用人类脂肪制造。

column2: An ancient stone casket. Its purpose is not clear and it is sealed shut.
de: An ancient stone casket. Its purpose is not clear and it is sealed shut.
es: Un cofre de piedra creado hace varios millones de años por los Guardianes, una civilización no humana extinta.
fr: An ancient stone casket. Its purpose is not clear and it is sealed shut.
pt: An ancient stone casket. Its purpose is not clear and it is sealed shut.
ru: Древний каменный контейнер непонятного назначения, плотно закрытый.
zh: 一个远古石盒。它的用途尚不明确，并且密封紧闭。

column2: A crystal found by scanning the data core of a Guardian beacon. It appears to contain a similar ethereal type of energy as the ancient relics found at the ruin sites of the Guardian civilisation. Like the relic this item is used in guardian technologies, unlocking new data and functions. Hence it has been given the designation of Key.
de: A crystal found by scanning the data core of a Guardian beacon. It appears to contain a similar ethereal type of energy as the ancient relics found at the ruin sites of the Guardian civilisation. Like the relic this item is used in guardian technologies, unlocking new data and functions. Hence it has been given the designation of Key.
es: Un artefacto cristalino recuperado de una baliza guardián.
fr: A crystal found by scanning the data core of a Guardian beacon. It appears to contain a similar ethereal type of energy as the ancient relics found at the ruin sites of the Guardian civilisation. Like the relic this item is used in guardian technologies, unlocking new data and functions. Hence it has been given the designation of Key.

Like the relic this item is used in guardian technologies, unlocking new data and functions. Hence it has been given the designation of Key.
ru: Объект (кристалл), найденный при сканировании ядра данных Маяка Стражей. Похоже, что в нем содержится тот же эфирный тип энергии, что и в древних реликвиях, найденных на развалинах цивилизации Стражей. Как и Реликвия, эта вещь используется в технологиях Стражей, открывая новые данные и функции при использовании. Отсюда и обозначение вошедшее в обиход — «Древний Ключ».
zh: 一块通过扫描一个守护者信标的数据核心而找到的水晶。看起来它存储着一种和守护者文明废墟中远古遗物 (Ancient relic) 类似的，虚无缥缈的能量。和远古遗物一样，这被用于某些守护者科技，解锁全新的数据和功能，因此而被给予了钥匙 (Key) 的名称。

column2: This orb appears to be a mechanical device, although no one has so far deduced its purpose.
de: This orb appears to be a mechanical device, although no one has so far deduced its purpose.
es: Un dispositivo mecánico creado hace varios millones de años por los Guardianes, una civilización no humana extinta.
fr: This orb appears to be a mechanical device, although no one has so far deduced its purpose.
pt: This orb appears to be a mechanical device, although no one has so far deduced its purpose.
ru: Этот шар — некий механизм, назначение которого пока что никому не удалось понять.
zh: 这个球体似乎是某种机械装置，但到目前为止还没有人解读出其用途。

column2: A mysterious crystal found inside an ancient obelisk. It appears to pulse with an ethereal type of energy. It is beautiful to behold, but beyond that - what secrets does it contain?
de: A mysterious crystal found inside an ancient obelisk. It appears to pulse with an ethereal type of energy. It is beautiful to behold, but beyond that - what secrets does it contain?

ru: Таинственный кристалл, найденный в древнем обелиске и испускающий неведомую энергию. Он очень красив, однако неизвестно, какие секреты он в себе таит.
zh: 从一个远古方尖碑中找到的一块神秘水晶。它貌似在随着一种虚无缥缈的能量脉动着。它看起来相当美丽，但除此之外——其中包含着什么秘密？

zh: 一种和任何当前分类标准都不匹配的守护者工艺品。

zh: 一块经过雕刻的石板，远古文字刻制其上。尽管看起来像是装饰性物件，它可能曾有过其他的用途。

zh: 一尊描绘着某种外星人物的雕塑。

column2: For earth shattering displays that will blow your mind. Perfect for atmospheric use, or deployment from orbit! Official suppliers to the Imperial Family
de: For earth shattering displays that will blow your mind. Perfect for atmospheric use, or deployment from orbit! Official suppliers to the Imperial Family
es: Rompiendo las barreras de la mente, perfectos para uso atmosférico o despliegues desde la órbita. Proveedores oficiales de la Familia Imperial.

pt: For earth shattering displays that will blow your mind. Perfect for atmospheric use, or deployment from orbit! Official suppliers to the Imperial Family
ru: Эти фейерверки способны вызвать настоящее потрясение. Их можно как подрывать в атмосфере, так и сбрасывать с орбиты — эффект в любом случае будет потрясающим! Официальный поставщик императорской семьи.
zh: 用于惊天动地，超乎想象的表演。大气层内使用或从轨道部署都很完美！帝国家庭的官方供应商。

column2: A variant of the synthetic psychoactive drug based on a closely guarded secret recipe. While active, it causes the user to lock their teeth together and rapidly exhale, a reaction that led to its street name, Fesh. This variant was created from a stolen recipe for Wolf 1301 Fesh and is the closest Fesh variant in terms of quality to the original. Banned in most jurisdictions.
de: A variant of the synthetic psychoactive drug based on a closely guarded secret recipe. While active, it causes the user to lock their teeth together and rapidly exhale, a reaction that led to its street name, Fesh. This variant was created from a stolen recipe for Wolf 1301 Fesh and is the closest Fesh variant in terms of quality to the original. Banned in most jurisdictions.
es: Una variante de la droga sintética psicoactiva cuya receta secreta es guardada celosamente. Produce una fuerte contracción mandibular y rápidas exhalaciones, lo que le ha hecho ganarse su sobrenombre por parecer que se ’jadea como un lobo’. Esta variante se ha creado a partir de una receta robada de Wolf 1301 y es la variante más cercana en términos de calidad al original. Está prohibida en la mayoría de las jurisdicciones.
fr: A variant of the synthetic psychoactive drug based on a closely guarded secret recipe. While active, it causes the user to lock their teeth together and rapidly exhale, a reaction that led to its street name, Fesh. This variant was created from a stolen recipe for Wolf 1301 Fesh and is the closest Fesh variant in terms of quality to the original. Banned in most jurisdictions.
pt: A variant of the synthetic psychoactive drug based on a closely guarded secret recipe. While active, it causes the user to lock their teeth together and rapidly exhale, a reaction that led to its street name, Fesh. This variant was created from a stolen recipe for Wolf 1301 Fesh and is the closest Fesh variant in terms of quality to the original. Banned in most jurisdictions.
ru: Вариант синтетического психотропного наркотика, создаваемого по засекреченной формуле. Во время его действия потребитель сжимает зубы и начинает быстро выдыхать, отчего продукт и прозвали «дурью». Этот вариант создан на основе украденного рецепта Волчьей дури 1301 и является её ближайшим аналогом, так как его качество весьма близко к оригиналу. Объявлен вне закона в большинстве юрисдикций.
zh: 基于一个严加看管的秘密配方的一种合成精神药物的变种。当使用时，它会导致使用者紧咬牙关的同时迅速呼气，这种行为导致它得到了一个民间别名，“费什”。该变种是根据一个盗取的Wolf 1301费什配方制作的，并在质量上来说是和原版最接近的变种了。在大多数法域被禁用。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural

Flesh - and other elements - harvested from a vast selection of once-living creatures. In many places a luxury item with some ceremonial importance. Illegal in some jurisdictions.

Tejido orgánico muscular, y otros elementos, provenientes de criaturas anteriormente vivas. En muchos lugares es un artículo de lujo con cierta importancia ceremonial, pero en algunas jurisdicciones es ilegal.

Мясо (и многие другие элементы), собранные с различных, некогда живых существ. Во многих местах считается деликатесом и носит некое церемониальное значение. В некоторых юрисдикциях объявлено вне закона.
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：农业之外所有

从许多类曾经活着的生物身上收获的肉以及其他成分。在许多地方这是一种奢侈品，并具有某种仪式功能。在某些法域是非法的。

一种生物电子传感器套件与分析软件，能轻松适应环境并监控各种各样有机物种的情况。

column2: This containment unit safely stores antimatter protecting it from gamma radiation and interaction with standard matter.
de: This containment unit safely stores antimatter protecting it from gamma radiation and interaction with standard matter.

pt: This containment unit safely stores antimatter protecting it from gamma radiation and interaction with standard matter.
ru: В этом контейнере в безопасности хранится антиматерия. В нём она защищена от гамма-излучения и взаимодействия с обычной материей.
zh: 这个控制单元安全地存储着反物质，保护着它免受伽马辐射并防止与常规物质发生反应。

column2: A treasure trove of exquisite antique jewellery. These often contain very rare, and very valuable, pieces.
de: A treasure trove of exquisite antique jewellery. These often contain very rare, and very valuable, pieces.
es: Un tesoro oculto de exquisita joyería antigua. A menudo contienen piezas muy raras y valiosas.
fr: A treasure trove of exquisite antique jewellery. These often contain very rare, and very valuable, pieces.
pt: A treasure trove of exquisite antique jewellery. These often contain very rare, and very valuable, pieces.
ru: Клад, состоящий из древних ювелирных украшений, в том числе в высшей степени редких, которые исключительно высоко ценятся.
zh: 一个包含精美古董珠宝的宝库。它们常常包含非常稀有而非常珍贵的物品。

column2: A collection of priceless artefacts. Such objects are often invested with great cultural and historical value. Removal of antiquities from their original sites is generally considered a crime. The legal extraction of antiquities can only occur when the relevant permit has been granted by the local authorities.
de: A collection of priceless artefacts. Such objects are often invested with great cultural and historical value. Removal of antiquities from their original sites is generally considered a crime. The legal extraction of antiquities can only occur when the relevant permit has been granted by the local authorities.
es: Una colección de artefactos con un gran valor cultural e histórico. La extracción de antigüedades de su lugar de origen se considera generalmente un delito y sólo puede realizarse con el permiso correspondiente de las autoridades locales.
fr: A collection of priceless artefacts. Such objects are often invested with great cultural and historical value. Removal of antiquities from their original sites is generally considered a crime. The legal extraction of antiquities can only occur when the relevant permit has been granted by the local authorities.
pt: A collection of priceless artefacts. Such objects are often invested with great cultural and historical value. Removal of antiquities from their original sites is generally considered a crime. The legal extraction of antiquities can only occur when the relevant permit has been granted by the local authorities.
ru: Подборка бесценных артефактов. Подобные объекты, как правило, обладают огромной культурной и исторической ценностью. Изъятие реликвий с места их обнаружения практически всегда расценивается как преступление. Их законный вывоз возможен только при получении соответствующего разрешения у местных властей.
zh: 一系列价值连城的工艺品。这些物品通常被赋予很高的文化和历史价值，把它们从原址移走通常被视为是犯罪行为。只有在当局给予了相关许可后，合法的提取才能进行。

column2: Once sneered at as a cheap substitute, this product has gained cult status from its overly thick texture and bitter flavour from the roots and herbs that it is made of. It is an acquired taste that now appeals to the bohemian set.
de: Once sneered at as a cheap substitute, this product has gained cult status from its overly thick texture and bitter flavour from the roots and herbs that it is made of. It is an acquired taste that now appeals to the bohemian set.
es: Aunque antaño era despreciado por ser un sucedáneo barato, este producto ha adquirido un estatus de culto por su textura excesivamente espesa y su amargo sabor proveniente de las hierbas y raíces de las que está hecho. Es un valor añadido al que ahora apela el colectivo más bohemio.
fr: Once sneered at as a cheap substitute, this product has gained cult status from its overly thick texture and bitter flavour from the roots and herbs that it is made of. It is an acquired taste that now appeals to the bohemian set.
pt: Once sneered at as a cheap substitute, this product has gained cult status from its overly thick texture and bitter flavour from the roots and herbs that it is made of. It is an acquired taste that now appeals to the bohemian set.
ru: Ранее считавшийся дешёвым заменителем, этот кофе приобрёл культовый статус благодаря особо плотной текстуре и горьковатому привкусу, который дают коренья и травы. Этот продукт весьма популярен среди богемы, однако к нему сначала нужно привыкнуть.
zh: 该产品曾经作为廉价替代品而被蔑视，现在却因为其草药和根系原料制造出的极度浓稠的口感和苦涩的风味声名远扬。它现在是那些放荡不羁的人中很受欢迎的一种饮料。

column2: A unique alcoholic spirit distilled by the crew of The Golconda, an ancient generation ship.
de: A unique alcoholic spirit distilled by the crew of The Golconda, an ancient generation ship.
es: Una bebida alcohólica única destilada por la tripulación de The Golconda, una nave perteneciente a una generación anterior.
fr: A unique alcoholic spirit distilled by the crew of The Golconda, an ancient generation ship.
pt: A unique alcoholic spirit distilled by the crew of The Golconda, an ancient generation ship.
ru: Уникальный алкогольный напиток, созданный экипажем «The Golconda», корабля колонистов.
zh: 一种独特的烈酒，由古代世代飞船The Golconda的船员蒸馏制成。

Автоматизированные системы для мониторинга и поддерживания сбалансированных уровней питательных и химических веществ в условиях ограниченных морских экосистем путём направленной химической и микробной фильтрации. Также запасные детали и расходные элементы к системам.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：环境改造与农业

一种利用靶向化学品和微生物过滤来监控和维持一个受限的海洋生态系统的营养和化学平衡程度的自动化系统，以及相应的冗余与耗材。

column2: The monastic orders of Arouca live a secluded and peaceful life producing, among other things, a limited range of Conventual sweets. Each comes with a personalised blessing.
de: The monastic orders of Arouca live a secluded and peaceful life producing, among other things, a limited range of Conventual sweets. Each comes with a personalised blessing.
es: Las órdenes monásticas de Arouca viven una aislada y pacífica vida produciendo, entre otras muchas cosas, una pequeña variedad de dulces conventuales. Cada uno viene con una bendición personalizada.
fr: The monastic orders of Arouca live a secluded and peaceful life producing, among other things, a limited range of Conventual sweets. Each comes with a personalised blessing.
pt: The monastic orders of Arouca live a secluded and peaceful life producing, among other things, a limited range of Conventual sweets. Each comes with a personalised blessing.
ru: Монашеские ордены системы Arouca живут мирной и уединённой жизнью, производя, помимо прочего, и небольшой ассортимент монастырских сладостей. В комплект к каждой сладости полагается индивидуальное благословение.
zh: Arouca修道院的修士们过着与世隔绝而平静的生活，并生产少量的修道院糖果。每颗都有一句个性化的祝福。

ru: Шифрованные материалы и документы с секретными планами атак. Ввиду содержащейся в них информации их перевозка считается незаконной. На чёрном рынке они пользуются некоторым спросом.
zh: 用于秘密攻击计划的加密资源和文档。拥有这种文件是非法的，因为这牵涉着运送这些信息的人。黑市中对这些物品有有限的需求。

column2: Formula 42 achieves incredible results, transforming even the most arid of desert worlds into fertile utopias. Beyond its name, all aspects of this product are kept under the highest secrecy. However, people don’t ask questions when it delivers time and again.
de: Formula 42 achieves incredible results, transforming even the most arid of desert worlds into fertile utopias. Beyond its name, all aspects of this product are kept under the highest secrecy. However, people don’t ask questions when it delivers time and again.
es: Formula 42 logra unos increíbles resultados al transformar incluso los más áridos mundos desérticos en fértiles utopías. Salvo el nombre, todos los aspectos del producto están guardados bajo el más estricto secreto. En cualquier caso, a nadie le importa mientras la calidad sea la que es.
fr: Formula 42 achieves incredible results, transforming even the most arid of desert worlds into fertile utopias. Beyond its name, all aspects of this product are kept under the highest secrecy. However, people don’t ask questions when it delivers time and again.
pt: Formula 42 achieves incredible results, transforming even the most arid of desert worlds into fertile utopias. Beyond its name, all aspects of this product are kept under the highest secrecy. However, people don’t ask questions when it delivers time and again.
ru: Формула 42 позволяет достичь невероятных результатов, она способна превратить даже самые засушливые пустыни в плодородные утопии. О формуле известно совсем немного, но из-за её невероятных возможностей люди почти никогда не задают лишних вопросов.
zh: 42号配方产生了难以置信的结果，哪怕最干旱的沙漠世界也能被它变成肥沃的乌托邦。在它的名字之外，所有该产品各方面的信息都被作为最高机密看护着。不过，人们从来不在它反复送达的时候问问题。

column2: These tough, limpet like creatures were originally thought to be inedible. However, pioneering colonists discovered that a combination of high pressure and chemical treatment in an ammonia-based solution could render these iron rich creatures into a digestible and delicious food source. They are now considered a delicacy around their galaxy.
de: These tough, limpet like creatures were originally thought to be inedible. However, pioneering colonists discovered that a combination of high pressure and chemical treatment in an ammonia-based solution could render these iron rich creatures into a digestible and delicious food source. They are now considered a delicacy around their galaxy.
es: Originalmente se pensó que estas duras criaturas parecidas a las garrapatas eran incomibles. Sin embargo, algunos colonos y pioneros descubrieron que combinar una alta presión con un tratamiento químico a base de una solución rica en amoníaco, podría hacer de estas criaturas ricas en hierro en una fuente de alimento digerible y deliciosa. Ahora son consideradas un manjar por toda la galaxia.
fr: These tough, limpet like creatures were originally thought to be inedible. However, pioneering colonists discovered that a combination of high pressure and chemical treatment in an ammonia-based solution could render these iron rich creatures into a digestible and delicious food source. They are now considered a delicacy around their galaxy.
pt: These tough, limpet like creatures were originally thought to be inedible. However, pioneering colonists discovered that a combination of high pressure and chemical treatment in an ammonia-based solution could render these iron rich creatures into a digestible and delicious food source. They are now considered a delicacy around their galaxy.
ru: Раньше эти твёрдые блюдцеобразные существа считались несъедобными. Но первые колонизаторы обнаружили, что, обработав этих богатых железом созданий под большим давлением в насыщенном аммиаком растворе, их можно превратить в источник легко усваиваемой и вкусной пищи. Теперь в своей галактике гриблы считаются деликатесом.
zh: 这些坚硬，看着像无人机的生物原本被认为是不可食用的。然而，殖民者先驱们发现一种氨基溶液中高压和化学处理的组合能把这些富含铁元素的生物变成可消化而美味的食物来源。它们现在在银河各处都被视为美食。

column2: Vacuum Krill are astonishing creatures. One of the few species to live in the hard vacuum of space, they are native to the ice rings around Baltah’sine 4b. Their eggs grow in vast numbers in tiny water pockets within the rocks - kept liquid by secretions from the mother when the eggs are first laid. When mature, they eventually burrow their way out, propelling themselves between rocks with tiny excretions of fluid, in search of a mate.
de: Vacuum Krill are astonishing creatures. One of the few species to live in the hard vacuum of space, they are native to the ice rings around Baltah’sine 4b. Their eggs grow in vast numbers in tiny water pockets within the rocks - kept liquid by secretions from the mother when the eggs are first laid. When mature, they eventually burrow their way out, propelling themselves between rocks with tiny excretions of fluid, in search of a mate.
es: Los krill del vacío son unas criaturas impresionantes. Son nativos de los helados anillos del planeta 4 b del sistema Baltah’Sine y una de las pocas especies capaces de vivir en el hostil vacío del espacio. Ponen sus huevos entre las rocas y en gran cantidad dentro de pequeñísimas bolsas de agua (que se mantienen líquidas gracias a las secreciones de la madre durante la puesta). Con el tiempo, al alcanzar la madurez, salen de su escondite para buscar pareja, propulsándose entre las rocas mediante pequeñas secreciones de fluidos.
fr: Vacuum Krill are astonishing creatures. One of the few species to live in the hard vacuum of space, they are native to the ice rings around Baltah’sine 4b. Their eggs grow in vast numbers in tiny water pockets within the rocks - kept liquid by secretions from the mother when the eggs are first laid. When mature, they eventually burrow their way out, propelling themselves between rocks with tiny excretions of fluid, in search of a mate.
pt: Vacuum Krill are astonishing creatures. One of the few species to live in the hard vacuum of space, they are native to the ice rings around Baltah’sine 4b. Their eggs grow in vast numbers in tiny water pockets within the rocks - kept liquid by secretions from the mother when the eggs are first laid. When mature, they eventually burrow their way out, propelling themselves between rocks with tiny excretions of fluid, in search of a mate.
ru: Вакуумный криль — это воистину поразительное существо. Это один из немногих видов, который может жить в жёстком вакууме космоса. Криль обитает на ледяных кольцах Baltah’sine 4b, где откладывает множество яиц в небольших наполненных водой полостях камней. Яйца остаются мокрыми благодаря телесным жидкостям, которыми покрывает их мать во время кладки. Когда криль вырастает, он выбирается наружу с помощью выделяемых из его организма жидкостей и начинает искать партнёра.
zh: Vacuum Krill是惊人的生物。作为少数生活在太空的真空环境中的物种，它们是Baltah’sine 4b周围冰环的原住民。它们的蛋在岩石中微小的水池中大量生长——这水是靠它们母亲下单时产生的分泌物保持液态的。当长成时，它们会挖地道离开，用少量排出液体的方式推进自己在岩石群中游走，寻找伴侣。

column2: The native amphibian like creatures of Banki have particularly colourful and lustrous skins, with a number of useful properties when wet. Highly valued on oceanic worlds.
de: The native amphibian like creatures of Banki have particularly colourful and lustrous skins, with a number of useful properties when wet. Highly valued on oceanic worlds.
es: Las criaturas anfibias nativas de Banki, tienen unas pieles particularmente coloridas y brillantes, además de varias propiedades útiles cuando se humedecen. Son altamente valoradas en mundos oceánicos.
fr: The native amphibian like creatures of Banki have particularly colourful and lustrous skins, with a number of useful properties when wet. Highly valued on oceanic worlds.
pt: The native amphibian like creatures of Banki have particularly colourful and lustrous skins, with a number of useful properties when wet. Highly valued on oceanic worlds.
ru: Амфибиеобразные существа из системы Banki обладают особенно цветастой и яркой кожей, проявляющей при намокании ряд полезных свойств. Эта кожа высоко ценится на океанических планетах.
zh: Banki生物这样的本地类两栖动物有着色泽鲜明而光彩照人的皮肤，这在潮湿时有许多有用的特性。在海洋世界上价值颇高。

Легально только в Анархиях и Диктатурах. Синтетические вещества, употребление которых повышает настроение, но вызывает привыкание и приводит к долгосрочным нарушениям в организме. В связи с этим они почти повсеместно запрещены законом.

column2: Traditional cure-all and cocktail ingredient. The venom of the snake entombed in the bottle adds to the intoxicating effect of the drink.

zh: 传统万灵药与鸡尾酒的成分。瓶中这种蛇的毒液使这种饮料致人醉酒的效力进一步提高。

Является запрещённым товаром на всех рынках, за исключением тех, которые регулируются коммунистическими или диктаторскими режимами.

Aufgrund eines vermuteten Zusammenhangs mit asozialem gesellschaftlichem Verhalten gilt es in einigen rechtlichen Hoheitsgebieten als verbotene Substanz, wird aber dennoch von weiten Bevölkerungskreisen konsumiert.

Widely used in the spacecraft industry right from its early pre-interstellar history because of its high thermal stability and low density. It is also a very useful component of many alloys, both industrially and for specialist high tech components.

Ввиду высокой термостойкости и малой плотности широко используется в космической отрасли ещё с тех времен, когда человечество не умело летать в другие системы. Также применяется в большом количестве сплавов, необходимых как в промышленности, так и при создании специализированных высокотехнологичных компонентов.

После размещения лишайник быстро распространяется по полю и скапливает определённые материалы. Во время этого процесса лишайник меняет цвет, что делает добычу более эффективной.

column2: These tiny crawling creatures have been called ’a lab in a bag’. They exude tailored biological agents that adapt and mutate to overcome the defences of their enemies. When deployed in large numbers they resemble a viscous yellow goo that slowly crawls over the victim, devouring them completely. When there are no further nutrients to absorb, the insects will become dormant, and can be recovered by specially trained teams to be used again.
de: These tiny crawling creatures have been called ’a lab in a bag’. They exude tailored biological agents that adapt and mutate to overcome the defences of their enemies. When deployed in large numbers they resemble a viscous yellow goo that slowly crawls over the victim, devouring them completely. When there are no further nutrients to absorb, the insects will become dormant, and can be recovered by specially trained teams to be used again.
es: Estas diminutas criaturas reptantes son conocidas como ’un laboratorio de mochila’. Exudan agentes biológicos a medida que se adaptan y mutan para superar las defensas enemigas. Cuando se despliegan en grandes cantidades parecen una viscosa gelatina amarilla que lentamente se arrastra sobre la víctima, devorándola completamente. Cuando ya no quedan nutrientes que absorber, los insectos pasan a un estado latente y pueden ser recuperados para ser usados de nuevo por equipos especialmente entrenados.
fr: These tiny crawling creatures have been called ’a lab in a bag’. They exude tailored biological agents that adapt and mutate to overcome the defences of their enemies. When deployed in large numbers they resemble a viscous yellow goo that slowly crawls over the victim, devouring them completely. When there are no further nutrients to absorb, the insects will become dormant, and can be recovered by specially trained teams to be used again.
pt: These tiny crawling creatures have been called ’a lab in a bag’. They exude tailored biological agents that adapt and mutate to overcome the defences of their enemies. When deployed in large numbers they resemble a viscous yellow goo that slowly crawls over the victim, devouring them completely. When there are no further nutrients to absorb, the insects will become dormant, and can be recovered by specially trained teams to be used again.
ru: Эти маленькие ползучие существа также известны как «лаборатория в сумке». Выделяемые ими специальные биологические агенты способны адаптироваться и мутировать, что позволяет им преодолеть защитную систему своих целей. Внешне они напоминают вязкую жёлтую жижу, которая ползёт по цели, поглощая её. После того, как все питательные вещества будут поглощены, насекомые засыпают. После этого команды из обученных специалистов могут собрать их, чтобы позже их можно было снова пустить в бой.
zh: 这些微小的爬行生物被称作“袋子中的实验室”。它们能释放特殊的生物试剂，这种试剂可以适应与变异来克服敌人的防御。当大规模部署时它们就像一团粘稠的黄色黏液，缓慢地在受害者身上爬行并最终完全吞噬它们。当没有可供吸收的营养时，这种昆虫就会休眠，并可被专门训练过的小队回收以供下次使用。

column2:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech

Bromellite, BeO, is a white oxide mineral with a wide range of uses, such as ceramic based electronics, and enhancing material properties of mechanical strength and thermal conductivity.
de:
Produktion: nur Abbau
Nachfrage: Hightech

Bromellit, BeO, ist ein meist weißes Mineral der Oxide-Klasse mit einem großen Anwendungsbereich, z. B. bei keramikbasierter Elektronik. Bromellit verbessert Materialeigenschaften hinsichtlich mechanischer Festigkeit und thermischer Leitfähigkeit.
es:
Producido por: Minería
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología

La bromellita, BeO, es un mineral de óxido blanco con una amplia gama de usos, tales como la electrónica de base cerámica y el incremento de las propiedades de resistencia mecánica y conductividad térmica de materiales.
fr:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech

Bromellite, BeO, is a white oxide mineral with a wide range of uses, such as ceramic based electronics, and enhancing material properties of mechanical strength and thermal conductivity.
pt:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech

Bromellite, BeO, is a white oxide mineral with a wide range of uses, such as ceramic based electronics, and enhancing material properties of mechanical strength and thermal conductivity.
ru:
Производится: Может быть добыт только в астероидах
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная

Бромеллит (BeO) — белый оксидный минерал с широким спектром применения. В частности, используется при изготовлении электронных компонентов на основе керамики, а также для увеличения прочности и теплопроводности ряда материалов.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：高科技

铍石，BeO，是一种白色的氧化矿物，具有广泛用途，例如陶瓷电子设备，以及增强机械强度与导热能力之类的材料属性。

column2: Double-sided drinks mats originally commissioned in 3302. One side bears the Buckyball Racing Club logo with the slogan ’Win it or bin it’ while the other reads ’Celebrating 10000 rescues’ and depicts the mascot of the Fuel Rats.
de: Double-sided drinks mats originally commissioned in 3302. One side bears the Buckyball Racing Club logo with the slogan ’Win it or bin it’ while the other reads ’Celebrating 10000 rescues’ and depicts the mascot of the Fuel Rats.
es: Posavasos de doble cara creados en 3302. En una de las cara muestra el logo de Buckyball Racing Club con el eslogan ’Gánatelo o tíralo’ mientras en la otra se muestra la mascota de los Fuel Rats y la frase ’Celebrando 10.000 rescates’.
fr: Double-sided drinks mats originally commissioned in 3302. One side bears the Buckyball Racing Club logo with the slogan ’Win it or bin it’ while the other reads ’Celebrating 10000 rescues’ and depicts the mascot of the Fuel Rats.
pt: Double-sided drinks mats originally commissioned in 3302. One side bears the Buckyball Racing Club logo with the slogan ’Win it or bin it’ while the other reads ’Celebrating 10000 rescues’ and depicts the mascot of the Fuel Rats.
ru: Двусторонние подставки под пивные кружки, произведённые в 3302 году. На одну сторону нанесен логотип Buckyball Racing Club и слоган «Побеждай или вали прочь», а на другую — талисман Fuel Rats и фраза «Уже 10 000 спасённых».
zh: 双面酒杯垫，于3302年开始制造。一面上有Buckyball Racing Club的标志与“不成功便成仁”的口号，而另一面则写着“庆祝第10000次救援”与Fuel Rats的吉祥物。

Ресурсы и устройства производства, необходимые для строительства наземных сооружений.

产出于：工业
消耗于：殖民地 (地面)，开采 (地面)，高科技 (地面)，军事 (地面)，旅游 (地面)

这是用于建造地表结构的各种资源与加工设备。

column2: The use of ’donated’ human bodily fluids in the distillation process for this potent liquor causes a strong variation in flavours from vintage to vintage, and widespread outcry about the ethics of the production. The producers of the drink report that each slave used agrees to the extraction process, but this has not stopped some having a bitter taste left in their mouths.
de: The use of ’donated’ human bodily fluids in the distillation process for this potent liquor causes a strong variation in flavours from vintage to vintage, and widespread outcry about the ethics of the production. The producers of the drink report that each slave used agrees to the extraction process, but this has not stopped some having a bitter taste left in their mouths.
es: El uso de fluidos corporales humanos ’donados’ durante el proceso de destilación de este potente licor produce una gran variación de sabores entre cosecha y cosecha. Los productores de la bebida aseguran de que los esclavos empleados estaban de acuerdo con el proceso de extracción, pero esto no ha evitado dejarles a algunos un amargo sabor de boca.
fr: The use of ’donated’ human bodily fluids in the distillation process for this potent liquor causes a strong variation in flavours from vintage to vintage, and widespread outcry about the ethics of the production. The producers of the drink report that each slave used agrees to the extraction process, but this has not stopped some having a bitter taste left in their mouths.
pt: The use of ’donated’ human bodily fluids in the distillation process for this potent liquor causes a strong variation in flavours from vintage to vintage, and widespread outcry about the ethics of the production. The producers of the drink report that each slave used agrees to the extraction process, but this has not stopped some having a bitter taste left in their mouths.
ru: Использование в процессе дистилляции ’пожертвованной’ телесной жидкости обеспечивает большое разнообразие ароматов — от винтажного до винтажного[1] — а также большие сомнения в этичности производства напитка. Производители сообщают, что каждый использованный раб даёт своё согласие на извлечение, но и это заверение не всем помогает избавиться от ощущения некоторой горечи.
zh: 这种烈酒蒸馏过程中对“捐献的”人类体液导致了陈酿口味的强烈变化，以及对于该生产过程道德上的广泛抗议。这种饮料的生产商报告称每个奴隶都同意了提取过程，但这并没能阻止有些人对此感到不满。

column2: The coffee beans are mellowed in the digestive tract of the indigenous giant cats, making for a distinctive and unique aftertaste. Many have tried to emulate this chemically and physically, however the results to date have been inferior if not disastrous.
de: The coffee beans are mellowed in the digestive tract of the indigenous giant cats, making for a distinctive and unique aftertaste. Many have tried to emulate this chemically and physically, however the results to date have been inferior if not disastrous.
es: Los granos de café son suavizados en el tracto digestivo de los gatos gigantes indígenas, lo que les da un sabor distintivo y único. Muchos han tratado de emular este proceso químicamente y físicamente; sin embargo, los resultados hasta la fecha han sido inferiores, por no decir desastrosos.
fr: The coffee beans are mellowed in the digestive tract of the indigenous giant cats, making for a distinctive and unique aftertaste. Many have tried to emulate this chemically and physically, however the results to date have been inferior if not disastrous.
pt: The coffee beans are mellowed in the digestive tract of the indigenous giant cats, making for a distinctive and unique aftertaste. Many have tried to emulate this chemically and physically, however the results to date have been inferior if not disastrous.
ru: Кофейные зёрна этого сорта кофе были размягчены пищеварительной системой огромных местных кошек, что придало им уникальный привкус. Многие пытались повторить этот процесс в лаборатории, но подобного вкуса не удалось добиться ещё ни одному учёному.
zh: 这种咖啡豆在当地巨型猫的消化道中进行了软化，这使得它有一种与众不同而独特的回味。许多人都曾尝试物理上或化学上效仿这个过程，但到目前为止这些尝试的结果都并不理想——如果不是灾难性的失败的话。

column2: This chemical distillate is almost pure alcohol, but with subtle, prized flavours. Often used as an ingredient in more dangerous cocktails. The exact details of the distillation process are a closely guarded secret.
de: This chemical distillate is almost pure alcohol, but with subtle, prized flavours. Often used as an ingredient in more dangerous cocktails. The exact details of the distillation process are a closely guarded secret.
es: Este destilado químico es casi alcohol puro, pero con sutiles y preciados aromas. Suele utilizarse como ingrediente en los cócteles más peligrosos. Los detalles exactos sobre su destilación están celosamente guardados.
fr: This chemical distillate is almost pure alcohol, but with subtle, prized flavours. Often used as an ingredient in more dangerous cocktails. The exact details of the distillation process are a closely guarded secret.
pt: This chemical distillate is almost pure alcohol, but with subtle, prized flavours. Often used as an ingredient in more dangerous cocktails. The exact details of the distillation process are a closely guarded secret.
ru: Этот дистиллят состоит почти исключительно из спирта, но присутствуют там и едва уловимые привкусы. Его часто используют как ингредиент для ещё более опасных коктейлей. Точные подробности процесса дистилляции хранятся в строжайшей тайне.
zh: 这种化学馏出物几乎是纯酒精，但却有一种轻柔而受到高度评价的口味。常用于更加危险的鸡尾酒中的一种原料。蒸馏过程中的具体细节是一个被严格守护着的秘密。

Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: Industrial and High Tech

A wide range of engineered materials supporting a broad range of technological and industrial applications.

Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: Industrial and High Tech

A wide range of engineered materials supporting a broad range of technological and industrial applications.

Constituyen un amplio espectro de materiales de ingeniería con muchísimas aplicaciones tecnológicas e industriales.

Производится: Перерабатывающая на поверхности
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Промышленная

Широкий спектр конструкционных материалов, использующихся в технике и промышленности.
zh:
产出于：精炼 (地面) 
消耗于：工业与高科技

各种工程改造过的材料支撑起了许多科技与工业的应用。

column2: Super-fine green tea. Powdered for use in tea ceremonies, this brew is often used to seal treaties and business deals. It is traditionally ground on granite mills by specially selected millers, chosen for their moral purity.
de: Super-fine green tea. Powdered for use in tea ceremonies, this brew is often used to seal treaties and business deals. It is traditionally ground on granite mills by specially selected millers, chosen for their moral purity.
es: Té verde en polvo extrafino. Se tritura para su uso en ceremonias y suele emplearse para sellar tratados y acuerdos comerciales. Tradicionalmente se muele con piedras de granito por molineros especialmente seleccionados y elegidos por su integridad moral.
fr: Super-fine green tea. Powdered for use in tea ceremonies, this brew is often used to seal treaties and business deals. It is traditionally ground on granite mills by specially selected millers, chosen for their moral purity.
pt: Super-fine green tea. Powdered for use in tea ceremonies, this brew is often used to seal treaties and business deals. It is traditionally ground on granite mills by specially selected millers, chosen for their moral purity.
ru: Невероятно мелкий зеленый чай. Часто используется во время чайных церемоний, этот напиток употребляют во время заключения мирных договоров и сделок. Специально отобранные за свою моральную чистоту специалисты размельчают чай с помощью традиционных гранитных дробилок.
zh: 极其细密的绿茶。为了茶叶典礼而碎成粉末，这种茶通常被用于秘密条约与商业交易。传统上它是由因道德纯洁性而被特殊选中的磨坊主用花岗岩石磨制成的。

column2: Originally referred to as Elephant birds, these behemoths were brought out of extinction using preserved genetic material found on ancient earth. With some careful genetic modification (before the process of gene modification was outlawed); they were adapted to thrive in the dense, oxygen-rich Cetian atmosphere. They lay prized eggs with a circumference of over a metre.
de: Originally referred to as Elephant birds, these behemoths were brought out of extinction using preserved genetic material found on ancient earth. With some careful genetic modification (before the process of gene modification was outlawed); they were adapted to thrive in the dense, oxygen-rich Cetian atmosphere. They lay prized eggs with a circumference of over a metre.
es: Originalmente conocidos como ’pájaros elefante’, estos gigantes fueron sacados de la extinción utilizando material genético conservado de la vieja Tierra. Con un poco de modificación genética (antes de que fuera abolida la ley de procesos de modificación de genes), se han adaptado para prosperar en la densa atmósfera rica en oxígeno de Cetian. Ponen valiosos huevos con una circunferencia de más de un metro.
fr: Originally referred to as Elephant birds, these behemoths were brought out of extinction using preserved genetic material found on ancient earth. With some careful genetic modification (before the process of gene modification was outlawed); they were adapted to thrive in the dense, oxygen-rich Cetian atmosphere. They lay prized eggs with a circumference of over a metre.
pt: Originally referred to as Elephant birds, these behemoths were brought out of extinction using preserved genetic material found on ancient earth. With some careful genetic modification (before the process of gene modification was outlawed); they were adapted to thrive in the dense, oxygen-rich Cetian atmosphere. They lay prized eggs with a circumference of over a metre.
ru: Эти ранее вымершие гигантские птицы, изначально называемые слоновыми, были возрождены с помощью сохранённого генетического материала, найденного на древней Земле. Благодаря осторожной генетической модификации (проведённой до того, как её объявили вне закона), они смогли успешно жить в густой и богатой кислородом атмосфере Кита. Эпиорнисы откладывают высоко ценимые яйца более метра в окружности.
zh: 最初被称为象鸟，这些庞然大物借由远古地球上保存下来的基因物质重现人间。经过小心的基因编辑后 (在基因编辑被认定非法前)，它们得以适应并在厚重富氧的Cetian大气层中繁荣生长。它们会下珍贵的蛋，其周长可超过一米。

column2: For years 47 Ceti suffered from rodents, introduced from Earth, decimating crops. However, they have turned this to their advantage and now farm them in great numbers as the local environment makes the meat curiously sweet.
de: For years 47 Ceti suffered from rodents, introduced from Earth, decimating crops. However, they have turned this to their advantage and now farm them in great numbers as the local environment makes the meat curiously sweet.
es: Durante años, 47 Ceti sufría plagas de conejos que diezmaban sus cultivos. Sin embargo, han conseguido darle la vuelta a la situación y ahora los crían en grandes cantidades debido a que el medio ambiente local hace que la carne sea curiosamente dulce.
fr: For years 47 Ceti suffered from rodents, introduced from Earth, decimating crops. However, they have turned this to their advantage and now farm them in great numbers as the local environment makes the meat curiously sweet.
pt: For years 47 Ceti suffered from rodents, introduced from Earth, decimating crops. However, they have turned this to their advantage and now farm them in great numbers as the local environment makes the meat curiously sweet.
ru: 47 лет жители Ceti страдали от уничтожающих посевы вредителей. Однако им наконец-то удалось использовать их во благо, теперь они выращивают их в огромных количествах и продают. Оказывается, что благодаря местному климату мясо кроликов стало очень вкусным.
zh: 多年来47 Ceti都受兔子侵扰，这些来自地球的动物毁坏了大量的庄稼。然而现在当地人却将此变为优势并大量养殖这种动物，因为当地环境让它们的肉变得相当美味。

column2: Woven from living plants, the fabric created retains the native Flora’s sympathetic camouflage. When worn, the user will blend in with whatever their current environment is. Although considered for military applications, the low availability of the fabric, and the slow speed of the camouflage effect, led to it being deemed inferior to technological camouflages.
de: Woven from living plants, the fabric created retains the native Flora’s sympathetic camouflage. When worn, the user will blend in with whatever their current environment is. Although considered for military applications, the low availability of the fabric, and the slow speed of the camouflage effect, led to it being deemed inferior to technological camouflages.
es: Confeccionada a partir de plantas vivas, esta tela mantiene la capacidad de camuflaje de la flora nativa. Cuando un sujeto se viste con ella, se mimetiza con el entorno, sea el que sea. Aunque fue confeccionada para uso militar, la poca disponibilidad del tejido y la lenta velocidad del camuflaje acabo por degradarla a una categoría inferior con respecto a otros camuflajes tecnológicos.
fr: Woven from living plants, the fabric created retains the native Flora’s sympathetic camouflage. When worn, the user will blend in with whatever their current environment is. Although considered for military applications, the low availability of the fabric, and the slow speed of the camouflage effect, led to it being deemed inferior to technological camouflages.
pt: Woven from living plants, the fabric created retains the native Flora’s sympathetic camouflage. When worn, the user will blend in with whatever their current environment is. Although considered for military applications, the low availability of the fabric, and the slow speed of the camouflage effect, led to it being deemed inferior to technological camouflages.
ru: Ткань, сплетенная из живых растений, сохраняет камуфлирующий эффект местной флоры. Носитель такой ткани будет сливаться с окружением, где бы он ни находился. Ткань рассматривалась под нужды армии, но её низкая доступность и малая скорость проявления камуфлирующего эффекта привели к тому, что её сочли уступающей технокамуфляжу.
zh: 这种布料由活着的植物织成，它仍然保留着当地植物的伪装能力。当穿着它时，使用者会和他们所在的任何环境融为一体。尽管曾被考虑过用于军事用途，但由于较少的供应量和缓慢的伪装速度，它还是被认为劣于科技迷彩。

column2: Wines from Aegaeon are some of the most valued and prized possessions in the galaxy. In great demand in wealthy systems, these wines are purchased for large sums, but rarely actually drunk.
de: Wines from Aegaeon are some of the most valued and prized possessions in the galaxy. In great demand in wealthy systems, these wines are purchased for large sums, but rarely actually drunk.
es: Los vinos de Aegaeon son unas de las posesiones más valoradas y caras de la galaxia. Altamente demandados en sistemas ricos, estos vinos son comprados por grandes sumas de dinero, pero raramente son abiertos.
fr: Wines from Aegaeon are some of the most valued and prized possessions in the galaxy. In great demand in wealthy systems, these wines are purchased for large sums, but rarely actually drunk.
pt: Wines from Aegaeon are some of the most valued and prized possessions in the galaxy. In great demand in wealthy systems, these wines are purchased for large sums, but rarely actually drunk.
ru: Вина с Aegaeon весьма высоко ценятся по всей галактике, однако пьют их весьма редко. В тюремных колониях и в теократических системах Федерации считается запрещённым товаром.
zh: 来自Aegaeon的葡萄酒是全银河最受重视和最被认可的财物之一。这些酒在富裕的星系中有着很高的需求，它们被大量购买，但很少真的被喝。

Consumed by: Refinery

Химикаты, непригодные к дальнейшему использованию. Обычно образуются как побочный продукт промышленных процессов.
zh:
产出于：无
消耗于：精炼

受到污染而无法使用的化学物质。通常是工业生产流程的副产品。

column2: The unique magnetic flows found in the deepest caves of Cherbones have formed amazing crystals that are coveted for their beauty. These fragile structures are manually extracted at great personal risk. The local inhabitants train all their lives to learn the method for extracting the crystals. Many are lost on their first attempt.
de: The unique magnetic flows found in the deepest caves of Cherbones have formed amazing crystals that are coveted for their beauty. These fragile structures are manually extracted at great personal risk. The local inhabitants train all their lives to learn the method for extracting the crystals. Many are lost on their first attempt.
es: Los flujos magnéticos únicos de las cavernas más profundas de Cherbones han formado impresionantes cristales que son codiciados por su belleza. Estas frágiles estructuras se extraen a mano con gran riesgo para el personal. Los habitantes locales entrenan toda su vida para aprender el método de extracción del cristal. Muchos de ellos fallecen en su primer intento.
fr: The unique magnetic flows found in the deepest caves of Cherbones have formed amazing crystals that are coveted for their beauty. These fragile structures are manually extracted at great personal risk. The local inhabitants train all their lives to learn the method for extracting the crystals. Many are lost on their first attempt.
pt: The unique magnetic flows found in the deepest caves of Cherbones have formed amazing crystals that are coveted for their beauty. These fragile structures are manually extracted at great personal risk. The local inhabitants train all their lives to learn the method for extracting the crystals. Many are lost on their first attempt.
ru: Уникальные магнитные потоки в глубочайших пещерах Cherbones образовали изумительные кристаллы, высоко ценимые за свою красоту. Эти хрупкие ископаемые извлекаются вручную с величайшим риском для жизни. Местные жители тренируются всю жизнь, чтобы овладеть способами извлечения таких кристаллов. Многие из них погибают при первой же попытке.
zh: Cherbones中那些最幽深洞穴内独特的磁场流动造就了惊人而令人无比渴望的美丽水晶。这些脆弱的结构通过人工开采得到，其中蕴含着极大的个人风险。当地人究其一生学习开采这些水晶的方法，而很多人在第一次尝试的时候就送了命。

column2: A unique mix of zooplankton and phytoplankton from the rich and varied oceans of Chi Eridani. Due to the automated trawling process, it may include any number of other marine creatures that happened to wander into the processor.
de: A unique mix of zooplankton and phytoplankton from the rich and varied oceans of Chi Eridani. Due to the automated trawling process, it may include any number of other marine creatures that happened to wander into the processor.
es: Una mezcla única de zooplancton y fitoplancton de los ricos y variados océanos de Chi Eridani. Debido al proceso automatizado de pesca de arrastre, puede incluir un número variado de criaturas marinas que pudieron haberse colado en el cosechador.
fr: A unique mix of zooplankton and phytoplankton from the rich and varied oceans of Chi Eridani. Due to the automated trawling process, it may include any number of other marine creatures that happened to wander into the processor.
pt: A unique mix of zooplankton and phytoplankton from the rich and varied oceans of Chi Eridani. Due to the automated trawling process, it may include any number of other marine creatures that happened to wander into the processor.
ru: Уникальная смесь из зоопланктона и фитопланктона, обитающих в богатых на биологические виды океанах Chi Eridani. Из-за автоматизированного процесса ловли рыбы в состав продукта могут попасть различные другие морские существа, которые случайно оказались в лапах перерабатывающей машины.
zh: 产自Chi Eridani富饶而多样的海洋中的一种独特的浮游动物与浮游植物的混合物。由于其自动化的拖网采集法，其中可能包含其他恰好游荡进处理设备的海洋生物。

column2: Secretive technology required by Salvation for mass anti-Xeno initiatives.
de: Secretive technology required by Salvation for mass anti-Xeno initiatives.

pt: Secretive technology required by Salvation for mass anti-Xeno initiatives.

zh: Salvation所要求的秘密科技，用于大规模反异种运动。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All

Even in the 34th century, fashion is continually changing, driving purchases of new clothing for those with some credits to spare.
de:
Produktion: Industrie
Nachfrage: Alle

Auch im 34. Jahrhundert ist die Mode weiterhin fortwährenden Veränderungen unterworfen, sodass Käufer, die entsprechenden Mittel vorausgesetzt, immer noch viele Credits für neue Kleidung ausgeben können.
es:
Producido por: Industrial
Consumido por: Todos

Incluso en el siglo XXXIV, la moda cambia continuamente, impulsando a aquellos que tengan créditos de sobra a comprar nuevos atuendos.

Даже в 34 веке мода постоянно развивается, что пораждает спрос на новую одежду со стороны платежеспособных покупателей.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：所有

哪怕是在34世纪，潮流也是不断变化的。这驱使着那些有闲钱的人去买些新衣服。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech, Industrial and Military

CMM composites are layered carbon and metals bonded to take advantage of the properties for each of the different components. These result in flexible, lightweight and strong structures.

Consumed by: High Tech, Industrial and Military

CMM composites are layered carbon and metals bonded to take advantage of the properties for each of the different components. These result in flexible, lightweight and strong structures.

Producido por: Refinería (Superficie)
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología, Industrial y Militar

Los compuestos CMM son capas de carbono y metales enlazados para aprovechar las ventajas de cada uno de los compuestos. El resultado son estructuras fuertes, flexibles y ligeras.
fr:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech, Industrial and Military

Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная, Промышленная и Военная

CMM-композиты представляют из себя соединение слоистых углеродов и металлов, обладающее полезными свойствами каждого компонента. В результате получаются гибкие, легкие и прочные материалы.
zh:
产出于：精炼 (地面) 
消耗于：高科技，工业与军事

CMM复合材料是层层叠加的碳与金属，以此来集成各种不同材料的优势属性。结果便是一种柔韧，轻巧而坚固的结构。

消耗于：高科技与工业

钴，Co，原子序数27，熔点1768开尔文。传统上被用作一种蓝色颜料，但现在主要用于制造高温合金。也有生物科技上的用途。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: All except Agricultural

A good source of caffeine to fuel the creative economies. Many attempts have been made to supplant it but all inevitably fail. Some claim the archaic ritual of grinding beans is a key part of the experience.
de:
Produktion: Landwirtschaft
Nachfrage: Alle außer Landwirtschaft

Eine effektive Quelle für den täglichen Koffeinbedarf zum Erhalt der kreativen Fähigkeiten. Alle Versuche der Substituierung sind bis heute fehlgeschlagen. In einigen Kreisen zählt das archaisch anmutende Ritual des Bohnenmahlens als bedeutender Teil der Konsumerfahrung.
es:
Producido por: Agrícola
Consumido por: Todos, excepto Agrícola

Una buena fuente de cafeína para impulsar economías creativas. Se han realizado varios intentos para suplantarlo pero, inevitablemente, todos han fallado. Algunos afirman que el ritual arcaico de moler granos es una parte clave de la experiencia.

产出于：农业
消耗于：农业之外所有

一种咖啡因的优秀来源，用于驱动那些创造性经济。许多替代它的尝试全部不可避免地失败了。有些人声称那原始的研磨咖啡豆的仪式是其体验的关键。

消耗于：精炼

钶钽铁矿是铌铁矿和钽铁矿的混合物，两者都是珍贵的钽矿石。从古到今一直是高科技与电子设施中有用的电容器材料。

Illegal in most markets., Biological agents used to sustain and heal injured humans in combat. Combat stabilisers allow recipients to continue to function despite unimaginable amounts of pain. Some cultures consider they encourage the glorification of combat, and so are illegal.

Agentes biológicos utilizados para estabilizar y curar a seres humanos que han sido heridos en combate y mantenerlos en la batalla a pesar del inimaginable dolor. Algunas culturas consideran que generan enaltecimiento al combate y por lo tanto son ilegales en muchos mercados.
