Биологические препараты для лечения ран и поддерживания боеспособности солдат, даже несмотря на сильнейшую боль. В некоторых культурах считается, что боевые стабилизаторы способствуют героизации насилия, а потому торговля им запрещена.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：高科技之外所有

在大多数市场中非法。用于维持和治愈战斗中受伤的人类的生物制剂。Combat stabiliser能让受助者忍耐难以想象的疼痛而继续行动。有些文化认为它们鼓励战斗的荣耀，并因此是违法的。

Nachfrage: Alle außer Hightech

verboten in Sträflingskolonie- und Theokratie-Märkten., Diese Gerätschaften entwickeln und verändern sich unaufhaltsam, also macht man sich besser gleich für die nächste Generation der Unterhaltungselektronik bereit. Neid ist vorprogrammiert, wenn du Freunden deine neuesten Errungenschaften präsentierst - am besten bestellst du bei der Gelegenheit gleich die nächste Version.

在监狱殖民地 (prison colony) 和神权制 (theocracy) 中不合法。永远演化着变化着，快来赶上下一代个人设备的潮流吧。向你的朋友炫耀你最新的玩意，让他们羡慕，然后赶快准备好升级换代。

También es utilizado en biotecnología y acuicultura, especialmente en muchas especies extraterrestres que presenten hemocianina.

Used broadly by industry as a cheap conductor and in many alloys. It is also used in biotech and aquaculture especially in many extraterrestrial and hemocyanal species.
ru:
Производится: Перерабатывающая
Потребляется: Промышленная

Медь, Cu, атомный номер 29. Температура плавления — 1358 К. Очень вязкий блестящий красно-оранжевый металл с хорошей тепло- и электропроводностью. Широко применяется в промышленности в качестве дешёвого проводника и при создании многих сплавов. Также используется многими внеземными и гемоцианиновыми расами в биотехнологиях и сельском хозяйстве.
zh:
产出与：精炼
消耗于：工业

铜，Cu，原子序数29，熔点1358开尔文。一种延展性强，有光泽的橙红色金属，具有优秀的导热导电能力。作为廉价的导体以及合金的成分在工业中被广泛使用。它也用于生物科技与水产养殖，尤其是那些地外生物与血蓝蛋白动物。

column2: Spongiform Victuals have been a staple food of the Imperial military for years. Many have tried to create copies of the nutritious formula, but it seems only to thrive in the vast damp caves of Coquim. The ingredients are a tightly held secret, and some suggest that it contains addictive substances.
de: Spongiform Victuals have been a staple food of the Imperial military for years. Many have tried to create copies of the nutritious formula, but it seems only to thrive in the vast damp caves of Coquim. The ingredients are a tightly held secret, and some suggest that it contains addictive substances.
es: Los víveres espongiformes han sido uno de los alimentos básicos de los soldados imperiales durante años. Muchos han tratado de reproducir su fórmula nutritiva, pero al parecer sólo prosperan en las húmedas cuevas de Coquim. Los ingredientes son un secreto celosamente guardado, y algunos sugieren que contiene sustancias adictivas.
fr: Spongiform Victuals have been a staple food of the Imperial military for years. Many have tried to create copies of the nutritious formula, but it seems only to thrive in the vast damp caves of Coquim. The ingredients are a tightly held secret, and some suggest that it contains addictive substances.
pt: Spongiform Victuals have been a staple food of the Imperial military for years. Many have tried to create copies of the nutritious formula, but it seems only to thrive in the vast damp caves of Coquim. The ingredients are a tightly held secret, and some suggest that it contains addictive substances.
ru: Губковые продукты вот уже многие годы являются главным источником провианта для имперских военных. Многие пытались создать аналоги питательной формулы, но похоже, что наилучший результат удалось достичь лишь в больших и сырых пещерах Coquim. Точный состав хранится в строжайшем секрете; некоторые даже полагают, что в продукты подмешивают вызывающие зависимость вещества.
zh: Spongiform Victuals数年来一直是帝国军队的标准食物。许多人都曾试图复制其营养配方，但看起来这些东西只在Coquim广阔而潮湿的洞穴中流行。其具体成分是绝对的秘密，而有些人表示其中含有成瘾性物质。

column2: A quantity of sap harvested from Thargoid coral trees.
de: A quantity of sap harvested from Thargoid coral trees.
es: A quantity of sap harvested from Thargoid coral trees.
fr: A quantity of sap harvested from Thargoid coral trees.
pt: A quantity of sap harvested from Thargoid coral trees.
ru: Порция смолы, собранная с таргоидских коралловых деревьев.
zh: 一些从Thargoid珊瑚树上收集的树汁。

pt: Used to support actions in systems the Kumo Crew is attempting to control. It is of no value to anyone. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
ru: Используется для поддержки действий в системах, которые пытается контролировать Kumo Crew. Не представляет никакой ценности для кого-либо другого. Этот предмет будет устаревшим к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于在Kumo Crew试图控制的星系中支持其行动。它对任何人都没有价值。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

Широко используется в средствах против насекомых, пестицидах, фейерверках и в качестве растворителя оксида алюминия.

消耗于：高科技与精炼

用于一系列生产，包括杀虫剂，农药，烟花以及作为氧化铝的助熔剂。

column2: Transparent spheres crafted from the finest crystal and containing a clear liquid full of snow that swirls when shaken.
de: Transparent spheres crafted from the finest crystal and containing a clear liquid full of snow that swirls when shaken.
es: Esferas transparentes creadas a partir de los más finos cristales. Contienen un líquido claro repleto de nieve que revolotea cuando se agitan.
fr: Transparent spheres crafted from the finest crystal and containing a clear liquid full of snow that swirls when shaken.
pt: Transparent spheres crafted from the finest crystal and containing a clear liquid full of snow that swirls when shaken.
ru: Прозрачные сферы из лучших кристаллов, содержащие жидкость со снегом, вздымающимся от любого движения сферы.
zh: 用最优质的水晶制成的透明球体，其中包含摇晃时会在透明液体中旋转飘动的雪花。

column2: This escape pod’s systems have been damaged and will fail by the end time provided in the briefing. After this time the system will no longer be able to sustain the life of its occupant.
de: Das System dieser Rettungskapsel ist beschädigt worden. Dadurch unterstützt die Kapsel nach Ablauf der im Briefing angegebenen Einsatzzeit nicht mehr die lebenserhaltenden Systeme.
es: Estos sistemas de escape han sido dañados y solo se mantendrán activos durante el tiempo indicado en la misión. Tras ese tiempo el sistema ya no será capaz de mantener con vida a su ocupante.
fr: This escape pod’s systems have been damaged and will fail by the end time provided in the briefing. After this time the system will no longer be able to sustain the life of its occupant.
pt: This escape pod’s systems have been damaged and will fail by the end time provided in the briefing. After this time the system will no longer be able to sustain the life of its occupant.
ru: Системы этой спасательной капсулы повреждены и откажут по истечении времени, указанного в описании. По окончании этого времени система перестанет поддерживать жизнь пассажира.
zh: 这个逃生舱的系统已经损坏，并会在简报中所说时间之后失效。在那之后该系统将无法再支持其中的生命。

column2: The hard colourful exoskeletons of large insect-like creatures. Used as decoration and in the production of exotic materials and clothing.
de: The hard colourful exoskeletons of large insect-like creatures. Used as decoration and in the production of exotic materials and clothing.
es: Exoesqueletos de fuertes colores pertenecientes a grandes criaturas similares a insectos. Se utilizan como decoración y en la producción de materiales exóticos y ropa.
fr: The hard colourful exoskeletons of large insect-like creatures. Used as decoration and in the production of exotic materials and clothing.
pt: The hard colourful exoskeletons of large insect-like creatures. Used as decoration and in the production of exotic materials and clothing.
ru: Твёрдые разноцветные экзоскелеты больших насекомообразных существ. Используются в качестве украшения и при производстве экзотических материалов и одежды.
zh: 一种大型昆虫状生物坚硬而五颜六色的外骨骼。用于装饰以及生产奇异的材料与衣物。

column2: A large core filled with digital data.
de: A large core filled with digital data.
es: A large core filled with digital data.
fr: A large core filled with digital data.
pt: A large core filled with digital data.
ru: Огромное ядро, содержащее цифровые данные.
zh: 一个巨大的核心，其中充满了数据。

column2: A truly organic pest eradication tool, these sterile plants can only be grown from cuttings. Their pollen is lethal to most insectoid life forms. Historically it used their bodies as a host to germinate. Note this may cause hallucinations if workers are over-exposed.
de: A truly organic pest eradication tool, these sterile plants can only be grown from cuttings. Their pollen is lethal to most insectoid life forms. Historically it used their bodies as a host to germinate. Note this may cause hallucinations if workers are over-exposed.
es: Una verdadera herramienta orgánica para la erradicación de plagas; estas plantas son estériles y sólo pueden ser cultivadas a partir de esquejes. Su polen es letal para la gran mayoría de las formas de vida insectoides. Históricamente, usaban sus cuerpos como huéspedes para germinar. Es importante señalar que una alta exposición al polen puede causar alucinaciones a los trabajadores.
fr: A truly organic pest eradication tool, these sterile plants can only be grown from cuttings. Their pollen is lethal to most insectoid life forms. Historically it used their bodies as a host to germinate. Note this may cause hallucinations if workers are over-exposed.
pt: A truly organic pest eradication tool, these sterile plants can only be grown from cuttings. Their pollen is lethal to most insectoid life forms. Historically it used their bodies as a host to germinate. Note this may cause hallucinations if workers are over-exposed.
ru: Полностью органическое средство для борьбы с вредителями. Выращивать эти растения можно только из их побегов. Их пыльца смертельна практически для любых насекомых. Когда-то растение оставляло споры в теле жертвы, которые позже прорастали. Примечания: при длительном взаимодействии может вызвать галлюцинации.
zh: 这些不育的植物是真正的有机杀虫工具，只能通过插枝法种植。它们的花粉对于多数昆虫生物都是致命的。历史上它会将其尸体用作生长的宿主。注意，过度暴露在这种植物附近的工人可能会感受到幻觉。

column2: More of a lichen than the fungus that they resemble. They have a similar musty flavour to ancient Earth truffles, but the process of metabolising Deuringas’s metal-rich rocks leaves trace amounts of metals on its surface - which is why Deuringas truffles must be shaved in preparation for eating.
de: More of a lichen than the fungus that they resemble. They have a similar musty flavour to ancient Earth truffles, but the process of metabolising Deuringas’s metal-rich rocks leaves trace amounts of metals on its surface - which is why Deuringas truffles must be shaved in preparation for eating.
es: Más parecidas a un liquen que al hongo que les da nombre, tienen un sabor mustio, similar al de las antiguas trufas de la vieja Tierra. El proceso de metabolización de las rocas ricas en metales de Deuringas deja restos metálicos en la superficie, por lo que es preciso pelarlas cuidadosamente antes de ingerirlas.
fr: More of a lichen than the fungus that they resemble. They have a similar musty flavour to ancient Earth truffles, but the process of metabolising Deuringas’s metal-rich rocks leaves trace amounts of metals on its surface - which is why Deuringas truffles must be shaved in preparation for eating.
pt: More of a lichen than the fungus that they resemble. They have a similar musty flavour to ancient Earth truffles, but the process of metabolising Deuringas’s metal-rich rocks leaves trace amounts of metals on its surface - which is why Deuringas truffles must be shaved in preparation for eating.
ru: И хотя внешне они похожи на грибы, на самом деле это скорее пиявки. По вкусу они похожи на кисловатые трюфели с древней Земли. Ввиду особенностей процесса метаболизирования богатых металлом камней Деуринги на поверхности остаётся небольшой металлический осадок, из-за чего трюфели необходимо очищать перед едой.
zh: 比起真菌，它们看起来更像地衣。它们有一种和古代地球的松露类似的霉味，但Deuringas富含金属的岩石令它们新陈代谢的过程会在其表面留下痕量的金属——这也正是为什么在准备食用Deuringas truffles前要先把它们刮一遍。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial/Refinery near Lei Jing
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

Diagnostic sensors that provide hardware monitoring and telemetry for a variety of systems., These can be found at Kanwar Gateway in the Xiripa system.

Puede encontrarse en Kanwar Gateway en el sistema Xiripa.

Диагностические сенсоры обеспечивают мониторинг аппаратного обеспечения и телеметрию в различных системах. Доступны на станции «Kanwar Gateway» в системе Xiripa.
zh:
产出于：Lei Jing附近的精炼/工业
消耗于：高科技与军事

为各种系统提供硬件监控与遥测的诊断传感器。它们可在Xiripa星系的Kanwar Gateway中买到。

column2: Used to carry political correspondence and other confidential items. Can only be sold on the black market. These packages are often contained within booby-trapped containers.
de: Used to carry political correspondence and other confidential items. Can only be sold on the black market. These packages are often contained within booby-trapped containers.
es: Empleada para transportar correspondencia política así como otro tipo de material confidencial. Solo puede venderse en el mercado negro. Estos paquetes suelen contener mecanismos explosivos para evitar su manipulación.
fr: Used to carry political correspondence and other confidential items. Can only be sold on the black market. These packages are often contained within booby-trapped containers.
pt: Used to carry political correspondence and other confidential items. Can only be sold on the black market. These packages are often contained within booby-trapped containers.
ru: Используется для перевозки политической корреспонденции и других конфиденциальных документов. Эти сумки часто защищаются ловушками, а продать их можно только на чёрном рынке.
zh: 用于转移政治通信和其他机密物品。只能在黑市售出。这些包裹通常都被放在具有陷阱的容器内。

column2: This ancient corn-like crop is harvested manually to preserve the dust-like coating on the seeds. This dust is traditionally snorted from the corn as a chef’s treat.
de: This ancient corn-like crop is harvested manually to preserve the dust-like coating on the seeds. This dust is traditionally snorted from the corn as a chef’s treat.
es: Este antiguo grano, semejante al maíz, se cosecha manualmente para preservar el polen de las semillas. Este polvo suele esnifarse y se considera toda una delicia.
fr: This ancient corn-like crop is harvested manually to preserve the dust-like coating on the seeds. This dust is traditionally snorted from the corn as a chef’s treat.
pt: This ancient corn-like crop is harvested manually to preserve the dust-like coating on the seeds. This dust is traditionally snorted from the corn as a chef’s treat.
ru: Эта древняя кукурузоподобная культура собирается вручную, чтобы сохранить покрывающую семена пыльцу. Пыльца по традиции вынюхивается отдельно, как отдельное лакомство.
zh: 这种类似远古玉米的作物会被人为收割来保存其种子外的粉末般的外壳。这种粉末传统上会被厨子吸走以犒劳自己。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All

For every household task, there are any number of domestic appliances fighting for the consumers’ attention and credits.
de:
Produktion: Industrie
Nachfrage: Alle

Für jede Aufgabe im Haushalt gibt es mehrere Geräte, die nach der Aufmerksamkeit und den Credits der Konsumenten heischen.
es:
Producido por: Industrial
Consumido por: Todos

Para cada tarea del hogar, hay multitud de electrodomésticos luchando por la atención del consumidor y sus créditos.
fr:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All

For every household task, there are any number of domestic appliances fighting for the consumers’ attention and credits.
pt:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All

For every household task, there are any number of domestic appliances fighting for the consumers’ attention and credits.
ru:
Производится: Промышленная
Потребляется: Всеми

Любую домашнюю задачу помогут быстрее решить разнообразные бытовые приборы, конкурирующие за внимание и деньги потребителей.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：所有

对于任何家庭杂务来说，都有一系列家用电器竞争着消费者的注意力和金钱。

column2: Self-propelled interface devices that can be programmed by a control module to perform a variety of functions.
de: Self-propelled interface devices that can be programmed by a control module to perform a variety of functions.
es: Self-propelled interface devices that can be programmed by a control module to perform a variety of functions.
fr: Self-propelled interface devices that can be programmed by a control module to perform a variety of functions.
pt: Self-propelled interface devices that can be programmed by a control module to perform a variety of functions.
ru: Автономный беспилотный летательный аппарат, который либо управляется дистанционно, либо может работать автономно для выполнения запрограммированного набора инструкций.
zh: 具有自我推进能力的接口设备，可被控制模块编程来实现一系列功能。

column2: These robust personal computing devices, manufactured by technology company Herculean Machines, are used throughout the galaxy.
de: These robust personal computing devices, manufactured by technology company Herculean Machines, are used throughout the galaxy.
es: Estos robustos dispositivos informáticos personales, fabricados por la compañía tecnológica Herculean Machines, se usan en toda la galaxia.
fr: These robust personal computing devices, manufactured by technology company Herculean Machines, are used throughout the galaxy.
pt: These robust personal computing devices, manufactured by technology company Herculean Machines, are used throughout the galaxy.
ru: Эти высокопрочные персональные вычислительные устройства, изготовленные технологической компанией Herculean Machines, пользуются спросом по всей галактике.
zh: 由Herculean Machines科技公司生产，这些可靠的个人计算设备在全银河都被广泛使用。

column2: Historical artefacts originating from the ancient periods of Earth. These items vary considerably in nature and hold great value to collectors.
de: Historical artefacts originating from the ancient periods of Earth. These items vary considerably in nature and hold great value to collectors.
es: Artefactos históricos procedentes de las antiguas edades de la Tierra. Su contenido puede ser de diferente naturaleza y tienen un gran valor para los coleccionistas.
fr: Historical artefacts originating from the ancient periods of Earth. These items vary considerably in nature and hold great value to collectors.
pt: Historical artefacts originating from the ancient periods of Earth. These items vary considerably in nature and hold great value to collectors.
ru: Артефакты, относящиеся к древней истории Земли. Это могут быть самые разнообразные предметы, но они в любом случае пользуются высоким спросом у коллекционеров.
zh: 远古地球留下的历史文物。这些物件天生形态各异，并对收藏家来说价值重大。

column2: In an age of manufactured goods, many prefer the expensive tradition of making things by hand. Eleu hand-knitted thermals, made from their own wool, are the survival underwear of choice for cold climates.
de: In an age of manufactured goods, many prefer the expensive tradition of making things by hand. Eleu hand-knitted thermals, made from their own wool, are the survival underwear of choice for cold climates.
es: En la era de los bienes manufacturados, hay quienes prefieren lo tradicionalmente hecho a mano, aunque ello sea más caro. El tejido térmico de Eleu está hecho a partir de su propia lana, y es la ropa interior más adecuada para sobrevivir a climas fríos.
fr: In an age of manufactured goods, many prefer the expensive tradition of making things by hand. Eleu hand-knitted thermals, made from their own wool, are the survival underwear of choice for cold climates.
pt: In an age of manufactured goods, many prefer the expensive tradition of making things by hand. Eleu hand-knitted thermals, made from their own wool, are the survival underwear of choice for cold climates.
ru: В эпоху массового производства продукции многие предпочитают приобретать дорогие, но сделанные вручную товары. Сшитая вручную элеусская тёплая одежда изготавливается из их собственной шерсти и отлично подходит для тех, кто много времени проводит на планетах с суровым климатом.
zh: 在工业化生产的时代，许多人都更青睐昂贵而传统的手工制品。Elue星系手工缝制的保暖内衣用当地的羊毛制造，是在寒冷气候下生存的不二选择。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech/Refinery near Akhenaten
Consumed by: High Tech, Industrial and Military

Аварийные энергоячейки используются для выработки энергии при недоступности основного источника, а также для временного увеличения общей выработки энергии.

产出于：Akhenaten附近的高科技/精炼

在主要电源不可用时供电的应急能量电池。这也能被用于暂时增加电力输出。它们可在Gladutjin星系的Chadwick Port中买到。

column2: It is sometimes safer to transport sensitive data physically and also quicker if immense quantities need transferring. They usually have little intrinsic value except to the organisation attempting to secure these items.
de: It is sometimes safer to transport sensitive data physically and also quicker if immense quantities need transferring. They usually have little intrinsic value except to the organisation attempting to secure these items.
es: A veces es más seguro transportar los datos sensibles de forma física, y también es más rápido si el tamaño de los datos a transferir es muy grande. Estos datos suelen tener poco valor intrínseco excepto para la organización que está intentando asegurar cuál es su contenido.
fr: It is sometimes safer to transport sensitive data physically and also quicker if immense quantities need transferring. They usually have little intrinsic value except to the organisation attempting to secure these items.
pt: It is sometimes safer to transport sensitive data physically and also quicker if immense quantities need transferring. They usually have little intrinsic value except to the organisation attempting to secure these items.
ru: Иногда данные на физических носителях надёжнее, а если объёмы особо велики, то и быстрее, если требуется доставить подобную информацию куда-либо. Ценности они обычно не представляют ни для кого, кроме организаций, заказавшей доставку.
zh: 有时候用物理方式运输敏感数据会更安全，如果需要传输的数据量巨大，这还会显得更快捷。除了对于那些试图获取这些物品的组织来说，它们本身通常没什么价值。

column2: Heavily encrypted data that is of little interest, although some hackers use it for training or practise, or simply enjoy the challenge of breaking the encryption. There is a limited black market for these items.
de: Heavily encrypted data that is of little interest, although some hackers use it for training or practise, or simply enjoy the challenge of breaking the encryption. There is a limited black market for these items.
es: Datos fuertemente encriptados que son de poco interés, aunque ciertos hackers los suelen usar para prácticas o entrenamiento, así como también como mero entretenimiento ante el reto de romper la encriptación. Hay una demanda limitada para estos artículos en el mercado negro.
fr: Heavily encrypted data that is of little interest, although some hackers use it for training or practise, or simply enjoy the challenge of breaking the encryption. There is a limited black market for these items.
pt: Heavily encrypted data that is of little interest, although some hackers use it for training or practise, or simply enjoy the challenge of breaking the encryption. There is a limited black market for these items.
ru: Шифрованная переписка особого интереса не представляет, хотя хакеры иногда её покупают для тренировки или просто для удовольствия. На чёрном рынке пользуется некоторым спросом.
zh: 高度加密的数据，没有什么用途，不过有些黑客会将其用作训练或练习材料，或者仅仅是简单的享受挑战着破解加密的过程。黑市中对这些物品有有限的需求。

column2: Created to celebrate 30 years of Eranin independence, this special whisky has a very limited supply and is expected to increase in value over time.
de: Created to celebrate 30 years of Eranin independence, this special whisky has a very limited supply and is expected to increase in value over time.
es: Creado para celebrar el 30 aniversario de la Independencia de Eranin, esta edición especial fue distribuida en cantidades limitadas y se espera que su valor aumente con el paso del tiempo.
fr: Created to celebrate 30 years of Eranin independence, this special whisky has a very limited supply and is expected to increase in value over time.
pt: Created to celebrate 30 years of Eranin independence, this special whisky has a very limited supply and is expected to increase in value over time.
ru: Созданное в честь 30-летия независимости системы Eranin, это особое виски было произведено в ограниченном количестве, ожидается, что со временем цена на него будет только расти.
zh: 为庆祝Eranin独立30周年而制造，这种威士忌供应量相当小，并可能会随着时间推移而逐渐增加价值。

column2: An anachronistic homage to a more civilised age becomes a symbol of wealth and tradition. Suppliers to the Empire and beyond.
de: An anachronistic homage to a more civilised age becomes a symbol of wealth and tradition. Suppliers to the Empire and beyond.
es: Un homenaje anacrónico a una época más civilizada convertido en símbolo de riqueza y tradición. Distribuido al Imperio y más allá.
fr: An anachronistic homage to a more civilised age becomes a symbol of wealth and tradition. Suppliers to the Empire and beyond.
pt: An anachronistic homage to a more civilised age becomes a symbol of wealth and tradition. Suppliers to the Empire and beyond.
ru: Дань уважения более цивилизованной эпохе превратилась в символ богатства и приверженность традициям. Поставляется в Империю и системы за её пределами.
zh: 对更加文明的时代来说一种过时的用于表示尊敬的用具，已经成为财富和传统之象征。向帝国以及其他地区供应。

column2: After being discovered in an ancient gene bank, the last of the cryogenically stored sturgeon eggs were purchased for an undisclosed, but reliably enormous sum. After a long search for an appropriate environment, they were introduced to the waters of Esuseku, and to their owner’s relief, hatched and established a breeding colony. These ancient fish continue to thrive in the waters of Esuseku making them the primary producer of caviar in known space.
de: After being discovered in an ancient gene bank, the last of the cryogenically stored sturgeon eggs were purchased for an undisclosed, but reliably enormous sum. After a long search for an appropriate environment, they were introduced to the waters of Esuseku, and to their owner’s relief, hatched and established a breeding colony. These ancient fish continue to thrive in the waters of Esuseku making them the primary producer of caviar in known space.
es: Tras ser descubierto en un antiguo banco de genes, la última caja de huevos de esturión almacenada criogénicamente fue comprada por una suma de dinero no revelada, pero seguramente enorme. Después de una larga búsqueda para encontrar un ambiente adecuado, fueron introducidos en las aguas de Esuseku y, para alivio de su dueño, eclosionaron y establecieron una colonia de cría. Este antiguo pez continúa prosperando en las aguas de Esuseku, quien es ahora el principal productor de caviar en el espacio conocido.
fr: After being discovered in an ancient gene bank, the last of the cryogenically stored sturgeon eggs were purchased for an undisclosed, but reliably enormous sum. After a long search for an appropriate environment, they were introduced to the waters of Esuseku, and to their owner’s relief, hatched and established a breeding colony. These ancient fish continue to thrive in the waters of Esuseku making them the primary producer of caviar in known space.
pt: After being discovered in an ancient gene bank, the last of the cryogenically stored sturgeon eggs were purchased for an undisclosed, but reliably enormous sum. After a long search for an appropriate environment, they were introduced to the waters of Esuseku, and to their owner’s relief, hatched and established a breeding colony. These ancient fish continue to thrive in the waters of Esuseku making them the primary producer of caviar in known space.
ru: Некоторое время назад последние икринки осетра были обнаружены в древнем банке генов и проданы за баснословные деньги. В результате долгих поисков было решено выпустить их в воды Esuseku. К счастью, осетры вылупились и организовали колонию на этой планете. Древняя рыба и сейчас процветает в водах Esuseku, которая стала основным поставщиком осетровой икры во всем открытом космосе.
zh: 在从一个远古基因库中被发现后，最后一批冷冻储存的鲟鱼卵被人用一笔未公开但绝对巨大的金额购走。经过对合适环境的长时间研究后，它们被引入Esuseku的水域，孵化并建立了一个生机勃勃的群落，这着实令其拥有者松了口气。这些古代鱼类继续在Esuseku的水域中繁衍，使其成为整个已知宇宙中鱼子酱的主要产地。

column2: These tea buds have to be hand-plucked from the dangerous Ethgreze Carnivorous Camellia Sinensis plants. Only those with sharp reflexes make it through their first season without losing fingers or entire hands to the deadly fast plants. Due to the danger in collecting it, this tea is famously expensive.
de: These tea buds have to be hand-plucked from the dangerous Ethgreze Carnivorous Camellia Sinensis plants. Only those with sharp reflexes make it through their first season without losing fingers or entire hands to the deadly fast plants. Due to the danger in collecting it, this tea is famously expensive.
es: Estos brotes de té tienen que ser recogidos a mano de una peligrosa planta de Ethgreze conocida como Carnívoros camellia sinensis. Sólo aquellos con los mejores reflejos pueden hacerlo, sin que esta planta, rápida y letal, les haga perder algún dedo o incluso la mano entera. Debido al peligro que supone la recolección, este té es extremadamente caro.
fr: These tea buds have to be hand-plucked from the dangerous Ethgreze Carnivorous Camellia Sinensis plants. Only those with sharp reflexes make it through their first season without losing fingers or entire hands to the deadly fast plants. Due to the danger in collecting it, this tea is famously expensive.
pt: These tea buds have to be hand-plucked from the dangerous Ethgreze Carnivorous Camellia Sinensis plants. Only those with sharp reflexes make it through their first season without losing fingers or entire hands to the deadly fast plants. Due to the danger in collecting it, this tea is famously expensive.
ru: Эти чайные бутоны собираются вручную с опасных хищных растений Камелии китайской на Ethgreze. Лишь обладающие молниеносными рефлексами могут пережить свой первый сезон, не став беспалыми или безрукими инвалидами. В связи с сопряжённой с его добычей опасностью этот чай продаётся за огромные деньги.
zh: 这些茶叶必须从危险的Ethgreze Carnivorous Camellia Sinensis植株上手工摘取。只有那些反应弧最短的人才能不因这些迅速而致命的植物丢掉手指或是整只手地完成他们地第一个工作季度。由于采摘它的巨大危险，这种茶极为昂贵。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: All (Surface) except High Tech

A lightweight robust unit that can be deployed to provide shelter, basic food and air for up to a month in the event of structural failure or meteor impacts on habited builds. They are also used by survey teams on long expeditions.

Consumido por: Todos (superficie) excepto Alta Tecnología

Una unidad ligera y robusta que puede ser desplegada para ofrecer refugio, comida básica y aire hasta casi un mes en caso de daños estructurales o impactos de meteoritos en edificios habitados. También son muy usados por los equipos de vigilancia en largas expediciones.

Лёгкий и прочный жилой модуль с запасом еды и воздуха на один месяц. Может служить временным убежищем в случае обрушения строения или попадания метеорита в жилые здания. Также используется командами исследователей на длительных экспедициях.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：高科技之外所有 (地面)

一个轻而结实的单元，在建筑崩溃或陨石命中有人居住的建筑时能被部署以提供庇护所，供应一个月的基本食物与空气。它们也被调查队在远征中使用。

Consumed by: High Tech

These customised manifolds are used to combine plasmas and gases from multiple sources into a single element., These can be found at Somerville Station in the Kharpulo system.

消耗于高科技

这些定制的管道能将多个来源的等离子体和气体结合为同一束。它们可在Kharpulo星系的Somerville Station中买到。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All except Agricultural and Industrial

Cartridges for ’chefs’ (cheap 3D food printers). These dehydrated components are reconstituted into a variety of shapes using a 3D printing technique. Components are mixed with water and flavourings as they are printed, according to the desired food item template for colour, texture and taste. ’Burgers’ and ’Hotdogs’ are common standard template choices for most chefs.
de:

Components are mixed with water and flavourings as they are printed, according to the desired food item template for colour, texture and taste. ’Burgers’ and ’Hotdogs’ are common standard template choices for most chefs.

Producido por: Industrial
Consumido por: Todos, excepto Agrícola e Industrial

Cartuchos para ’chefs’ (baratas impresoras 3D de alimentos). Estos componentes deshidratados se reconstituyen en una gran variedad de formas utilizando una técnica de impresión 3D. Los componentes se mezclan con agua y aromas a medida que se imprimen, de acuerdo a la plantilla del alimento deseado, para darle el color, la textura y el sabor adecuados. Las ’hamburguesas’ y los ’perritos calientes’ son plantillas básicas bastante populares en la mayoría de los ’chefs’.

Брикеты для «поваров» (дешёвых пищевых 3D-принтеров). Обезвоженным ингредиентам придаются различные формы с помощью технологии 3D-печати. Во время печати ингредиенты смешиваются с водой и ароматизаторами в соответствии с выбранным шаблоном, чтобы конечный продукт имел необходимый цвет, текстуру и вкус. Чаще всего поварам приходится печатать «бургеры» и «хот-доги».
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：农业与工业之外所有

“厨师” (廉价的3D食物打印机) 使用的食物盒。这些脱水的成分会通过一种3D打印技术被重组为各种形状。这些成分会在被打印时根据需要的食物模板的颜色，口感和味道与水和调味剂混合。对许多厨师来说“汉堡”和“热狗”是最常见的标准模板选项。

column2: Fossilised fragments from an unidentified life form. Inquisitive minds will revel at the chance to analyse and possess one of our galaxy’s ancestral occupants.
de: Fossilised fragments from an unidentified life form. Inquisitive minds will revel at the chance to analyse and possess one of our galaxy’s ancestral occupants.
es: Fragmentos fosilizados de una forma de vida no identificada. Las mentes curiosas se alegrarán de la oportunidad de analizar y estudiar a uno de los ocupantes más ancestrales de la galaxia.
fr: Fossilised fragments from an unidentified life form. Inquisitive minds will revel at the chance to analyse and possess one of our galaxy’s ancestral occupants.
pt: Fossilised fragments from an unidentified life form. Inquisitive minds will revel at the chance to analyse and possess one of our galaxy’s ancestral occupants.
ru: Окаменевшие фрагменты останков неизвестной формы жизни. Любопытный ум не упустит возможности исследовать останки тех, кто ранее населял нашу галактику, и завладеть ими.
zh: 一种不明生命形式的化石碎片。善于钻研的人们会因这分析和拥有我们银河系古老原住民的机会而狂喜不已。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: All

A diverse selection of plant-based produce, usually grown in bulk on outdoor worlds, used by the luxury food industry and for direct consumption by the population.
de:
Produktion: Landwirtschaft
Nachfrage: Alle

Eine Auswahl pflanzlicher Lebensmittelprodukte, die üblicherweise in großen Mengen auf Freiluftwelten angebaut werden und von der Luxuslebensmittelindustrie und von der Bevölkerung für den direkten Verzehr verwendet werden kann.
es:
Producido por: Agrícola
Consumido por: Todos

Una diversa selección de productos recogidos de árboles y plantas que, generalmente, se cultivan en mundos terrestres. Usados por la industria de alimentos de lujo y para su consumo directo entre la población.
fr:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: All

A diverse selection of plant-based produce, usually grown in bulk on outdoor worlds, used by the luxury food industry and for direct consumption by the population.
pt:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: All

A diverse selection of plant-based produce, usually grown in bulk on outdoor worlds, used by the luxury food industry and for direct consumption by the population.
ru:
Производится: Сельско-хозяйственная
Потребляется: Всеми

Разнообразная сельскохозяйственная продукция, выращиваемая в пленэрных мирах. Потребляется как в исходном виде, так и в составе производимых большими компаниями дорогих блюд.
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：所有

各种植物产品，通常在露天环境下大量种植，用于奢侈食品加工业与满足人口直接需求。

column2: A range of infusions from indigenous plants and herbs that produce highly effective medicines rivalling or exceeding the best synthetics. Ill-informed combinations have been known to be instantly fatal
de: A range of infusions from indigenous plants and herbs that produce highly effective medicines rivalling or exceeding the best synthetics. Ill-informed combinations have been known to be instantly fatal
es: Una variedad de infusiones de hierbas y plantas indígenas que producen medicinas altamente efectivas y que rivalizan con las mejores sintéticas, llegando incluso a superarlas. Se sabe que en determinadas combinaciones puede resultar letal al instante.
fr: A range of infusions from indigenous plants and herbs that produce highly effective medicines rivalling or exceeding the best synthetics. Ill-informed combinations have been known to be instantly fatal
pt: A range of infusions from indigenous plants and herbs that produce highly effective medicines rivalling or exceeding the best synthetics. Ill-informed combinations have been known to be instantly fatal
ru: Набор чаёв из местных растений и трав, чьи лекарственные свойства сравнимы или даже превосходят таковые у лучших синтетических лекарств. Тем не менее, их применение вслепую часто влечёт за собой мгновенный летальный исход.
zh: 一系列用于冲泡的当地植物和草药，能制造出药效极强的物质，其性能足以匹敌乃至超越最好的合成化学品。错误的组合会瞬间杀死一个人。

column2: A where’s where and what’s what of the Milky Way. This guide highlights the galaxy’s top destinations and hotspots.
de: A where’s where and what’s what of the Milky Way. This guide highlights the galaxy’s top destinations and hotspots.
es: Manual del trotamundos de la Vía Láctea. Esta guía describe los destinos más populares e interesantes de la galaxia.
fr: A where’s where and what’s what of the Milky Way. This guide highlights the galaxy’s top destinations and hotspots.
pt: A where’s where and what’s what of the Milky Way. This guide highlights the galaxy’s top destinations and hotspots.
ru: Из него вы узнаете, что и где можно найти на Млечном пути. В путеводителе указаны самые интересные и посещаемые места галактики.
zh: 银河系的全面旅行指南。这份指南突出介绍了银河系最热门的景点和打卡点。

column2:
Produced by: Extraction
Consumed by: High Tech and Refinery

Gallite: chemical formula CuGaS2. Gallium ore. Named for its high gallium content and is widely extracted at refineries.

Consumed by: High Tech and Refinery

Gallite: chemical formula CuGaS2. Gallium ore. Named for its high gallium content and is widely extracted at refineries.
es:
Producido por: Extracción
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología y Refinería

Galita, fórmula química CuGaS2, mineral del galio. Es nombrada así por su alto contenido en galio y es extensamente extraída en refinerías.
fr:
Produced by: Extraction
Consumed by: High Tech and Refinery

Gallite: chemical formula CuGaS2. Gallium ore. Named for its high gallium content and is widely extracted at refineries.

ru:
Производится: Добывающая 
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Перерабатывающая 

Галлит, химическая формула: CuGaS2. Руда галлия. Названа в честь высокого содержания галлия, часто добывается на перерабатывающих заводах.
zh:
产出于：开采
消耗于：高科技与精炼

灰镓矿，化学式CuGaS2。一种镓矿石。因其高镓含量而得名，在精炼行业中被广泛使用以提取镓。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Gallium, Ga, atomic number 31. Melting point 303K. It is a soft silvery metal at human room temperature, but melts in the human hand. It is used as a key component in semiconductors and lasers.
de:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Gallium, Ga, atomic number 31. Melting point 303K. It is a soft silvery metal at human room temperature, but melts in the human hand. It is used as a key component in semiconductors and lasers.
es:
Producido por: Refinería
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología e Industrial

Galio, Ga, número atómico 31, punto de fusión 303K. Es un metal de color plata y suave a la temperatura ambiente de una habitación, pudiendo deshacerse en la mano. Es usado como componente clave en semiconductores y láseres.
fr:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Gallium, Ga, atomic number 31. Melting point 303K. It is a soft silvery metal at human room temperature, but melts in the human hand. It is used as a key component in semiconductors and lasers.

Gallium, Ga, atomic number 31. Melting point 303K. It is a soft silvery metal at human room temperature, but melts in the human hand. It is used as a key component in semiconductors and lasers.
ru:
Производится: Перерабатывающая
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Промышленная

Галлий, Ga, атомный номер 31. Температура плавления — 303 К. Мягкий серебристый металл имеет комнатную температуру <плавления>, но тает в руках. Ключевой компонент при изготовлении полупроводников и лазеров.
zh:
产出于：精炼
消耗于：高科技与工业

镓，Ga，原子序数31，熔点303开尔文。这是一种室温下质地较软的银色金属，但在人的手中就会融化。它是半导体和激光器中的关键成分。

column2: There may be no sound in space, but Geawen Dance Dust will bring the music inside your cockpit, and inside your head. You literally won’t be able to stop dancing!
de: There may be no sound in space, but Geawen Dance Dust will bring the music inside your cockpit, and inside your head. You literally won’t be able to stop dancing!
es: There may be no sound in space, but Geawen Dance Dust will bring the music inside your cockpit, and inside your head. You literally won’t be able to stop dancing!
fr: There may be no sound in space, but Geawen Dance Dust will bring the music inside your cockpit, and inside your head. You literally won’t be able to stop dancing!
pt: There may be no sound in space, but Geawen Dance Dust will bring the music inside your cockpit, and inside your head. You literally won’t be able to stop dancing!
ru: Пусть в открытом космосе и не передаётся звук — геавенская танцевальная пыль заставит музыку зазвучать у вас в кабине и прямо в голове. Вы уже не сможете прекратить свой танец — буквально!
zh: 太空里可能没有声音，但Geawen Dance Dust会把音乐带进你的驾驶舱，带进你的脑袋。你真的会跳舞跳的停不下来！

column2: Collection of DNA and other biological samples containing valuable information for the scientific community. These banks can sometimes contain samples from extinct species which vastly increases their demand.
de: Collection of DNA and other biological samples containing valuable information for the scientific community. These banks can sometimes contain samples from extinct species which vastly increases their demand.
es: Una colección de ADN y otras muestras biológicas que contienen información valiosa para la comunidad científica. Estos bancos a veces pueden contener muestras de especies extintas que hace que sean muy demandados.
fr: Collection of DNA and other biological samples containing valuable information for the scientific community. These banks can sometimes contain samples from extinct species which vastly increases their demand.
pt: Collection of DNA and other biological samples containing valuable information for the scientific community. These banks can sometimes contain samples from extinct species which vastly increases their demand.
ru: Банк ДНК и других биологических образцов, содержащих информацию, ценную для научного сообщества. Эти банки иногда содержат образцы вымерших видов и потому пользуются высоким спросом.
zh: DNA集群和其他生物样本，对科研社区来说其中包含着很有价值的信息。这些库有时包含着已灭绝物种的样本，这大大增加了对它们的需求。

Производится: Промышленная 
Потребляется: Колонии на поверхн., Сырьевая/ Добывающая на поверхн., Военная на поверхн., Высоко-технологичная на поверхн.

Позволяет проводить базовый мониторинг и изучать геологию мира. Может быть использовано как в научных, так и в гражданских и коммерческих целях.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：殖民地 (地面)，开采 (地面)，军事 (地面)，高科技 (地面)

可以为科研，民生或商业的目的进行对整个世界的地理情况进行基本的检测与整合。

column2: Geological samples used for scientific and commercial purposes.
de: Geological samples used for scientific and commercial purposes.
es: Muestras geológicas de uso científico y comercial.
fr: Geological samples used for scientific and commercial purposes.
pt: Geological samples used for scientific and commercial purposes.
ru: Образцы породы, используемые в научных и коммерческих целях.
zh: 用于科研与商业用途的地质样本。

column2: Geras 3 A supports life in the form of large algae like plankton, whose bioluminescent digestive system excretes a complex protein that can be used in the brewing process. The resulting beer is famous for its strength, heady aroma and luminescent colour.
de: Geras 3 A supports life in the form of large algae like plankton, whose bioluminescent digestive system excretes a complex protein that can be used in the brewing process. The resulting beer is famous for its strength, heady aroma and luminescent colour.
es: Geras 3 A alberga vida en forma de grandes algas semejantes al plancton, cuyo sistema digestivo bioluminiscente excreta una compleja proteína que se emplea en el proceso de fermentación. La cerveza resultante es famosa por su cuerpo, su aroma embriagador y su color luminiscente.
fr: Geras 3 A supports life in the form of large algae like plankton, whose bioluminescent digestive system excretes a complex protein that can be used in the brewing process. The resulting beer is famous for its strength, heady aroma and luminescent colour.
pt: Geras 3 A supports life in the form of large algae like plankton, whose bioluminescent digestive system excretes a complex protein that can be used in the brewing process. The resulting beer is famous for its strength, heady aroma and luminescent colour.
ru: На Geras 3 A поддерживается жизнь в виде большого водорослеобразного планктона, чья биолюминесцентная пищеварительная система выделяет сложный протеин, пригодный для применения в брожении. Получающееся с его помощью пиво знаменито своей крепостью, крепким ароматом и эффектом свечения.
zh: Geras 3 A上生长着一种巨大的海藻状浮游生物，其生物荧光消化系统会释放一种可用于酿酒的复杂蛋白质。这样得到的啤酒因其烈度，浓烈的香气和荧光而闻名天下。

column2: Despite appearances, the species discovered on Irukama are not strictly snails. These indigenous creatures almost destroyed Irukama’s native habitat after their sole predator was culled, due to the threat it posed to human settlers. Now actively managed, the surplus stock is sold on as a delicacy. The meat from a single snail can easily fill several standard-size cargo canisters.
de: Despite appearances, the species discovered on Irukama are not strictly snails. These indigenous creatures almost destroyed Irukama’s native habitat after their sole predator was culled, due to the threat it posed to human settlers. Now actively managed, the surplus stock is sold on as a delicacy. The meat from a single snail can easily fill several standard-size cargo canisters.
es: A pesar de las apariencias, las especies descubiertas en Ikurama no son exactamente caracoles. Estas criaturas autóctonas casi destruyen el hábitat nativo después de que su único depredador fuese exterminado por la amenaza que representaba a los colonizadores humanos. Ahora son activamente controlados y los excedentes se venden como un manjar. La carne de un solo caracol fácilmente puede llenar varios contenedores de carga estándar.
fr: Despite appearances, the species discovered on Irukama are not strictly snails. These indigenous creatures almost destroyed Irukama’s native habitat after their sole predator was culled, due to the threat it posed to human settlers. Now actively managed, the surplus stock is sold on as a delicacy. The meat from a single snail can easily fill several standard-size cargo canisters.
pt: Despite appearances, the species discovered on Irukama are not strictly snails. These indigenous creatures almost destroyed Irukama’s native habitat after their sole predator was culled, due to the threat it posed to human settlers. Now actively managed, the surplus stock is sold on as a delicacy. The meat from a single snail can easily fill several standard-size cargo canisters.
ru: Несмотря на внешний вид этих существ, впервые обнаруженных на Ирукаме, их нельзя назвать традиционными улитками. В своё время этим коренным представителям фауны планеты почти удалось уничтожить все остальные виды Ирукамы. Причиной этому стало уничтожение людьми охотящихся на улиток хищников, так как те представляли угрозу для людей-поселенцев. Сейчас за этим видом ведётся пристальное наблюдение, излишки продаются как деликатес. Мяса одной улитки хватит, чтобы заполнить несколько стандартных грузовых контейнеров.
zh: 尽管看上去很像，但这些在Irukama发现的生物严格来说并不是蜗牛。在人类因受到威胁而灭绝了它们唯一的捕食者后，这些当地生物几乎摧毁了Irukama的原生栖息地。现在它们被积极管理，而多余的存货则作为佳肴销售出去。一只蜗牛产出的肉就能轻易装满数个标准尺寸货箱。

column2: This hardy beast of burden is now found throughout human space, especially on the emerging worlds of the outer rim, but naturally bred Verrix are very rare and highly prized.
de: This hardy beast of burden is now found throughout human space, especially on the emerging worlds of the outer rim, but naturally bred Verrix are very rare and highly prized.
es: Esta resistente bestia de carga puede ser encontrada fácilmente a lo largo de todo el espacio humano, especialmente en mundos emergentes del borde exterior. Hay verrixes criados de forma natural, pero son muy raros y altamente cotizados.
fr: This hardy beast of burden is now found throughout human space, especially on the emerging worlds of the outer rim, but naturally bred Verrix are very rare and highly prized.
pt: This hardy beast of burden is now found throughout human space, especially on the emerging worlds of the outer rim, but naturally bred Verrix are very rare and highly prized.
ru: Этих выносливых вьючных зверей можно найти в человеческом космосе — особенно на развивающихся планетах внешнего рубежа. Дикие же верриксы чрезвычайно редки и ценятся очень высоко.
zh: 这种吃苦耐劳的牲口现在在有人居住的地方就总能找到，尤其是那些正在发展的外围世界，但天然繁殖的Verrix是很稀有并很受重视的。

column2: Leave your own personal mark with these highly customisable weapons, a speciality of the Gilya system. Leave no doubt about who put your victim to rest when using a Gilya Signature weapon. Illegal but highly prized in many jurisdictions. Being disarmed of your signature weapon is considered the greatest of humiliations.
de: Leave your own personal mark with these highly customisable weapons, a speciality of the Gilya system. Leave no doubt about who put your victim to rest when using a Gilya Signature weapon. Illegal but highly prized in many jurisdictions. Being disarmed of your signature weapon is considered the greatest of humiliations.
es: Deje constancia y establezca su propia marca personal con estas armas altamente personalizables, una especialidad del sistema Gilya. No deje ninguna duda al respecto sobre quién despachó a su víctima cuando utilice un arma marca Gilya. Ilegales, pero muy apreciadas en muchas jurisdicciones. Si su arma no tiene firma personal, se considera la mayor de las humillaciones.
fr: Leave your own personal mark with these highly customisable weapons, a speciality of the Gilya system. Leave no doubt about who put your victim to rest when using a Gilya Signature weapon. Illegal but highly prized in many jurisdictions. Being disarmed of your signature weapon is considered the greatest of humiliations.
pt: Leave your own personal mark with these highly customisable weapons, a speciality of the Gilya system. Leave no doubt about who put your victim to rest when using a Gilya Signature weapon. Illegal but highly prized in many jurisdictions. Being disarmed of your signature weapon is considered the greatest of humiliations.
ru: Оставьте свой след с помощью настраиваемого оружия, изготавливаемого в этой системе. Если вы используете именное оружие из системы Gilya, то ни у кого не возникнет вопросов о личности убийцы. Во многих юрисдикциях объявлено вне закона, но очень высоко ценится. Но учтите, что потеря именного оружия — это большой позор.
zh: 用这些高度自定义的武器，Gilya星系的一种特产来留下你的个人标志吧。使用一把Gilya Signature weapon，能让任何人都一眼看出是谁杀死了受害者。在许多法域中都非法但价值颇高。持你的signature weapon时被缴械被视为是世上最大的耻辱。

column2:
Produced by: Extraction and Refinery
Consumed by: All except Agri

Refinery, Extraction and Military, Gold, Au, atomic number 79. Melting point 1337K. A valuable precious metal, and because it is the most resistant metal to corrosion, is widely used in jewellery and luxury goods and for contact pads in electronics.
de:
Produktion: Förderung und Raffinerie
Nachfrage: Alle außer Raffinerie, Förderung und Militär

Gold: Elementsymbol Au, Ordnungszahl 79, Schmelzpunkt 1337 K. Das korrosionsbeständigste aller Edelmetalle findet weithin Verwendung in der Herstellung von Schmuck- und Luxusgütern sowie der Produktion elektronischer Kontaktstellen.
es:
Producido por: Extracción y Refinería
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología, Industrial y Terraformación.

Oro, Au, número atómico 79, punto de fusión 1.337K. Es un valioso metal precioso, además de ser el más resistente a la corrosión. Es ampliamente utilizado en joyería, bienes de lujo y contactos electrónicos.
fr:
Produced by: Extraction and Refinery
Consumed by: All except Agri

Refinery, Extraction and Military, Gold, Au, atomic number 79. Melting point 1337K. A valuable precious metal, and because it is the most resistant metal to corrosion, is widely used in jewellery and luxury goods and for contact pads in electronics.

Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная, Промышленная, Терраформинговая и Туристическая

Атомный номер 79. Температура плавления 1337 К. Ценный драгоценный металл. Ввиду своей исключительной стойкости к коррозии часто используется в украшениях и предметах роскоши, а также в контактных площадках электроники.
zh:
产出于：开采与精炼
消耗于：农业，精炼，开采，军事之外所有

金，Au，原子序数79，熔点1337开尔文。一种高价值贵金属，也是最抗腐蚀的金属，在珠宝与奢侈品中以及电子元件的接触垫中广泛使用。

column2: This once traditional coffee substitute leapt to fame when the Emperor Hengist Duval gave it his seal of approval.
de: This once traditional coffee substitute leapt to fame when the Emperor Hengist Duval gave it his seal of approval.
es: Este sustituto del café tradicional saltó a la fama cuando el emperador Hengist Duval le dio su sello de aprobación.
fr: This once traditional coffee substitute leapt to fame when the Emperor Hengist Duval gave it his seal of approval.
pt: This once traditional coffee substitute leapt to fame when the Emperor Hengist Duval gave it his seal of approval.

zh: 这种曾经传统的咖啡替代品在皇帝Hengist Duval给予其官方批准后一夜成名。

zh: 钙镁硅石是一种蓝绿色的岛状硅酸盐矿物，因其被从不同角度观赏时呈现出不同颜色而闻名。

column2: Used by Grom’s supporters to fortify by delivering from the desired control system. You can oppose Grom by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This item will be out of date at the end of the Powerplay week.
de: Used by Grom’s supporters to fortify by delivering from the desired control system. You can oppose Grom by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This item will be out of date at the end of the Powerplay week.

ru: Используется сторонниками Грома для укрепления путем доставки из желаемой системы управления. Вы можете противостоять Грому, перехватив и доставив этот груз в одну из ваших систем управления. В противном случае он не представляет никакой ценности. Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Grom的支持者通过将其从已占据的目标星系运输出来以加强控制。你可以通过拦截它将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Grom，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: You can oppose Grom by intercepting this cargo of Military Supplies and delivering it to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This item will be out of date at the end of the Powerplay week.

zh: 你可以通过拦截这件军需货物并将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Grom，在此之外它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Hafnium 178m2, Hf, atomic number 72. This nuclear isomer has the potential to unleash enormous quantities of gamma radiation, making it an excellent ingredient for use in devastating weapons of mass destruction. As a result Hafnium 178 is a highly controlled substance that is universally illegal to own without special dispensation.
de: Hafnium 178m2, Hf, atomic number 72. This nuclear isomer has the potential to unleash enormous quantities of gamma radiation, making it an excellent ingredient for use in devastating weapons of mass destruction. As a result Hafnium 178 is a highly controlled substance that is universally illegal to own without special dispensation.
es: Hafnio 178m2, Hf, número atómico 72. Este isómero nuclear tiene el potencial de liberar enormes cantidades de radiación gamma, por lo que es un excelente ingrediente para su uso en devastadoras armas de destrucción masiva. Como resultado, el hafnio 178 es una sustancia altamente controlada y es completamente ilegal poseerla sin un permiso especial.
fr: Hafnium 178m2, Hf, atomic number 72. This nuclear isomer has the potential to unleash enormous quantities of gamma radiation, making it an excellent ingredient for use in devastating weapons of mass destruction. As a result Hafnium 178 is a highly controlled substance that is universally illegal to own without special dispensation.
pt: Hafnium 178m2, Hf, atomic number 72. This nuclear isomer has the potential to unleash enormous quantities of gamma radiation, making it an excellent ingredient for use in devastating weapons of mass destruction. As a result Hafnium 178 is a highly controlled substance that is universally illegal to own without special dispensation.
ru: Гафний-178m2 (Hf), атомный номер 72. Данный ядерный изомер способен выделять невероятно мощное гамма-излучение, что делает его отличным компонентом высокоэффективного оружия массового поражения. В связи с этим оборот Гафния-178 находится под очень жёстким контролем. Владение им без особого разрешения совершенно незаконно.
zh: 铪-178m2，Hf，原子序数72。这种原子同分异构体有释放巨量伽马射线的能力，使其成为了大规模杀伤性武器的理想原料。这导致铪-178是受到高度管控的物质，在没有特许的情况下持有它普遍是非法的。

column2: Brewed over a low heat for days, this tea is comprised of fine mineral shavings, rather than traditional leaves. This mineral based tea is high in salts and nutritious metals. Over consumption of this has been known to temporarily cause the drinker’s skin to take a metallic hue.
de: Brewed over a low heat for days, this tea is comprised of fine mineral shavings, rather than traditional leaves. This mineral based tea is high in salts and nutritious metals. Over consumption of this has been known to temporarily cause the drinker’s skin to take a metallic hue.
es: Fermentada a fuego lento durante días, este té está formado por finas virutas de mineral en lugar de usar las hojas tradicionales. Este té de base mineral tiene un alto contenido de sales y metales nutritivos. Su abuso puede provocar que la piel adquiera temporalmente un tono metálico.
fr: Brewed over a low heat for days, this tea is comprised of fine mineral shavings, rather than traditional leaves. This mineral based tea is high in salts and nutritious metals. Over consumption of this has been known to temporarily cause the drinker’s skin to take a metallic hue.
pt: Brewed over a low heat for days, this tea is comprised of fine mineral shavings, rather than traditional leaves. This mineral based tea is high in salts and nutritious metals. Over consumption of this has been known to temporarily cause the drinker’s skin to take a metallic hue.
ru: Этот чай, завариваемый в течение нескольких дней при малом нагреве, настаивается на тонких минеральных стружках, а не на традиционных листьях. Он богат солями и питательными металлами. У того, кто пьёт такой чай, кожа временно принимает металлический оттенок.
zh: 经过多日低温慢煮，这种茶由细密的矿物碎屑而非传统茶叶组成。这种矿物茶富含盐与营养金属。大量饮用会导致饮用者的皮肤呈现一种金属光泽。

column2: Based on a secret 24th Century recipe taken from the log of one Captain Smolenski, Harma Silver Sea Rum has been developed by blending a range of rare alcohols to create a beverage any corsair would be proud of. The Harma Silver Cartel, who manufacture and distribute the potent brew, enjoy the controversy their product has gleaned after it became a favourite among pirate gangs across the galaxy.
de: Based on a secret 24th Century recipe taken from the log of one Captain Smolenski, Harma Silver Sea Rum has been developed by blending a range of rare alcohols to create a beverage any corsair would be proud of. The Harma Silver Cartel, who manufacture and distribute the potent brew, enjoy the controversy their product has gleaned after it became a favourite among pirate gangs across the galaxy.
es: El ron Harma Silver Sea proviene de una receta secreta del siglo XXIV que se encontró en el diario de un tal capitán Smolenski. Se obtiene mezclando una serie de alcoholes poco comunes y el resultado es una bebida de la que podría enorgullecerse cualquier corsario. A Harma Silver Cartel, encargada de elaborar y distribuir el potente brebaje, le encanta la controversia que ha generado su producto tras convertirse en el favorito de numerosas bandas de piratas de la galaxia.
fr: Based on a secret 24th Century recipe taken from the log of one Captain Smolenski, Harma Silver Sea Rum has been developed by blending a range of rare alcohols to create a beverage any corsair would be proud of. The Harma Silver Cartel, who manufacture and distribute the potent brew, enjoy the controversy their product has gleaned after it became a favourite among pirate gangs across the galaxy.
pt: Based on a secret 24th Century recipe taken from the log of one Captain Smolenski, Harma Silver Sea Rum has been developed by blending a range of rare alcohols to create a beverage any corsair would be proud of. The Harma Silver Cartel, who manufacture and distribute the potent brew, enjoy the controversy their product has gleaned after it became a favourite among pirate gangs across the galaxy.
ru: Основанные на тайном рецепте XXIV века, найденном в бортовом журнале некоего капитана Смоленского, ром Harma Silver Sea был создан путём смешивания нескольких редких спиртов для получения напитка, которым не побрезговал бы самый гордый корсар. Картель Harma Silver, который производит и распространяет этот великолепный напиток, получил бесплатную рекламу после того, как их продукт полюбился пиратам по всей галактике.
zh: Harma Silver Sea Rum基于一个来自Captain Smolenski的24世纪秘密配方，可以通过混合一系列稀有酒品来得到这种会让任何海盗引以为傲的饮料。负责生产和分销这种强劲饮料的The Harma Silver Cartel正享受着在这成为海盗帮派最爱的饮料后减缓生产导致的争议。

column2: Re-live your dreams! This device can record, consolidate and replay the neural activity of dreams, allowing you to re-experience them whenever you desire, or even share your dreams with friends!
de: Re-live your dreams! This device can record, consolidate and replay the neural activity of dreams, allowing you to re-experience them whenever you desire, or even share your dreams with friends!
es: ¡Reviva sus sueños! Este dispositivo puede grabar, consolidar y reproducir la actividad neuronal de sus sueños permitiéndole revivir las experiencias en el momento que quiera. ¡E incluso compartirlos con sus amigos!
fr: Re-live your dreams! This device can record, consolidate and replay the neural activity of dreams, allowing you to re-experience them whenever you desire, or even share your dreams with friends!
pt: Re-live your dreams! This device can record, consolidate and replay the neural activity of dreams, allowing you to re-experience them whenever you desire, or even share your dreams with friends!
ru: Переживите свои сны заново! Это устройство может записывать нейронную деятельность во время сна и воспроизводить её, позволяя вам при желании заново просматривать свои сны и даже делиться ими с друзьями!
zh: 再做一遍你的梦吧！这台设备可以记录，合并与重播梦中的神经活动，让你随时随地重新体验它们，甚至是与朋友分享你的梦境！

Используемые в опасных условиях (в том числе и в условиях пониженного давления) костюмы и запасные детали к ним. Оснащены системой очистки воздуха, системой жизнеобеспечения, системой мониторинга признаков жизни, автоматическими медсистемами и мультиканальным интерфейсом связи.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：工业，精炼，开采，军事

适合给人类在真空等危险环境下使用，附带备件。配备了大气过滤与生命维持，生理信号监测，自动医疗系统以及一个多频道通信接口。
