消耗于：精炼

基因改造过的微生物，能将特定元素从粉碎的矿石中分离出来。产出于高科技世界，它们的名字源于它们所取代的，历史上用于多种矿石冶炼的熔炉。

column2: Oysters have been one of the more successful adaptors to other worlds with their rapid genetic modification. Due to the chemicals in the water, the oysters of Helvetitj produce a range of vividly coloured but natural pearls which are in high in demand for decorative purposes, but are valued as a food source as well.
de: Oysters have been one of the more successful adaptors to other worlds with their rapid genetic modification. Due to the chemicals in the water, the oysters of Helvetitj produce a range of vividly coloured but natural pearls which are in high in demand for decorative purposes, but are valued as a food source as well.
es: Las ostras han sido uno de los seres vivos que mejor se han adaptado a otros mundos gracias a su rápida modificación genética. Debido a las sustancias químicas presentes en el agua, las ostras de Helvetitj producen una gama de colores vivos naturales que las hace ser muy demandadas para fines decorativos.
fr: Oysters have been one of the more successful adaptors to other worlds with their rapid genetic modification. Due to the chemicals in the water, the oysters of Helvetitj produce a range of vividly coloured but natural pearls which are in high in demand for decorative purposes, but are valued as a food source as well.
pt: Oysters have been one of the more successful adaptors to other worlds with their rapid genetic modification. Due to the chemicals in the water, the oysters of Helvetitj produce a range of vividly coloured but natural pearls which are in high in demand for decorative purposes, but are valued as a food source as well.
ru: Благодаря своей поразительной способности к быстрой генетической адаптации устрицы стали одними из самых успешных «колонистов». Из-за наличия в водах Helvetitj определённых химикатов жемчуг местных устриц может быть окрашен в ряд ярких цветов. Этот жемчуг очень часто используется в декоративных целях, в то время как устрицы идут в пищу.
zh: 牡蛎由于其迅速的基因变化一直是适应异星环境最成功的物种之一。由于水中的化学物质，Helvetiji的牡蛎会产生一系列色彩鲜艳的天然珍珠，它们因其装饰价值而需求极大，但也被作为一种食物来源使用。

column2: A wide range of strong-tasting exotic meats native to HIP 10175, famed for its hunting and natural environment. One commonality between all the available species is a strange spicy flavour. This is believed to be due to the rich local ecosystem. Restricted trade has brought high prices.
de: A wide range of strong-tasting exotic meats native to HIP 10175, famed for its hunting and natural environment. One commonality between all the available species is a strange spicy flavour. This is believed to be due to the rich local ecosystem. Restricted trade has brought high prices.
es: Una amplia variedad de carnes exóticas de fuerte sabor, nativas del sistema HIP 10175, el cual es famoso por sus parajes naturales ideales para la caza. Un elemento común en todas las especies es su extraño sabor picante. Se cree que se debe al rico ecosistema local. Las restricciones de su comercio han dado lugar a precios elevados.
fr: A wide range of strong-tasting exotic meats native to HIP 10175, famed for its hunting and natural environment. One commonality between all the available species is a strange spicy flavour. This is believed to be due to the rich local ecosystem. Restricted trade has brought high prices.
pt: A wide range of strong-tasting exotic meats native to HIP 10175, famed for its hunting and natural environment. One commonality between all the available species is a strange spicy flavour. This is believed to be due to the rich local ecosystem. Restricted trade has brought high prices.
ru: Различные виды экзотического мяса с сильным вкусом с HIP 10175, который славится своими охотниками и окружающей средой. Единственное, что объединяет все доступные виды, — это странный островатый привкус. Считается, что это результат воздействия насыщенной местной экосистемы. Торговля мясом ограничена, из-за этого цены на него очень высоки.
zh: 来自HIP 10175本地动物的一系列风味浓郁的奇异肉类，因其狩猎与自然环境而闻名。所有这些肉的一个共同点是一种奇怪的辣味，据说是当地富饶的生态系统导致的。由于销售量稀少导致这种肉价格奇高。

column2: Though there is no genetic link between the huge creatures of HIP 41181 and the now-extinct squid once found on ancient Earth, the evolutionary similarities are remarkable. Perhaps they share some ancient space-faring ancestor. There was much protesting at the use of these animals as food. Claims of sentience still remain high on the agenda for those trying to stamp out the trade.
de: Though there is no genetic link between the huge creatures of HIP 41181 and the now-extinct squid once found on ancient Earth, the evolutionary similarities are remarkable. Perhaps they share some ancient space-faring ancestor. There was much protesting at the use of these animals as food. Claims of sentience still remain high on the agenda for those trying to stamp out the trade.
es: Aunque no existe un vínculo genético entre estas enormes criaturas de HIP 41181 y el calamar extinto que habitó en la vieja Tierra, las similitudes evolutivas son notables. Tal vez compartan un antiguo ancestro que viajara por el espacio. Se han producido muchas protestas por el uso de estos animales como alimento y aún hay quienes siguen intentando acabar con su comercio al considerarlos inteligentes.
fr: Though there is no genetic link between the huge creatures of HIP 41181 and the now-extinct squid once found on ancient Earth, the evolutionary similarities are remarkable. Perhaps they share some ancient space-faring ancestor. There was much protesting at the use of these animals as food. Claims of sentience still remain high on the agenda for those trying to stamp out the trade.
pt: Though there is no genetic link between the huge creatures of HIP 41181 and the now-extinct squid once found on ancient Earth, the evolutionary similarities are remarkable. Perhaps they share some ancient space-faring ancestor. There was much protesting at the use of these animals as food. Claims of sentience still remain high on the agenda for those trying to stamp out the trade.
ru: Хотя и не существует прямой генетической связи между огромными кальмарами из HIP 41181 и туперь уже вымершими кальмарами с древней Земли, нельзя отрицать их эволюционные сходства. Возможно, у них был один и тот же предок - некий межгалактический путешественник. Идея использовать их в пищу была встречена в штыки, многие протестовали против этого. Выступающие против торговли кальмарами даже сейчас приводят доводы о том, что эти существа могут быть разумными.
zh: 尽管HIP 41181上那些巨型生物和古代地球上现已灭绝的鱿鱼没有基因联系，它们却在进化上惊人地相似。或许它们有着同样的，进行过太空旅行的祖先。许多人都抗议将这种动物当作食物。对于那些试图阻止贸易的人来说，声称其是知性生物是他们的头等大事。

column2: Swarm is the codename of the weaponised form of the tiny but lethally poisonous biting insects native to HIP 118311. Manipulated by a control field, the weapons can be targeted onto enemy positions using a remote electromagnetic beam, then unleashed to wreak chaos and death on enemy ranks. The weapon’s trademark buzzing quickly made it a favourite with crime syndicates, favoured for intimidation and enforcement purposes. Banned in most jurisdictions.
de: Swarm is the codename of the weaponised form of the tiny but lethally poisonous biting insects native to HIP 118311. Manipulated by a control field, the weapons can be targeted onto enemy positions using a remote electromagnetic beam, then unleashed to wreak chaos and death on enemy ranks. The weapon’s trademark buzzing quickly made it a favourite with crime syndicates, favoured for intimidation and enforcement purposes. Banned in most jurisdictions.
es: SWARM es el nombre en clave de la versión armamentística de unos minúsculos, pero letales, insectos venenosos nativos del sistema HIP 118311. Un enjambre de cientos de estos peligrosos insectos, manipulado remotamente por un campo de control, puede ser utilizado como arma biológica para liberarse entre las filas enemigas, causando el caos y la muerte. El característico zumbido de un enjambre SWARM se convirtió rápidamente en algo usado por las mafias para la intimidación. Es ilegal en muchas jurisdicciones.
fr: Swarm is the codename of the weaponised form of the tiny but lethally poisonous biting insects native to HIP 118311. Manipulated by a control field, the weapons can be targeted onto enemy positions using a remote electromagnetic beam, then unleashed to wreak chaos and death on enemy ranks. The weapon’s trademark buzzing quickly made it a favourite with crime syndicates, favoured for intimidation and enforcement purposes. Banned in most jurisdictions.
pt: Swarm is the codename of the weaponised form of the tiny but lethally poisonous biting insects native to HIP 118311. Manipulated by a control field, the weapons can be targeted onto enemy positions using a remote electromagnetic beam, then unleashed to wreak chaos and death on enemy ranks. The weapon’s trademark buzzing quickly made it a favourite with crime syndicates, favoured for intimidation and enforcement purposes. Banned in most jurisdictions.
ru: РОЙ — это кодовое название используемого в военных целях вида маленьких, но смертельно опасных кусачих насекомых из системы HIP 118311. Управление производится с помощью контролирующего поля, посредством электромагнитного луча само оружие может быть направлено на позиции врага, где оно будет сеять хаос и смерть среди живой силы противника. Характерный жужжащий звук понравился преступным синдикатам, которые используют его для устрашения и достижения своих целей. Объявлен вне закона в большинстве юрисдикций.
zh: “虫群”是HIP 118311当地微小但有着致命毒性的咬人昆虫武器化后的代号。通过一种控制场操纵，这种武器可以被一束电磁波束导向敌人位置，然后释放以在敌方阵地造成混乱和伤亡。这种武器标志性的嗡嗡声很快让它成为了犯罪组织的最爱，多用于威慑和处决用途。在大多数法域是非法的。

column2: The high phosphorous content of this powerful pesticide is highly effective, but can cause a number of highly dangerous side effects. This has led to some governments classifying it as a chemical weapon, and many independent agricultural worlds taking legal action against the producer after cattle and workers have been left maimed.
de: The high phosphorous content of this powerful pesticide is highly effective, but can cause a number of highly dangerous side effects. This has led to some governments classifying it as a chemical weapon, and many independent agricultural worlds taking legal action against the producer after cattle and workers have been left maimed.
es: El alto contenido de organofosfatos de este potente pesticida es muy eficaz, pero puede causar una serie de efectos secundarios muy peligrosos. Esto ha llevado a algunos gobiernos a clasificarlo como armamento químico y muchos mundos agrícolas independientes están emprendiendo acciones legales contra el productor tras padecer mutilaciones en ganado y trabajadores.
fr: The high phosphorous content of this powerful pesticide is highly effective, but can cause a number of highly dangerous side effects. This has led to some governments classifying it as a chemical weapon, and many independent agricultural worlds taking legal action against the producer after cattle and workers have been left maimed.
pt: The high phosphorous content of this powerful pesticide is highly effective, but can cause a number of highly dangerous side effects. This has led to some governments classifying it as a chemical weapon, and many independent agricultural worlds taking legal action against the producer after cattle and workers have been left maimed.
ru: Высокое содержание фосфора в этом мощном пестициде делает его высокоэффективным, но притом вызывает целый ряд побочных эффектов. В связи с этим ряд правительств классифицировал препарат как химическое оружие, и многие независимые сельскохозяйственные планеты подали иски на производителя за искалечение скота и работников.
zh: 这种高磷含量的杀虫剂相当高效，但会造成一系列危险的副作用。这导致有些政府将其归类为化学武器，而很多独立农业世界在牲口和工人因此受伤后对其生产者采取了法律行动。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

HN shock mounts absorb vibration and impacts to stabilise the mounted device.
de:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

HN shock mounts absorb vibration and impacts to stabilise the mounted device.
es:
Producido por: Industrial
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología y Militar

Las suspensiones HN absorben la vibración y los impactos para estabilizar el dispositivo que las equipe.
fr:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

HN shock mounts absorb vibration and impacts to stabilise the mounted device.
pt:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

HN shock mounts absorb vibration and impacts to stabilise the mounted device.
ru: Разрядная установка HN поглощает вибрацию и удары, стабилизируя установленное устройство.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：高科技与军事

HN shock mounts能吸收震动和冲击以稳定安装在其上的设备。

column2: The finest blades money can buy. Putting art into death, forged from the purest alloys and available in a range of traditional and modern styles. Ceremonial and combat blades are available.
de: The finest blades money can buy. Putting art into death, forged from the purest alloys and available in a range of traditional and modern styles. Ceremonial and combat blades are available.
es: Las mejores espadas que el dinero puede comprar. Forjadas a partir de las aleaciones más puras y disponibles en una gran variedad de estilos, desde más tradicionales a más modernas, convirtiendo la muerte en un arte. También disponibles en modelos ceremoniales y de combate.
fr: The finest blades money can buy. Putting art into death, forged from the purest alloys and available in a range of traditional and modern styles. Ceremonial and combat blades are available.
pt: The finest blades money can buy. Putting art into death, forged from the purest alloys and available in a range of traditional and modern styles. Ceremonial and combat blades are available.
ru: Лучшие клинки на рынке. Изготовленные из лучших сплавов, эти клинки могут быть выполнены в традиционном или современном стиле. Покажите своё искусство убийцы. В продаже имеются церемониальные и боевые клинки.
zh: 用钱能买到的最好的刀。变死亡为艺术，用最纯净的合金锻成，多种传统与现代风格可选。仪式性和作战用刀具均有售。

column2: Originally created to be used in a religious ceremony, wherein an apostate is purified through forced confession, then repentance for their sins. The sect was soon infiltrated by corporate agents, and the psychoactive compound identified. The only secrets that have not been revealed by this drug are the ingredients for creating it, and the fate of the religious sect that discovered it.
de: Originally created to be used in a religious ceremony, wherein an apostate is purified through forced confession, then repentance for their sins. The sect was soon infiltrated by corporate agents, and the psychoactive compound identified. The only secrets that have not been revealed by this drug are the ingredients for creating it, and the fate of the religious sect that discovered it.
es: Originalmente creadas para ser utilizadas en una ceremonia religiosa, en la que un apóstata es purificado mediante la confesión forzosa y el arrepentimiento por sus pecados. Agentes corporativos no tardaron en infiltrarse en la secta para identificar el componente psicoactivo. Los únicos secretos de esta droga que no han sido revelados son los ingredientes necesarios para crearla y el destino de la secta que la descubrió.
fr: Originally created to be used in a religious ceremony, wherein an apostate is purified through forced confession, then repentance for their sins. The sect was soon infiltrated by corporate agents, and the psychoactive compound identified. The only secrets that have not been revealed by this drug are the ingredients for creating it, and the fate of the religious sect that discovered it.
pt: Originally created to be used in a religious ceremony, wherein an apostate is purified through forced confession, then repentance for their sins. The sect was soon infiltrated by corporate agents, and the psychoactive compound identified. The only secrets that have not been revealed by this drug are the ingredients for creating it, and the fate of the religious sect that discovered it.
ru: Изначально предназначались для религиозных церемоний, в ходе которых изменник очищается путём вынужденного признания и покаяния за свои грехи. Скоро в секту проникли агенты корпораций, опознавшие психоактивные вещества. Единственными тайнами, не раскрытыми с помощью этого наркотика, остаются его ингредиенты и судьба открывшей его религиозной секты.
zh: 原本为宗教仪式而制造，在仪式中异教徒会通过被迫坦白而净化，随后悔恨他们的罪孽。这个宗派很快就被公司特工渗透，而其中具有精神活性的化合物也被查明。唯一尚未揭晓的秘密是制造这种药物的原料，以及发现了它的那个宗派的命运。

column2: Sometimes criminal gangs hide their hostages in cargo pods fitted with rudimentary life support.
de: Sometimes criminal gangs hide their hostages in cargo pods fitted with rudimentary life support.
es: A veces las bandas criminales ocultan a personas en contenedores equipados con un soporte vital rudimentario.
fr: Sometimes criminal gangs hide their hostages in cargo pods fitted with rudimentary life support.
pt: Sometimes criminal gangs hide their hostages in cargo pods fitted with rudimentary life support.
ru: Преступники иногда прячут своих заложников в грузовых капсулах, оснащённых простейшей системой жизнеобеспечения.
zh: 有时候罪犯团伙会把他们的人质藏在仅有基本生命支持能力的货舱中。

column2: This blood-red grain-like plant sometimes know an Mars Grass has proven itself to be terribly invasive and highly aggressive to all other plant types. For this reason, its growth is now restricted to HR 7221. Its restriction has proved a blessing as its unique colouring and flavour are in demand in exotic cookery.
de: This blood-red grain-like plant sometimes know an Mars Grass has proven itself to be terribly invasive and highly aggressive to all other plant types. For this reason, its growth is now restricted to HR 7221. Its restriction has proved a blessing as its unique colouring and flavour are in demand in exotic cookery.
es: Esta planta parecida al trigo, de color rojo sangre y de sabor similar a la hierba de Marte, ha demostrado ser terriblemente invasiva y agresiva para el resto de cultivos. Por esta razón, su crecimiento se ha restringido a HR 7221. Dicha restricción ha resultado ser positiva, ya que por su color y sabor únicos existe una gran demanda para la cocina exótica.
fr: This blood-red grain-like plant sometimes know an Mars Grass has proven itself to be terribly invasive and highly aggressive to all other plant types. For this reason, its growth is now restricted to HR 7221. Its restriction has proved a blessing as its unique colouring and flavour are in demand in exotic cookery.
pt: This blood-red grain-like plant sometimes know an Mars Grass has proven itself to be terribly invasive and highly aggressive to all other plant types. For this reason, its growth is now restricted to HR 7221. Its restriction has proved a blessing as its unique colouring and flavour are in demand in exotic cookery.
ru: Эта кроваво-красная зерновая культура, известная также как Марсианская трава, оказалась невероятно агрессивной по отношению к другим типам растений. Именно по этой причине её разрешается выращивать только на HR 7221. Решение оказалось правильным, ведь благодаря своему необычному вкусу и цвету пшеница быстро стала экзотическим деликатесом.
zh: 这种血红的谷物状植物有时候也被称为火星草，它极具侵略性，并对其他任何植物品种都具有高度攻击性。正因如此，目前它的种植被严格限制在HR 7221。这项禁令事实上成为了一种好事，因为它独特的颜色和风味令它在一些奇异菜品中有所需求。

column2:
Produced by: All
Consumed by: All

Hydrogen fuel is used in high power systems, from ships’ drives to weapons to powering the energy needs of stations and surface cities. Using high pressure and temperature, hydrogen is fused into helium in a simple reactor.
de:
Produktion: Alle
Nachfrage: Alle

Wasserstoff-Treibstoff kommt in hoch anspruchsvollen Energieanwendungen zum Einsatz - von Schiffsantrieben über Waffen bis zu der Stromversorgung von Stationen und Oberflächenstädten. Unter hohem Druck und hohen Temperaturen verschmilzt Wasserstoff zu Helium.
es:
Producido por: Todos
Consumido por: Todos

Se utiliza para suministrar potencia a múltiples sectores, desde las unidades de armamento de las naves a las necesidades de energía de las estaciones y ciudades de superficie. Usando una alta presión y temperatura, el hidrógeno se fusiona en helio en un simple reactor.
fr:
Produced by: All
Consumed by: All

Hydrogen fuel is used in high power systems, from ships’ drives to weapons to powering the energy needs of stations and surface cities. Using high pressure and temperature, hydrogen is fused into helium in a simple reactor.
pt:
Produced by: All
Consumed by: All

Hydrogen fuel is used in high power systems, from ships’ drives to weapons to powering the energy needs of stations and surface cities. Using high pressure and temperature, hydrogen is fused into helium in a simple reactor.
ru:
Производится: Всеми
Потребляется: Всеми

Водородное топливо используется в энергоёмких системах, которые можно найти, например, в двигателе и орудиях корабля. Также используется для обеспечения энергией станций и городов на поверхности планет. В простом реакторе под воздействием высокого давления и температуры водород превращается в гелий.
zh:
产出于：所有
消耗于：所有

氢燃料被用于高功率系统中，从舰船的引擎到武器，再到空间站和地面城市的供电都有它。利用高压高温，氢能在简单的反应堆中被聚变为氦。

column2:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: Refinery and Industrial

Hydrogen Peroxide, H2O2, is the simplest peroxide and has a number of uses as a reacting agent in chemical processes.
de:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: Refinery and Industrial

Hydrogen Peroxide, H2O2, is the simplest peroxide and has a number of uses as a reacting agent in chemical processes.
es:
Producido por: Minería
Consumido por: Refinería e Industrial

El peróxido de hidrógeno, H2O2, es el peróxido más simple y tiene una gran cantidad de usos como agente reactivo en procesos químicos.
fr:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: Refinery and Industrial

Hydrogen Peroxide, H2O2, is the simplest peroxide and has a number of uses as a reacting agent in chemical processes.
pt:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: Refinery and Industrial

Hydrogen Peroxide, H2O2, is the simplest peroxide and has a number of uses as a reacting agent in chemical processes.
ru:
Производится: только добыча с астероидов
Потребляется: Перерабатывающая и Промышленная

Пероксид водорода (H2O2) — простейший из пероксидов, широко применяемый в химических процессах как реагент.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：精炼与工业

过氧化氢，H2O2，是最简单的过氧化物，并在作为化学过程的反应剂方面有若干应用。

column2: Used by Kumo Crew supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to anyone but their followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
de: Used by Kumo Crew supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to anyone but their followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
es: Used by Kumo Crew supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to anyone but their followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
fr: Used by Kumo Crew supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to anyone but their followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
pt: Used by Kumo Crew supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to anyone but their followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
ru: Используется сторонниками Kumo Crew для подготовки систем путем доставки в нужную систему, не представляет никакой ценности ни для кого, кроме их последователей. Сдайте его в любой местный офис безопасности за базовое вознаграждение. Этот предмет будет недействительным к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Kumo Crew的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来准备星系，这对于他的追随者以外的人没有任何价值。将其上交至任何当地安保办公室以获取少量薪酬。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Used by Torval’s supporters to fortify control systems by taking them from those systems to her Headquarters., If you are with another Imperial power you can oppose Torval by delivering the Prisoners to one of your control systems., Otherwise it is of no value. Due to limited life support the contained body will not last beyond the end of the powerplay week.

Due to limited life support the contained body will not last beyond the end of the powerplay week.
ru: Используется сторонниками Торвал для укрепления управляемых систем, забирая их из этих систем в ее штаб-квартиру. Если вы с другой имперской силой, вы можете противостоять Торвал, доставив заключенных в одну из ваших систем управления. В противном случае это не имеет никакой ценности. Из-за ограниченного жизнеобеспечения заключенное тело продержится только до конца недели политики.
zh: 用于给Torval的支持者通过将其运输至其大本营来加强对货物来源地的控制。如果你支持另一个帝国人物，你可以通过将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Torval，否则它毫无用处。由于生命支持系统能力有限，其中的囚犯会在本权力游戏周的末尾死去。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: All

Only legal on Imperial worlds or dictatorships and patronage style governed markets., Slavery is an important part of Imperial Society, providing labour for the Empire and a safety net for its citizens. Many Imperials will choose to sell themselves into a fixed period of slavery rather than face the embarrassment and dishonour of living with a debt.

Solamente permitidos en mundos imperiales o mercados bajo gobiernos dictatoriales o patronazgos.

La esclavitud es una parte importante de la sociedad imperial, proveyendo de mano de obra al Imperio y una red de seguridad para sus ciudadanos. Muchos ciudadanos imperiales deciden venderse a sí mismos durante un período fijo de tiempo como esclavo antes de afrontar la vergüenza y deshonor de vivir con una deuda.

ru:
Производится: Сельско-хозяйственная
Потребляется: Все имперские системы (кроме присягнувших Айслинг Дюваль), системы с диктатурой и под патронажем

Рабство является важной частью имперского общества — это источник рабочей силы для Империи и средство социальной защиты для её граждан. Многие имперцы предпочитают продать себя во временное рабство, нежели покрыть себя позором и бесчестием, живя в долгах.
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：所有

仅在帝国星系或独裁 (dictatorship) 与赞助 (patronage) 控制下的市场中合法。奴役是帝国社会中重要的部分，为帝国供应劳动力，为其公民提供最低保障。许多帝国人宁愿去当一段时间的奴隶也不愿意面对生活在债务中的尴尬与颜面扫地。

column2: Originally used as a medicine to revive those who have suffocated in dust storms, the restorative effects of this potent drink are almost as famous as the hangovers.
de: Originally used as a medicine to revive those who have suffocated in dust storms, the restorative effects of this potent drink are almost as famous as the hangovers.
es: Originalmente se empleaba como remedio para reanimar a aquellos que se asfixiaban durante las tormentas de polvo, pero actualmente, los efectos restauradores de esta potente bebida son casi tan famosas como las resacas que produce.
fr: Originally used as a medicine to revive those who have suffocated in dust storms, the restorative effects of this potent drink are almost as famous as the hangovers.
pt: Originally used as a medicine to revive those who have suffocated in dust storms, the restorative effects of this potent drink are almost as famous as the hangovers.
ru: Изначально этот напиток использовался как лекарство для тех, кто попал в удушающую пыльную бурю. Его восстановительный эффект известен так же широко, как и вызываемое им похмелье.
zh: 这种强力饮料原本被用作药物来救助那些在沙尘暴中窒息的人，其恢复精力的效果如同宿醉一样著名。

column2:
Produced by: Extraction
Consumed by: Refinery

Indite: chemical formula FeIn2S4. Indium ore. A rare, black crystalline mineral. Often found in what were once hydrothermal deposits or asteroids that have been heated in their past. It is widely refined into Indium.

Produced by: Extraction
Consumed by: Refinery

Consumido por: Refinería

Indita, fórmula química Feln2S4, mineral del indio. Es un raro mineral cristalino de color negro. Se encuentra a menudo en lo que una vez fueron depósitos hidrotermales o asteroides que han sido calentados en el pasado. Es ampliamente refinada en indio.
fr:
Produced by: Extraction
Consumed by: Refinery

Потребляется: Перерабатывающая

Химическая формула: FeLn2S4. Индиевая руда. Редкий чёрный кристаллический минерал. Часто встречается в гипотермальных месторождениях или астероидах, которые в прошлом были нагреты. В основном перерабатывается в индий.
zh:
产出于：开采
消耗于：精炼

铟石，化学式FeIn2S4，铟矿石。一种稀有的黑色晶体矿物。常在曾是热液形矿床的地方或曾被加热过的小行星中被发现。被广泛提炼为铟。

Indium, In, atomic number 49. Melting point 429K. Used industrially and in high tech for a wide range of alloys, including superconductors, sensors and holo projectors.

Индий, In, атомный номер 49. Температура плавления — 429 К. Применяется при создании сплавов для промышленности и отрасли высоких технологий. Сплавы используются, в частности, для изготовления сверхпроводников, сенсоров и голографических проекторов.

消耗于：高科技与工业

铟，In，原子序数49，熔点429开尔文。在工业和高科技中用于多种合金，包括超导体，传感器和全息投影仪。

es:

Las membranas aislantes se suelen usar para controlar el flujo de calor entre dispositivos y en refrigeración.

Изолирующие мембраны контролируют потоки тепла между приборами и обычно используются для охлаждения.

产出于：精炼 (太空) 
消耗于：高科技，工业与军事

隔热膜被用于控制热能在设备间的流动，常用于冷却。

Ion distributors are used to control the flow of ions within a device. These can be found at Stevens Orbital in the HIP 18327 system.

Ионные распределители используются для управления потоком ионов в устройстве. Можно найти на станции Stevens Orbital в системе HIP 18327.

离子分配器被用于在设备中控制离子的流动。它们可在HIP 18327星系的Stevens Orbital中买到。

Consumed by: Service (Orbital) and Tourist

Jadeite, NaAlSi2O6, is a substance of the purest green and used in variety of crafts and art. It has historical roots with the ancient Mesoamerican cultures.

Consumido por: Servicios (orbital) y Turismo

La jadeíta, NaAlSi2O6, es una sustancia del más puro color verde y usada en todo tipo de artesanía. Tiene sus raíces históricas en las antiguas culturas mesoamericanas.

Жадеит, NaAlSi2O6, — зелёный минерал, используется в различных ремёслах и сферах искусства. Его исторические корни прослеживаются от древних мезоамериканских культур.

产出于：行星采矿
消耗于：服务 (轨道) 与旅游

翡翠，NaAlSi2O6，是一种拥有纯净绿色的物质，在各种工艺与艺术中有所应用。它有着中美洲文化的历史渊源。

column2: A pocket-sized one shot distillery, hand crafted by the legendary Cyborg bartender Jaques. This device is capable of turning almost any combination of liquids into 10ml of highly concentrated alcohol in just 3 minutes.
de: A pocket-sized one shot distillery, hand crafted by the legendary Cyborg bartender Jaques. This device is capable of turning almost any combination of liquids into 10ml of highly concentrated alcohol in just 3 minutes.
es: Una destilería de chupitos portátil fabricada a mano por el legendario barman cíborg Jaques. Este dispositivo es capaz de convertir casi cualquier combinación de líquidos en 10 ml de alcohol altamente concentrado en tan solo tres minutos.
fr: A pocket-sized one shot distillery, hand crafted by the legendary Cyborg bartender Jaques. This device is capable of turning almost any combination of liquids into 10ml of highly concentrated alcohol in just 3 minutes.
pt: A pocket-sized one shot distillery, hand crafted by the legendary Cyborg bartender Jaques. This device is capable of turning almost any combination of liquids into 10ml of highly concentrated alcohol in just 3 minutes.
ru: Карманный самогонный аппарат на одну порцию, вручную изготовленный легендарным барменом-киборгом Жаком. Это устройство всего за три минуты превращает практически любое сочетание жидкостей в 10 мл неразбавленного этилового спирта.
zh: 一种小型的一次性蒸馏器，由传奇半机械人酒保Jaques手工制造。这款设备能把几乎任何液体组合在3分钟内变为10毫升的高浓度酒精。

column2: This entertainment device uses concentrated radiation bursts to detect the desires of the player and automatically creates a game with every feature they could desire. Each unit is unique, and will self customise to represent its owner. Use of another person’s puzzle box is considered a great social faux pas.
de: This entertainment device uses concentrated radiation bursts to detect the desires of the player and automatically creates a game with every feature they could desire. Each unit is unique, and will self customise to represent its owner. Use of another person’s puzzle box is considered a great social faux pas.
es: Este dispositivo de entretenimiento emplea ráfagas de radiación concentrada para detectar los deseos del jugador y crear de forma instantánea un juego con todas las características que pueda desear. Cada unidad es única y se autopersonaliza para representar a su dueño. El uso de un rompecabezas ajeno está socialmente mal visto.
fr: This entertainment device uses concentrated radiation bursts to detect the desires of the player and automatically creates a game with every feature they could desire. Each unit is unique, and will self customise to represent its owner. Use of another person’s puzzle box is considered a great social faux pas.
pt: This entertainment device uses concentrated radiation bursts to detect the desires of the player and automatically creates a game with every feature they could desire. Each unit is unique, and will self customise to represent its owner. Use of another person’s puzzle box is considered a great social faux pas.
ru: Это развлекательное устройство использует концентрированные вспышки радиации для просчёта желаний игрока и автоматически создаёт игру, полностью соответствующую им. Каждый экземпляр устройства уникален и самонастраивается под своего владельца. Использование чужой головоломки считается жутким моветоном.
zh: 这种娱乐设备用集中的辐射束来检测玩家的欲望，并自动创造出一款拥有他们全部想要特性的游戏。每个单元都是独特的，并会自我变形来代表其所有者。使用他人的puzzle box被视为是极大的社交失当行为。

column2: Grown in the paddy fields of Jaroua, bioengineered filter fish are used to remove any pests or parasites attached to the plant. It is hand-planted and hand-picked by specially engineered robots.
de: Grown in the paddy fields of Jaroua, bioengineered filter fish are used to remove any pests or parasites attached to the plant. It is hand-planted and hand-picked by specially engineered robots.
es: Cultivado en los arrozales de Jaroua, se emplean filtros de peces de bioingeniería para eliminar cualquier plaga o parásito que se adhiera a las hojas, y son plantadas a mano una a una por robots especialmente diseñados para ello. Se plantan y recogen a mano mediante robots especialmente diseñados para ello.
fr: Grown in the paddy fields of Jaroua, bioengineered filter fish are used to remove any pests or parasites attached to the plant. It is hand-planted and hand-picked by specially engineered robots.
pt: Grown in the paddy fields of Jaroua, bioengineered filter fish are used to remove any pests or parasites attached to the plant. It is hand-planted and hand-picked by specially engineered robots.
ru: Выращивается на рисовых полях на Jaroua, где специально созданные очищающие рыбки уничтожают всех вредителей и паразитов, которые присасываются к растению. Рис засеивают и собирают специальные роботы.
zh: 这种米在Jaroua的稻田中生长，田中有基因改造过的鱼被用于清除任何附着在植株上的害虫或寄生虫。由特制机器人手工种植采摘。

column2: A small soft-furred quadruped that stains its multi-coloured fur sludge brown when it dies - an action that this highly nervous creature is pre-disposed to do at the drop of a hat. Professional comforters must work day and night to keep this creature from inducing a heart attack. The meat is extremely bitter, but they have found a niche as an expensive accessory.
de: A small soft-furred quadruped that stains its multi-coloured fur sludge brown when it dies - an action that this highly nervous creature is pre-disposed to do at the drop of a hat. Professional comforters must work day and night to keep this creature from inducing a heart attack. The meat is extremely bitter, but they have found a niche as an expensive accessory.
es: Este pequeño cuadrúpedo posee una suave piel multicolor que cambia a un color marrón lodo cuando muere, una acción que esta criatura extremadamente nerviosa hace a lo más mínimo. Por tanto, los cuidadores profesionales deben vigilarlo día y noche para evitar que se autoinduzca un ataque cardíaco. La carne es extremadamente amarga, pero ha encontrado su lugar como un caro complemento.
fr: A small soft-furred quadruped that stains its multi-coloured fur sludge brown when it dies - an action that this highly nervous creature is pre-disposed to do at the drop of a hat. Professional comforters must work day and night to keep this creature from inducing a heart attack. The meat is extremely bitter, but they have found a niche as an expensive accessory.
pt: A small soft-furred quadruped that stains its multi-coloured fur sludge brown when it dies - an action that this highly nervous creature is pre-disposed to do at the drop of a hat. Professional comforters must work day and night to keep this creature from inducing a heart attack. The meat is extremely bitter, but they have found a niche as an expensive accessory.
ru: Небольшое четвероногое животное с мягким мехом, при смерти пятнающее свой многоцветный мех коричневой слизью — а умереть это на редкость нервное существо может по любому поводу. Профессиональные утешители должны работать день и ночь, чтобы уберечь животное от самопроизвольного сердечного приступа. Мясо этого зверька крайне горькое, но он популярен в качестве экзотического домашнего питомца.
zh: 一种软而多毛的四足动物，在死亡时会将其多色的毛发染成泥浆般的棕色——而它们作为高度敏感的动物常常倾向于毫不犹豫地暴毙。专业的照顾者必须没日没夜工作来防止这些生物突发心脏病。它们的肉很苦，但它们作为昂贵的饰品很合适。

column2: Leeches were used medically for millennia on ancient Earth but were largely superseded by technology. Hundreds of years later, a chance discovery on Kachirigin revealed some very valuable properties of the native creatures. Kachirigin leeches can painlessly filter impurities from the user’s blood, so can be used as a cure-all for hangovers and the worst effects of certain addictions. They are prized by the wealthy and hedonistic, and have an almost cult-like following.
de: Leeches were used medically for millennia on ancient Earth but were largely superseded by technology. Hundreds of years later, a chance discovery on Kachirigin revealed some very valuable properties of the native creatures. Kachirigin leeches can painlessly filter impurities from the user’s blood, so can be used as a cure-all for hangovers and the worst effects of certain addictions. They are prized by the wealthy and hedonistic, and have an almost cult-like following.
es: Las sanguijuelas fueron utilizadas durante milenios en la vieja Tierra, pero acabaron siendo reemplazadas por la tecnología. Cientos de años después, el casual descubrimiento en Kachirigin de especies nativas de sanguijuelas, reveló valiosas propiedades medicinales en las mismas. Las sanguijuelas filtradoras de Kachirigin pueden eliminar impurezas en la sangre de los usuarios sin ningún dolor y pueden ser utilizadas como un "remedio milagroso" para la resaca y los peores efectos secundarios de ciertas adicciones. Son apreciadas por los más ricos y hedonistas, y tienen un seguimiento prácticamente sectario.
fr: Leeches were used medically for millennia on ancient Earth but were largely superseded by technology. Hundreds of years later, a chance discovery on Kachirigin revealed some very valuable properties of the native creatures. Kachirigin leeches can painlessly filter impurities from the user’s blood, so can be used as a cure-all for hangovers and the worst effects of certain addictions. They are prized by the wealthy and hedonistic, and have an almost cult-like following.
pt: Leeches were used medically for millennia on ancient Earth but were largely superseded by technology. Hundreds of years later, a chance discovery on Kachirigin revealed some very valuable properties of the native creatures. Kachirigin leeches can painlessly filter impurities from the user’s blood, so can be used as a cure-all for hangovers and the worst effects of certain addictions. They are prized by the wealthy and hedonistic, and have an almost cult-like following.
ru: На Земле пиявок использовали многие тысячелетия, но позже им на смену пришли технологии. Сотни лет спустя в системе Kachirigin были случайно обнаружены коренные существа, которые обладали очень ценными свойствами. Качириганские пиявки могут безболезненно очистить кровь от примесей, поэтому они идеально подходят для борьбы с похмельем и нейтрализации последствий некоторых зависимостей. Вокруг них образовалось что-то наподобие культа, которому поклоняются богатые любители наслаждений.
zh: 蚂蟥在古代地球数千年来被用作药物，但这种用途基本被科技手段取代了。几百年后，在Kachirigin一个偶然的发现揭晓了当地生物一些很有价值的属性。Kachirigin蚂蟥能无痛地过滤掉使用者血液中的所有杂质，并因此能被用作一种万灵药，治疗宿醉和某些上瘾的最糟糕的作用。有钱人和享乐主义者对它们评价颇高，以至于对它有一支邪教般的追随者。

column2: Providing the biggest cigars in the galaxy, hand-rolled and ready to smoke right out of the box. Specially treated to allow safe smoking even in the cockpit without overloading your life support module. The best way to end your days.
de: Providing the biggest cigars in the galaxy, hand-rolled and ready to smoke right out of the box. Specially treated to allow safe smoking even in the cockpit without overloading your life support module. The best way to end your days.
es: Proporcionamos los más grandes puros de la galaxia, liados a mano y listos para fumar con solo sacarlos de la caja. Especialmente tratados para fumarlos incluso en la cabina sin saturar el módulo de soporte vital. La mejor manera de poner fin a tus días.
fr: Providing the biggest cigars in the galaxy, hand-rolled and ready to smoke right out of the box. Specially treated to allow safe smoking even in the cockpit without overloading your life support module. The best way to end your days.
pt: Providing the biggest cigars in the galaxy, hand-rolled and ready to smoke right out of the box. Specially treated to allow safe smoking even in the cockpit without overloading your life support module. The best way to end your days.
ru: Самые большие сигары в галактике, скручены вручную и готовы к использованию. Специальная технология производства позволяет курить в кабине пилота, не опасаясь того, что ваш модуль жизнеобеспечения выйдет из строя. Отличное завершение всех ваших дней.
zh: 供应银河中最大的雪茄，手工卷制，从盒中取出便随时可抽。经过了特殊处理来保障安全吸烟，哪怕是在驾驶舱里吸也不会过载你的生命支持模块。结束一天最好的方式。

column2: Kamorin Historic Weapons are happy to provide the re-enactor and enthusiast with fully-functional replicas of weapons from a number of important historical eras. Our expert team of craftsmen use traditional materials and methods, with a modern eye for quality. Exploring and researching the annals of history, our artisans continue to bring you the best of weapons from throughout the ages.
de: Kamorin Historic Weapons are happy to provide the re-enactor and enthusiast with fully-functional replicas of weapons from a number of important historical eras. Our expert team of craftsmen use traditional materials and methods, with a modern eye for quality. Exploring and researching the annals of history, our artisans continue to bring you the best of weapons from throughout the ages.
es: La compañía Armas Históricas de Kamorin está complacida en proporcionar a entusiastas y coleccionistas réplicas de armas de un gran número de periodos históricos. Nuestro equipo de artesanos trabaja con técnicas y materiales tradicionales, pero con la calidad de hoy en día. Además, estamos continuamente documentándonos para traerles las mejores armas que han existido a lo largo de la historia.
fr: Kamorin Historic Weapons are happy to provide the re-enactor and enthusiast with fully-functional replicas of weapons from a number of important historical eras. Our expert team of craftsmen use traditional materials and methods, with a modern eye for quality. Exploring and researching the annals of history, our artisans continue to bring you the best of weapons from throughout the ages.
pt: Kamorin Historic Weapons are happy to provide the re-enactor and enthusiast with fully-functional replicas of weapons from a number of important historical eras. Our expert team of craftsmen use traditional materials and methods, with a modern eye for quality. Exploring and researching the annals of history, our artisans continue to bring you the best of weapons from throughout the ages.
ru: Каморинское историческое оружие займёт достойное место в коллекции любого реконструктора или энтузиаста. В продаже имеется полностью работоспособное оружие различных важных исторических эпох. Наша команда экспертов использует только традиционные материалы и методы, но не забывает о современных стандартах качества. Мы постоянно исследуем исторические записи, чтобы вы и дальше смогли наслаждаться лучшим оружием всех времён.
zh: Kamorin Historic Weapons乐于向重现者和爱好者提供完全可用的，来自数个关键历史时期的武器复制品。我们的手艺人专家团队使用传统材料与传统方法，同时又满足现代的质量要求。我们不断探索和研究历史的工匠将始终为您带来几个时代以来最好的武器。

column2: Despite the vagaries of fashion, Karetii Couture is always ahead of the curve, and so are the prices. Many people question the value and the practicalities of these items and yet they still maintain a vice-like grip on the public’s imagination and credits.
de: Despite the vagaries of fashion, Karetii Couture is always ahead of the curve, and so are the prices. Many people question the value and the practicalities of these items and yet they still maintain a vice-like grip on the public’s imagination and credits.
es: A pesar de los vaivenes de la moda, Karetii está siempre a la vanguardia, y también lo están sus precios. Mucha gente cuestiona el valor y los aspectos prácticos de estos artículos y, aun así, todavía mantiene un férreo control sobre la imaginación del público y sus créditos.
fr: Despite the vagaries of fashion, Karetii Couture is always ahead of the curve, and so are the prices. Many people question the value and the practicalities of these items and yet they still maintain a vice-like grip on the public’s imagination and credits.
pt: Despite the vagaries of fashion, Karetii Couture is always ahead of the curve, and so are the prices. Many people question the value and the practicalities of these items and yet they still maintain a vice-like grip on the public’s imagination and credits.
ru: Модные вещи от Karetii всегда опережают любые модные тенденции, что заметно сказывается на ценах. Многие высказывают сомнения по поводу ценности и практичности этих вещей, однако они всё ещё будоражат воображение и кредитные счета общественности.
zh: 尽管时尚变化无常，Karetii Couture总能领先于时代，当然价格也是。许多人质疑这些物件的价值和实用性，但到现在为止他们仍紧紧掌握着公众的注意力和钱包。

column2: Prized for their uniquely sweet flavour caused by the native fungal parasites that infest them.
de: Prized for their uniquely sweet flavour caused by the native fungal parasites that infest them.
es: Apreciadas por su característico sabor dulce, el cual es otorgado por la infección derivada de especies autóctonas de hongos parásitos.
fr: Prized for their uniquely sweet flavour caused by the native fungal parasites that infest them.
pt: Prized for their uniquely sweet flavour caused by the native fungal parasites that infest them.
ru: Из-за населяющих их грибных паразитов обладают отличным вкусом.
zh: 由于感染当地真菌寄生虫导致的酸甜口味而备受赞赏。

column2: Kinago is famed for its Luthiers producing the finest Violins and other stringed instruments. They are highly prized by both musicians and collectors throughout the galaxy.
de: Kinago is famed for its Luthiers producing the finest Violins and other stringed instruments. They are highly prized by both musicians and collectors throughout the galaxy.
es: Kinago es famosa porque sus lutieres producen los mejores violines y otros instrumentos de cuerda. Son muy apreciados tanto por músicos como por coleccionistas de toda la galaxia.
fr: Kinago is famed for its Luthiers producing the finest Violins and other stringed instruments. They are highly prized by both musicians and collectors throughout the galaxy.
pt: Kinago is famed for its Luthiers producing the finest Violins and other stringed instruments. They are highly prized by both musicians and collectors throughout the galaxy.
ru: Kinago славится своими скрипичными мастерами, которые изготавливают скрипки и другие струнные инструменты. Продукция этой фирмы высоко ценится как среди музыкантов, так и среди коллекционеров со всей галактики.
zh: Kinago因其制琴师能制造出质量最佳的小提琴和其他弦乐器而闻名。全银河系的音乐家和收藏夹都对他们给予高度评价。

column2: The hops of Kongga provide a deep, satisfying flavour to the locally brewed ale, but seem to wither and spoil rapidly when removed from their native climate. Due to this, Kongga Ale is renowned for its authentic flavour and traditional production methods. Served at room temperature with a decorative umbrella.
de: The hops of Kongga provide a deep, satisfying flavour to the locally brewed ale, but seem to wither and spoil rapidly when removed from their native climate. Due to this, Kongga Ale is renowned for its authentic flavour and traditional production methods. Served at room temperature with a decorative umbrella.
es: Los lúpulos del sistema Kongga proporcionan un sabor profundo y agradable a la cerveza artesanal, pero parecen marchitarse y estropearse rápidamente cuando son apartados de su entorno. Debido a esto, la cerveza de Kongga es famosa por su sabor auténtico y su método de producción artesanal. Se sirve a temperatura ambiente con una sombrilla decorativa.
fr: The hops of Kongga provide a deep, satisfying flavour to the locally brewed ale, but seem to wither and spoil rapidly when removed from their native climate. Due to this, Kongga Ale is renowned for its authentic flavour and traditional production methods. Served at room temperature with a decorative umbrella.
pt: The hops of Kongga provide a deep, satisfying flavour to the locally brewed ale, but seem to wither and spoil rapidly when removed from their native climate. Due to this, Kongga Ale is renowned for its authentic flavour and traditional production methods. Served at room temperature with a decorative umbrella.
ru: Кунггский хмель придает глубокий приятный привкус местному элю, но быстро портится и увядает за пределами родного климата. Именно ему Кунггский эль обязан своим неповторимым вкусом и традиционным методом производства. Подавать лучше безо льда и с декоративным зонтиком.
zh: Kongga的啤酒花为当地酿造的麦芽啤酒提供了一种深沉而令人满足的味道，但似乎一从本地的气候中移走就会迅速凋零腐败。正因如此，Kongga Ale因其正宗的口味和传统的生产流程而名满天下。在室温下饮用，配有装饰性的小雨伞。

column2: This exotic fertiliser is made from the crushed bodies of the native life forms siphoned from the nearby gas giant’s vast ammonia oceans in unsustainable quantities. It is reported to have invigorated even the most barren and arid of soils, but has also proved to be lethal to some crops.
de: This exotic fertiliser is made from the crushed bodies of the native life forms siphoned from the nearby gas giant’s vast ammonia oceans in unsustainable quantities. It is reported to have invigorated even the most barren and arid of soils, but has also proved to be lethal to some crops.
es: Este exótico fertilizante se fabrica mediante el uso de una gran cantidad de cuerpos triturados, los cuales provienen de unas formas de vida nativas que son extraídas de los vastos océanos de amoniaco de los gigantes gaseosos. Se ha reportado que es capaz de renovar los suelos más áridos y estériles, pero también ha demostrado ser letal para algunos cultivos.
fr: This exotic fertiliser is made from the crushed bodies of the native life forms siphoned from the nearby gas giant’s vast ammonia oceans in unsustainable quantities. It is reported to have invigorated even the most barren and arid of soils, but has also proved to be lethal to some crops.
pt: This exotic fertiliser is made from the crushed bodies of the native life forms siphoned from the nearby gas giant’s vast ammonia oceans in unsustainable quantities. It is reported to have invigorated even the most barren and arid of soils, but has also proved to be lethal to some crops.
ru: Это экзотическое удобрение сделано из раздавленных тел представителей местной фауны, в чрезмерных количествах собранных в обширных аммиачных океанах ближайшего газового гиганта. Сообщается, что оно способно сделать плодородной даже самую бесплодную и засушливую почву — но при этом губительно для ряда растений.
zh: 这种奇异的肥料是用当地生物粉碎的尸体制成的，这些生物被从附近气态巨行星广阔的氨海中以大到不可持续的数额抽出。它能使那些最贫瘠最干旱的土地重现生机，但对于某些庄稼也是致命的。

column2:
Produced by: Military (Surface)
Consumed by: Colony (Surface), Extraction (Surface), High Tech (Surface) and Refinery (Surface)

A cheap and effective way of creating area denial. These explosive devices are banned in most jurisdictions and are effective against personnel and land vehicles.
de:
Produced by: Military (Surface)
Consumed by: Colony (Surface), Extraction (Surface), High Tech (Surface) and Refinery (Surface)

A cheap and effective way of creating area denial. These explosive devices are banned in most jurisdictions and are effective against personnel and land vehicles.
es:
Producidas por: Militar (superficie)
Consumido por: Colonia (superficie), Extracción (superficie), Alta Tecnología (superficie) y Refinería (superficie)

Una forma barata y efectiva de crear zonas prohibidas al paso. Muy efectivos contra personal y vehículos terrestres. Estos dispositivos explosivos están prohibidos en muchas jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: Military (Surface)
Consumed by: Colony (Surface), Extraction (Surface), High Tech (Surface) and Refinery (Surface)

A cheap and effective way of creating area denial. These explosive devices are banned in most jurisdictions and are effective against personnel and land vehicles.
pt:
Produced by: Military (Surface)
Consumed by: Colony (Surface), Extraction (Surface), High Tech (Surface) and Refinery (Surface)

A cheap and effective way of creating area denial. These explosive devices are banned in most jurisdictions and are effective against personnel and land vehicles.
ru:
Производится: Военная планетарн.
Потребляется: Добывающая на пов., Высоко-технологичная на пов., Перерабатывающая на пов., Колонии на пов.

Дешёвый и эффективный способ блокирования зоны. Данные взрывные устройства отлично подходят для уничтожения личного состава и наземной техники, но запрещены в большинстве юрисдикций.
zh:
产出于：军事 (地面) 
消耗于：殖民地 (地面)，开采 (地面)，高科技 (地面)，精炼 (地面)

创造区域阻绝的一种简单而有效的方法。这些爆炸物在大多数法域都被禁止，并对人员和地面车辆很有效。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech

Lanthanum, La, atomic number 57. Melting point 1193K. It is a soft metallic element used as an additive in glass. Its properties make it ideal for optical communications systems, other lighting applications and as a catalyst for various refining processes.
de:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech

Lanthanum, La, atomic number 57. Melting point 1193K. It is a soft metallic element used as an additive in glass. Its properties make it ideal for optical communications systems, other lighting applications and as a catalyst for various refining processes.
es:
Producido por: Refinería (superficie)
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología

Lantano, La, número atómico 57. Punto de fusión 1.193K. Es un elemento metálico empleado como aditivo en el vidrio. Sus propiedades lo hacen ideal para sistemas de comunicación ópticos, con múltiples aplicaciones también en el campo de la iluminación o como catalizador en varios procesos de refinado.
fr:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech

Lanthanum, La, atomic number 57. Melting point 1193K. It is a soft metallic element used as an additive in glass. Its properties make it ideal for optical communications systems, other lighting applications and as a catalyst for various refining processes.
pt:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech

Lanthanum, La, atomic number 57. Melting point 1193K. It is a soft metallic element used as an additive in glass. Its properties make it ideal for optical communications systems, other lighting applications and as a catalyst for various refining processes.
ru:
Производится: Перерабатывающая на поверхн.
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная

Лантан (La, атомный номер: 57, температура плавления: 1193 К) — это мягкий металл, использующийся в качестве присадки в стекле. За счёт своих свойств лантан идеально подходит для систем оптической коммуникации, а также применения в других областях, связанных с освещением. Помимо этого, используется в качестве катализатора в различных процессах переработки.
zh:
产出于：精炼 (地面) 
消耗于：高科技

镧，La，原子序数57，熔点1193开尔文。这是一种较软的金属，用作玻璃添加剂。它的属性使其很适合用于光学通信系统，其他光学应用以及作为各种精炼过程的催化剂。

column2: Occasionally survey ships go missing during their journeys into the black. On even rarer occasions their cache of survey data can be retrieved and these are highly sought after by institutions and private interests.
de: Occasionally survey ships go missing during their journeys into the black. On even rarer occasions their cache of survey data can be retrieved and these are highly sought after by institutions and private interests.
es: Encontrar una memoria de datos de una misión de estudio es algo poco común, pero puede ser un lucrativo hallazgo para los exploradores. Estas memorias siempre están en constante demanda por las instituciones académicas y por intereses comerciales.
fr: Occasionally survey ships go missing during their journeys into the black. On even rarer occasions their cache of survey data can be retrieved and these are highly sought after by institutions and private interests.
pt: Occasionally survey ships go missing during their journeys into the black. On even rarer occasions their cache of survey data can be retrieved and these are highly sought after by institutions and private interests.
ru: Исследовательские корабли иногда не возвращаются из экспедиции в неизведанные уголки космоса. В отдельных случаях удаётся найти пакеты с отчётами об исследованиях с этих кораблей. Эти данные пользуются высоким спросом среди научных учреждений и частных предпринимателей.
zh: 科考船偶尔会在深入宇宙的旅程中失踪。在更偶尔的情况下，它们的调查数据缓存能被取回，并被某些机构和个人高价寻求。

column2: A highly valued liquor from the old world of Lave. Using ancient breeds of grains grown in its tropical climate under a permit from the government, the distillate is kept in old Earth oak barrels and held in an orbital maturing facility for decades to achieve maximum richness.
de: A highly valued liquor from the old world of Lave. Using ancient breeds of grains grown in its tropical climate under a permit from the government, the distillate is kept in old Earth oak barrels and held in an orbital maturing facility for decades to achieve maximum richness.
es: Un licor altamente valorado del viejo mundo de Lave. Usando antiguas semillas que se cultivan en su clima tropical con permiso del gobierno, el destilado se guarda en barricas de roble de la vieja Tierra y se deja madurar durante décadas en una instalación orbital especializada para lograr su característico sabor y calidad.
fr: A highly valued liquor from the old world of Lave. Using ancient breeds of grains grown in its tropical climate under a permit from the government, the distillate is kept in old Earth oak barrels and held in an orbital maturing facility for decades to achieve maximum richness.
pt: A highly valued liquor from the old world of Lave. Using ancient breeds of grains grown in its tropical climate under a permit from the government, the distillate is kept in old Earth oak barrels and held in an orbital maturing facility for decades to achieve maximum richness.
ru: Весьма ценный напиток, производимый на Lave. По разрешению правительства производитель использует в производстве древние сорта зерна, выращиваемые в тропическом климате планеты. После этого смесь помещается в дубовых бочках со старой земли и хранится на орбитальном складе, где она годами выдерживается для получения максимально насыщенного букета.
zh: 一种来自古老世界Lave的烈酒。在拥有政府许可的情况下，热带气候中长成的古代谷物品种会被蒸馏，其馏出物会被储存在古代地球的橡木桶中，并在轨道发酵设施中放置数十年来达到最浓郁的口感。

column2: Used by Lavigny’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to any one but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week
de: Used by Lavigny’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to any one but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week
es: Used by Lavigny’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to any one but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week
fr: Used by Lavigny’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to any one but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week
pt: Used by Lavigny’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, of no value to any one but her followers. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week
ru: Используется сторонниками Лавиньи для подготовки систем путем доставки в желаемую систему, не представляет никакой ценности ни для кого, кроме ее последователей. Этот элемент будет устаревшим к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Lavigny的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来准备星系供占据。这对于她的追随者以外的人没有任何价值。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Used to support actions in systems she is attempting to control, Only of interest if you are with another Imperial power. If so you can oppose Lavigny by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
de: Used to support actions in systems she is attempting to control, Only of interest if you are with another Imperial power. If so you can oppose Lavigny by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
es: Used to support actions in systems she is attempting to control, Only of interest if you are with another Imperial power. If so you can oppose Lavigny by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

If so you can oppose Lavigny by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
pt: Used to support actions in systems she is attempting to control, Only of interest if you are with another Imperial power. If so you can oppose Lavigny by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems. Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.
ru: Используется для поддержки действий в системах, которые Лавиньи пытается контролировать. Представляет интерес только если вы с другой имперской силой. Если так, вы можете противостоять Лавиньи, перехватив и доставив этот груз в одну из ваших систем контроля. В противном случае он не представляет никакой ценности. Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于支持她正试图控制的星系中的行动，只对支持另一帝国人物的人有价值。如果如此，你可以通过拦截并将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Lavigny，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.

zh: Leestian邪恶果汁的名字来源于当地安保部队。他们声称喝了这种强劲的烈酒而醉酒的人看上去都像是被恶魔给附身了。

column2: Brewed using particularly robust beans, the flavour and caffeine is extracted from the beans using custom technology. Harnessing the power of the vacuum of space to enrich comet water, the method creates a beverage noted for its potency.
de: Brewed using particularly robust beans, the flavour and caffeine is extracted from the beans using custom technology. Harnessing the power of the vacuum of space to enrich comet water, the method creates a beverage noted for its potency.
es: Elaborado usando habas particularmente resistentes, el sabor y la cafeína se extraen de los granos utilizando tecnología personalizada. Aprovechando el potencial que ofrece el vacío del espacio para enriquecer el agua de cometas, el método crea una bebida conocida por su fuerza.
fr: Brewed using particularly robust beans, the flavour and caffeine is extracted from the beans using custom technology. Harnessing the power of the vacuum of space to enrich comet water, the method creates a beverage noted for its potency.
pt: Brewed using particularly robust beans, the flavour and caffeine is extracted from the beans using custom technology. Harnessing the power of the vacuum of space to enrich comet water, the method creates a beverage noted for its potency.
ru: Сварен из особенно крепких зёрен. Использована особая технология извлечения зёрен из кофеина. Эта технология использует силу космического вакуума для обогащения воды с комет, и получившийся в результате напиток отличается высокой крепостью.
zh: 这种咖啡用长势特别茁壮的豆子制成，豆中的风味和咖啡因是使用特制技术提取出来的。利用太空的真空来让物质在彗星水中富集使得这么制作出来的饮料因其劲大而著称。

zh: 从海底热泉中收获，并因其似硫的咸味而大受赞赏。为了保证新鲜度，最好生吃。

column2: Created by combining the DNA of the universe’s sweetest crops, to create the sweetest substance of them all. It turns out it’s highly addictive!
de: Created by combining the DNA of the universe’s sweetest crops, to create the sweetest substance of them all. It turns out it’s highly addictive!
es: A partir de la combinación del ADN de los cultivos más dulces del universo se ha creado una sustancia aún más dulce. ¡Puede resultar altamente adictiva!
fr: Created by combining the DNA of the universe’s sweetest crops, to create the sweetest substance of them all. It turns out it’s highly addictive!
pt: Created by combining the DNA of the universe’s sweetest crops, to create the sweetest substance of them all. It turns out it’s highly addictive!
ru: Созданы путём объединения ДНК самых сладких растений во вселенной с целью получения сладчайшего из сладчайших вкуса. Как оказалось, они вызывают сильнейшее привыкание!
zh: 通过将宇宙中最甜的那些庄稼的DNA结合而成，来产生所有那些最甜的物质。这很令人上瘾！

column2: This infamous drug grown exclusively on 16 Lyrae 5 is still the narcotic of choice for overpaid celebrities and the super-rich. It has almost become more of a status symbol than a recreational drug.
de: This infamous drug grown exclusively on 16 Lyrae 5 is still the narcotic of choice for overpaid celebrities and the super-rich. It has almost become more of a status symbol than a recreational drug.
es: Esta droga viciosa, cultivada exclusivamente en el quinto planeta del sistema 16 Lyrae, sigue siendo una de las favoritas entre los famosos y millonarios. Se valora más como símbolo de estatus social que por sus propiedades recreativas en sí.
fr: This infamous drug grown exclusively on 16 Lyrae 5 is still the narcotic of choice for overpaid celebrities and the super-rich. It has almost become more of a status symbol than a recreational drug.
pt: This infamous drug grown exclusively on 16 Lyrae 5 is still the narcotic of choice for overpaid celebrities and the super-rich. It has almost become more of a status symbol than a recreational drug.
ru: Обладающий дурной славой наркотик с 16 Lyrae 5 пользуется популярностью у получающий непомерные деньги знаменитостей и богачей. На самом деле он скорее давно считается символом возвышенного положения, нежели рекреационным наркотиком.
zh: 这种在仅16 Lyrae 5上生长的毒品目前仍是收入极高的明星以及超级富豪的头号选择。它几乎已经成为了一种地位象征，而非一种娱乐性毒品。

zh: 用于给Kumo Crew的支持者通过将其运输至其大本营来加强控制，此外它毫无价值。由于生命支持能力有限，其中的奴隶会在本权力游戏周的末尾死去。

column2: Master Chefs are selected based on genetic markers that tend to favour an aptitude for the culinary arts. Little is known about them except that they are kidnapped as children and then trained under rigorous conditions to bring out their genetic cooking potential. The use of Master Chefs is illegal in most Federal and Alliance systems, but is regarded as a sign of high status in many Imperial systems. Many anti-slavery protest groups have tried to free Master Chefs from their life of culinary bondage, yet due to their training, most return of their own free will to serve. Theirs is a life of servitude - they know nothing but to cook.
de: Master Chefs are selected based on genetic markers that tend to favour an aptitude for the culinary arts. Little is known about them except that they are kidnapped as children and then trained under rigorous conditions to bring out their genetic cooking potential. The use of Master Chefs is illegal in most Federal and Alliance systems, but is regarded as a sign of high status in many Imperial systems. Many anti-slavery protest groups have tried to free Master Chefs from their life of culinary bondage, yet due to their training, most return of their own free will to serve. Theirs is a life of servitude - they know nothing but to cook.
es: Los maestros de cocina se seleccionan en función de marcadores genéticos que favorecen las aptitudes culinarias. Poco se sabe de ellos aparte de que son secuestrados cuando son niños y entrenados bajo condiciones muy rigurosas para extraer todo el potencial culinario que tienen en sus genes. El uso de estos maestros de cocina está prohibido en la mayoría de sistemas federales o de la alianza, pero se observa como un signo de alto standing en sistemas imperiales. Muchos grupos antiesclavistas han intentado sin éxito liberarles de sus ataduras culinarias pero, debido a su entrenamiento, la mayoría vuelve a su vida de servicio. La suya es una vida de servidumbre en la que apenas saben nada excepto cocinar.

Theirs is a life of servitude - they know nothing but to cook.

ru: Мастер-шефы, знаменитые шеф-повара, отбираются по наличию генетических модификаторов, присущих настоящим кулинарам. Известно о них крайне мало: лишь то, что похищают их в раннем возрасте и тренируют в довольно жестких условиях — якобы, чтобы развить весь их поварской потенциал. Использовать Мастер-шефов в системах Федерации и Альянса незаконно, хотя в имперских системах они считаются признаком высокого статуса хозяина. Многие группы, выступающие за отмену рабства, пытались освободить Мастер-шефов из кулинарной неволи, но, поскольку большинство из них умеют лишь готовить, они вскоре возвращались к бывшим владельцам самовольно. Их удел — служить и готовить.
zh: 超级厨师是经过挑选的，拥有那些倾向于让人拥有厨艺天赋的基因标志的人。外界对他们知之甚少，只知道他们在儿童时就被绑架，并被严格地训练以挖掘他们的烹饪潜力。在大多数联邦和联盟星系中使用超级厨师是非法的，但在许多帝国星系内这被视为一种高社会地位的象征。很多反奴役抗议团体都曾尝试将超级厨师从厨艺的束缚中解救出来，但由于他们所受的训练，他们中的大多数都会遵循自己的意志而返回去继续服务。他们的生活即是服务——他们脑中除了烹饪别无他物。

column2: Mechucos high tea is so named for the dizzying highs caused by its consumption. Most users recommend restricting consumption to specific times of the day, and only with a side plate of restorative sandwiches and cakes.
de: Mechucos high tea is so named for the dizzying highs caused by its consumption. Most users recommend restricting consumption to specific times of the day, and only with a side plate of restorative sandwiches and cakes.
es: Su nombre es dado por los grandes vértigos que otorga su consumo. La mayoría de los consumidores recomiendan su degustación en ciertos momentos del día y solo acompañado de un plato de sándwiches y pasteles reconstituyentes.

ru: Мечукосский кайфочай получил свое название из-за эффекта, производимого его употреблением. Большинство его потребителей рекомендуют ограничивать питье кайфочая определенным временем суток и предварительно запасаться бутербродами и пирожными для утоления голода.
zh: Mechucos兴奋茶被如此命名是因为在饮用后会感到一种令人晕眩的兴奋感。许多饮用者建议限制在一天中的特定时间饮用它，并只在有恢复三明治或蛋糕时这么做。

column2: Meta-alloys have a complex lattice structure with large internal voids. They are cellular in nature, and formed organically. They are incredibly strong – much stronger than foamed aluminium for example. Many elements form the structure so technically they are alloys, but the composition is different in different parts of the cell walls for strength. They are good thermal insulators, and have a high melting point, but if they are melted they lose all their special properties and become a conventional alloy. They are easily machined, but as yet cannot be manufactured and are only found in space. They are associated with recently discovered alien entities nicknamed ’Large Barnacles’ by interstellar explorers. These appear to be common in certain parts of space, although no-one is certain why. This material has been heralded as the next step in materials technology. It is ultra-light and stronger and more versatile than most commercially available alloys.
de: Meta-alloys have a complex lattice structure with large internal voids. They are cellular in nature, and formed organically. They are incredibly strong – much stronger than foamed aluminium for example. Many elements form the structure so technically they are alloys, but the composition is different in different parts of the cell walls for strength. They are good thermal insulators, and have a high melting point, but if they are melted they lose all their special properties and become a conventional alloy. They are easily machined, but as yet cannot be manufactured and are only found in space. They are associated with recently discovered alien entities nicknamed ’Large Barnacles’ by interstellar explorers. These appear to be common in certain parts of space, although no-one is certain why. This material has been heralded as the next step in materials technology. It is ultra-light and stronger and more versatile than most commercially available alloys.
es: Las metaaleaciones tienen una compleja estructura de red cristalina con grandes vacíos interiores. Son de naturaleza celular y se forman orgánicamente. Son increíblemente fuertes, mucho más fuerte que la espuma de aluminio, por ejemplo. Su estructura está formada por muchos elementos, así que técnicamente son aleaciones, pero la composición varía en diferentes partes de la pared celular para obtener mayor fortaleza. Son buenos aislantes térmicos y tienen un elevado punto de fusión, aunque al traspasarlo pierden sus propiedades y se convierten en aleaciones convencionales. Se manipulan fácilmente pero todavía no pueden ser creados, encontrándose únicamente en el espacio. Están relacionados con las estructuras alienígenas recién descubiertas y apodadas "grandes percebes" por los exploradores interestelares. Parecen ser frecuentes en determinadas áreas del espacio, aunque nadie sabe exactamente por qué. Se ha vaticinado que este material será el próximo paso en tecnología de materiales. Es ultraligero, mucho más fuerte y versátil que la mayoría de las aleaciones disponibles comercialmente.
fr: Meta-alloys have a complex lattice structure with large internal voids. They are cellular in nature, and formed organically. They are incredibly strong – much stronger than foamed aluminium for example. Many elements form the structure so technically they are alloys, but the composition is different in different parts of the cell walls for strength. They are good thermal insulators, and have a high melting point, but if they are melted they lose all their special properties and become a conventional alloy. They are easily machined, but as yet cannot be manufactured and are only found in space. They are associated with recently discovered alien entities nicknamed ’Large Barnacles’ by interstellar explorers. These appear to be common in certain parts of space, although no-one is certain why. This material has been heralded as the next step in materials technology. It is ultra-light and stronger and more versatile than most commercially available alloys.

This material has been heralded as the next step in materials technology. It is ultra-light and stronger and more versatile than most commercially available alloys.
ru: Метасплавы имеют комплексную решетчатую структуру с множеством внутренних водородных карманов. По своей природе являются клеточными и образовываются органическим путём. Отличаются невероятной прочностью — к примеру, они намного крепче пенистого алюминия. Многие элементы образуют структуру, так что их можно с некоторой натяжкой назвать сплавами — при этом состав их частей различается, что приводит к неравномерной прочности. Являются хорошими теплоизоляторами и имеют высокую температуру плавления, но после переплавки теряют все свои особые свойства и становятся обычными сплавами. Легко поддаются обработке, но не могут быть произведены искусственно — найти их можно только в космосе. Их связывают с недавно обнаруженными инопланетными сущностями, которых межзвездные исследователи прозвали «Большими раками»[1]. Эти сущности в больших количествах водятся в некоторых частях космоса - хотя никто не знает, что их там привлекает. Считается, что метасплавы смогут вывести современную металлургию на новый уровень. Они очень лёгкие, прочные и куда более универсальные, нежели представленные на рынке сплавы.
zh: Meta-alloy拥有一种复杂的格栅状结构，其间有大块空隙。它们天然地是蜂窝状的，并是以有机方式形成。它们相当坚固——比方说，比泡沫铝坚固的多。该结构由许多元素构成，所以技术上来说这算是合金，但为了提升强度，其在每个小格不同位置的成分是不同的。它们是优秀的热导体，并拥有很高的熔点，但它一旦被熔化便会失去所有特殊性质，转而变成一种普通合金。他们可以轻易地被加工，但至今仍无法被制造，只能在太空中找到。它们与近期被星际探索者发现的，戏称为“大藤壶”的外星实体有关。这些结构貌似在太空中的某些特定位置比较常见，不过没有人能确定这是为什么。这种材料被认为预示着材料科学的下一步飞跃。比起大多数商用合金，它极轻而又更坚固，并且用途更多。

Эта форма производится из высококачественной прочной ткани, подходящей для различных температур и погодных условий, поэтому для военных она незаменима.

产出于：工业

用非常坚固并能适应不同温度和天气情况的高等级布料制成的衣物。它们对军事人员至关重要。

column2: Highly confidential documents detailing military movements and military strategy. Possession of such documents is highly illegal, due to their sensitive nature. For the same reason they fetch an exceedingly large sum from the right buyer.
de: Highly confidential documents detailing military movements and military strategy. Possession of such documents is highly illegal, due to their sensitive nature. For the same reason they fetch an exceedingly large sum from the right buyer.
es: Documentos altamente confidenciales que describen movimientos y estrategias militares. La posesión de tales documentos es completamente ilegal debido a su naturaleza sensible y por ello hay compradores que llegan a pagar una suma extremadamente alta por ellos.
fr: Highly confidential documents detailing military movements and military strategy. Possession of such documents is highly illegal, due to their sensitive nature. For the same reason they fetch an exceedingly large sum from the right buyer.
pt: Highly confidential documents detailing military movements and military strategy. Possession of such documents is highly illegal, due to their sensitive nature. For the same reason they fetch an exceedingly large sum from the right buyer.
ru: Сверхсекретные документы с описанием перемещений войск и стратегии боевых действий. По причине их особой важности владение ими считается серьёзнейшим преступлением. По той же причине за них можно выручить огромные деньги, если найти подходящего покупателя.
zh: 高度机密的文件，详细描述了军事动向与战略。由于其敏感性质，拥有这类文件是高度非法的。也由于同样的原因，在正确的人那里可以用这换取一大笔钱。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: Extraction

Industrially produced ’grey goo’ microdevices that are injected into minerals to separate specific constituents from mixed ores along grain boundaries. Extraction sites that utilise mineral extractors in their processes are significantly more efficient.

Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: Extraction

Consumido por: Extracción

Microdispositivos de "plaga gris" industriales que se inyectan en los minerales para separar ciertos constituyentes de menas mixtas a lo largo de los bordes del grano. Los lugares de extracción que utilizan los extractores de minerales en su proceso son significativamente más eficientes.
