Производимые на заводах микроустройства, известные как «серое вещество». Устройства вводят в минералы, чтобы отделить определённые элементы от смешанных руд вдоль границ зёрен. Экстракторы минералов позволяют значительно повысить производительность шахт.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：开采

工业化生产的类“灰蛊”微型设备，用于注入至矿物来把混合矿石中的特定组分沿晶界分离出来。在生产过程中利用矿物提取器的开采站比其他的要高效得多。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Refinery

This is an organic oil that is a useful raw ingredient for producing a wide range of synthetic materials from plastics to ceramics. It is derived from the decay of organic materials, and can often be found beneath the ground on outdoor worlds. Surprisingly, mineral oil was burnt for energy on ancient Earth.
de:
Produktion: Landwirtschaft
Nachfrage: Raffinerie

Mithilfe dieses organischen Öls kann eine ganze Reihe synthetischer Materialien produziert werden, z. B. Plastik- und Keramikgegenstände. Es wird aus den Überresten organischer Materialien produziert, die oftmals im Boden von Freiluftwelten gefunden werden können. Erstaunlicherweise wurde Erdöl in früheren Zeiten auf der alten Erde als Brennstoff verwendet.
es:
Producido por: Agrícola
Consumido por: Refinería

Un aceite orgánico utilizado como un ingrediente crudo para producir una amplia gama de materiales sintéticos, desde plásticos a cerámicas. Procede de la descomposición de materiales orgánicos y a menudo se puede encontrar bajo tierra en mundos terrestres. Sorprendentemente, este aceite era quemado para obtener energía en la vieja Tierra.
fr:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Refinery

It is derived from the decay of organic materials, and can often be found beneath the ground on outdoor worlds. Surprisingly, mineral oil was burnt for energy on ancient Earth.

Нефть — ценный ресурс, который используется для производства широкого спектра синтетических материалов, от пластика до керамики. Обычно залежи этого ресурса, который возникает при разложении органических материалов, можно найти под поверхностью пленэрных миров. Как это ни удивительно, но в древности на Земле нефть сжигали, чтобы получить энергию.
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：精炼

一种用作原材料的有机油，可以用于生产从塑料到陶瓷的各种合成材料。它通过有机材料的分解而得到，并经常可以在户外的地下找到。很神奇的是，在古代地球人们会燃烧矿物油来获取能源。

这种晶态碳化硅矿物在电子设备制造与热量吸收中有所应用。它也被用于珠宝或其他工艺品。

column2: Marketed as ’the galaxy’s most dangerous cereal’, with a tag line imploring the consumer to ’eat it before it eats you’, Beast Feast claims to contain trace elements of over two hundred and twenty three confirmed man-eater species, allowing consumers to ’eat their way to the top of the food chain’.
de: Marketed as ’the galaxy’s most dangerous cereal’, with a tag line imploring the consumer to ’eat it before it eats you’, Beast Feast claims to contain trace elements of over two hundred and twenty three confirmed man-eater species, allowing consumers to ’eat their way to the top of the food chain’.
es: Comercializado como ’el cereal más peligroso de la galaxia’ e implorando al consumidor con su lema ’cómaselo antes de que se le coma’, Banquete Bestial afirma contener oligoelementos de más de 223 especies devora-hombres confirmadas, lo que permite a los consumidores ’comerse su camino hacia lo alto de la cadena alimentaria’.
fr: Marketed as ’the galaxy’s most dangerous cereal’, with a tag line imploring the consumer to ’eat it before it eats you’, Beast Feast claims to contain trace elements of over two hundred and twenty three confirmed man-eater species, allowing consumers to ’eat their way to the top of the food chain’.
pt: Marketed as ’the galaxy’s most dangerous cereal’, with a tag line imploring the consumer to ’eat it before it eats you’, Beast Feast claims to contain trace elements of over two hundred and twenty three confirmed man-eater species, allowing consumers to ’eat their way to the top of the food chain’.
ru: Рекламируется как ’самый опасный злак в галактике’. Лозунг предостерегает покупателя: ’Съешь его, пока оно не съело тебя!’ Утверждают, что ’Зверское яство’ содержит в следовых количествах клетки более двухсот двадцати трёх биологических видов, для которых были подтверждены случаи людоедства. Таким образом, потребители могут сразу ’прогрызть себе путь на вершину пищевой цепочки’.
zh: 这被标榜为“全银河最危险的谷物”，还有一段标语让消费者“在它吃掉你之前吃了它”。Beast Feast宣称其含有痕量的，来自超过223种已确认的食人物种的元素，能让消费者“吃上食物链顶端”。

column2: Famed for its inability to hunt through water, it makes such lifelike duck calls that some interesting cross breeds are now being researched.
de: Famed for its inability to hunt through water, it makes such lifelike duck calls that some interesting cross breeds are now being researched.
es: Famosos por su incapacidad de cazar en el agua, estos animales imitan a la perfección la llamada de los patos, lo que ha hecho que se estén documentando cruces interesantes con otras razas.
fr: Famed for its inability to hunt through water, it makes such lifelike duck calls that some interesting cross breeds are now being researched.
pt: Famed for its inability to hunt through water, it makes such lifelike duck calls that some interesting cross breeds are now being researched.
ru: Псы этой породы, неспособные охотиться в воде, настолько правдоподобно подражают утиному крику, что в настоящий момент исследуются некоторые любопытные межвидовые гибриды.
zh: 它因无法在水中狩猎而闻名，其发出的惟妙惟肖的鸭子叫声甚至让人开始研究一些有趣的杂交品种。

column2: Monazite is a reddish-brown phosphate mineral containing thorium and sometimes uranium, making it radioactive.
de: Monazite is a reddish-brown phosphate mineral containing thorium and sometimes uranium, making it radioactive.
es:
Producido: Minería
Consumido por: Turismo, Alta Tecnología, Refinería y Militar (superficie)

La monacita es un mineral fosfato marrón rojizo que contiene torio y, a veces, uranio, lo que la hace radiactivo.
fr: Monazite is a reddish-brown phosphate mineral containing thorium and sometimes uranium, making it radioactive.
pt: Monazite is a reddish-brown phosphate mineral containing thorium and sometimes uranium, making it radioactive.
ru: Красновато-коричневый минерал-фосфат, содержащий торий и иногда уран, что делает его радиоактивным.
zh: 独居石是一种红棕色的磷酸盐矿物，其中有钍且有时还含有铀，这导致其具有放射性。

column2: A programmable narcotic created in small batches and pre-programmed to provide whatever experience the client wishes to hallucinate. Usually this drug is created only on a bespoke order from a known client, but some worlds are willing to sell Pre-programmed samples on the general market.
de: A programmable narcotic created in small batches and pre-programmed to provide whatever experience the client wishes to hallucinate. Usually this drug is created only on a bespoke order from a known client, but some worlds are willing to sell Pre-programmed samples on the general market.
es: Un narcótico suministrado en pequeños bloques pre-programados para otorgar cualquier experiencia que el cliente desee alucinar. Normalmente se crea solo bajo pedido para clientes conocidos, pero algunos mundos están dispuestos a vender muestras pre-programadas en el mercado estándar.
fr: A programmable narcotic created in small batches and pre-programmed to provide whatever experience the client wishes to hallucinate. Usually this drug is created only on a bespoke order from a known client, but some worlds are willing to sell Pre-programmed samples on the general market.
pt: A programmable narcotic created in small batches and pre-programmed to provide whatever experience the client wishes to hallucinate. Usually this drug is created only on a bespoke order from a known client, but some worlds are willing to sell Pre-programmed samples on the general market.
ru: Программируемый наркотик, создаваемый малыми партиями и предназначенный для вызова галлюцинаций, заранее заказанных клиентом. Обычно его делают под заказ проверенным потребителям, но на некоторых планетах заранее запрограммированные образцы продаются на широком рынке.
zh: 一种可编程的麻醉剂，仅小批量生产并预编程来为用户提供其幻想的任何体验。这种药物通常只被依据订单定制提供给熟客，但有些世界也乐意朝一般市场出售预编程的样本。

column2: The chitinous native insects of nearby worlds are processed using industrial mining equipment, then re-constituted into convenient circles. Marketed as a food for those who like a little crunch.
de: The chitinous native insects of nearby worlds are processed using industrial mining equipment, then re-constituted into convenient circles. Marketed as a food for those who like a little crunch.
es: Los insectos quitinosos nativos de mundos vecinos son procesados empleando equipamiento minero industrial y reconstituidos en cómodos aros. Se venden como alimento para aquellos a los que les guste comer algo crujiente.
fr: The chitinous native insects of nearby worlds are processed using industrial mining equipment, then re-constituted into convenient circles. Marketed as a food for those who like a little crunch.
pt: The chitinous native insects of nearby worlds are processed using industrial mining equipment, then re-constituted into convenient circles. Marketed as a food for those who like a little crunch.
ru: Хитиновые насекомые с ближайших планет перерабатываются на шахтном оборудовании, после чего получившейся массе придаётся удобная круглая форма. Результат преподносится как лакомство для тех, кто любит похрустеть.
zh: 当地附近几颗星球的这种甲壳类昆虫会被使用工业采矿设备处理后，再被重塑成方便的圆圈形状。此后会作为一种食品，销售给那些喜欢嘎嘣脆的客户。

column2: The fungal life forms found in Mulachi can grow to occupy entire continents! Specially trained teams are sent to the planet’s surface to industrially harvest large portions of the fungal structures, but workers must be wary of the deadly fungal spores.
de: The fungal life forms found in Mulachi can grow to occupy entire continents! Specially trained teams are sent to the planet’s surface to industrially harvest large portions of the fungal structures, but workers must be wary of the deadly fungal spores.
es: Las formas de vida fúngicas encontradas en Mulachi pueden crecer hasta ocupar continentes enteros. Equipos especialmente entrenados son enviados a la superficie de los planetas para recoger industrialmente grandes porciones de estas estructuras; no obstante, deben ser cautelosos, ya que sus esporas son letales.
fr: The fungal life forms found in Mulachi can grow to occupy entire continents! Specially trained teams are sent to the planet’s surface to industrially harvest large portions of the fungal structures, but workers must be wary of the deadly fungal spores.
pt: The fungal life forms found in Mulachi can grow to occupy entire continents! Specially trained teams are sent to the planet’s surface to industrially harvest large portions of the fungal structures, but workers must be wary of the deadly fungal spores.
ru: Грибная форма жизни, обнаруженная в системе Mulachi, может разрастаться на целые континенты! На поверхность планеты отправляются специально обученные отряды для промышленного сбора больших кусков грибниц — но им приходится постоянно помнить о смертельно опасных грибных спорах.
zh: Mulachi上发现的这种真菌能生长以覆盖整片大陆！经过专业训练的团队被送至行星表面来工业化收获大片的真菌结构，但工人们必须小心致命的真菌孢子。

column2: Musgravite is an oxide mineral first discovered on Earth in the Musgrave mountain range in Australia, hence its name.
de: Musgravite is an oxide mineral first discovered on Earth in the Musgrave mountain range in Australia, hence its name.
es:
Producido por: Minería
Consumido por: Turismo y Refinería

La musgravita es un mineral de óxido que se descubrió en la Tierra por primera vez en la cordillera de Musgrave en Australia, a la que debe su nombre.
fr: Musgravite is an oxide mineral first discovered on Earth in the Musgrave mountain range in Australia, hence its name.
pt: Musgravite is an oxide mineral first discovered on Earth in the Musgrave mountain range in Australia, hence its name.
ru: Мусгравит — минерал-оксид, получивший свое название в честь горного хребта Мусграв в Австралии, где он впервые был найден.
zh: 马斯格莱石是一种氧化物矿物，它得名于地球上其首次被发现的地方，澳大利亚的马斯格雷夫山脉。

纳米解离器是微小的机器，用于使特定的专业材料解体。

column2: These sophisticated pharmaceuticals use nanoscale materials to target disease far more efficiently than conventional medicine. The product of an ambitious research-and-development programme, they are developed exclusively in the Antal system by the technologically advanced community Utopia.
de: These sophisticated pharmaceuticals use nanoscale materials to target disease far more efficiently than conventional medicine. The product of an ambitious research-and-development programme, they are developed exclusively in the Antal system by the technologically advanced community Utopia.
es: Estos sofisticados fármacos usan materiales a escala nanométrica para atacar las enfermedades de forma mucho más eficaz que la medicina convencional. Son resultado de un ambicioso programa de I+D, los produce la comunidad tecnológicamente avanzada de Utopia y las distribuye de forma exclusiva la Corporación Vandermeer, en el sistema Antal.
fr: These sophisticated pharmaceuticals use nanoscale materials to target disease far more efficiently than conventional medicine. The product of an ambitious research-and-development programme, they are developed exclusively in the Antal system by the technologically advanced community Utopia.
pt: These sophisticated pharmaceuticals use nanoscale materials to target disease far more efficiently than conventional medicine. The product of an ambitious research-and-development programme, they are developed exclusively in the Antal system by the technologically advanced community Utopia.
ru: Эти сложные фармацевтические средства используют наноматериалы для того, чтобы бороться с болезнями гораздо эффективнее обычных лекарств. Они были разработаны в рамках амбициозной исследовательской программы. Производятся технологически продвинутым сообществом Утопия и распространяются представителями Vandermeer Corporation исключительно в системе Kuma.
zh: 这种精巧的药品利用纳米材料来比传统药物远远更高效地针对疾病进行治疗。这是一个雄心勃勃的研发方案的产物，它仅在Antal控制的星系中科技高度先进的乌托邦社区中被开发。

column2:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial

A range of high-value fabrics derived from natural organic materials generally produced on outdoor worlds. These are used in industrial locations to make clothing and other items.
de:
Produktion: Landwirtschaft
Nachfrage: Industrie

Eine Reihe hochwertiger, organischer Textilien, die üblicherweise auf den Außenwelten produziert werden. Nach industrieller Verarbeitung werden sie als Kleidung oder für andere Gegenstände verwendet.
es:
Producido por: Agrícola
Consumido por: Industrial

Una gama de telas de alto valor derivadas de materiales orgánicos naturales que, generalmente, son producidas en mundos terrestres. Se utilizan en zonas industriales para elaborar ropa y otros artículos.
fr:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial

A range of high-value fabrics derived from natural organic materials generally produced on outdoor worlds. These are used in industrial locations to make clothing and other items.
pt:
Produced by: Agricultural
Consumed by: Industrial

A range of high-value fabrics derived from natural organic materials generally produced on outdoor worlds. These are used in industrial locations to make clothing and other items.
ru:
Производится: Сельско-хозяйственная
Потребляется: Промышленная

Богатый ассортимент различных дорогих тканей из натуральных органических материалов, производимых в пленэрных[1] мирах. Используются для изготовления одежды и других предметов на заводах.
zh:
产出于：农业
消耗于：工业

一类在露天环境下产出的天然有机材料制造的高价值布料。它们在工厂中被用于生产衣物以及其他物品。

column2:
Used by factions as a reward for mission contracts.
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

Neofabric insulation is a material using complementary fibre structures to retain, or protect from, heat build up.
de:
Used by factions as a reward for mission contracts.
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

Neofabric insulation is a material using complementary fibre structures to retain, or protect from, heat build up.
es:
Usado por las facciones como recompensa por contratos de misiones.
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología y Militar

El neotejido aislante es un material utilizado como complemento en la estructura de fibras para retener o proteger del calor.
fr:
Used by factions as a reward for mission contracts.
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

Neofabric insulation is a material using complementary fibre structures to retain, or protect from, heat build up.
pt:
Used by factions as a reward for mission contracts.
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

Neofabric insulation is a material using complementary fibre structures to retain, or protect from, heat build up.
ru:
Награда за выполнение заданий
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Военная

Высокотехнологичная изоляция — это материал, удерживающий тепло или защищающий от него благодаря дополнительным волокнистым структурам.
zh:
被派系用于完成任务的奖励。
消耗于：高科技与军事

新型隔热布料是一种互补纤维结构的材料，用于保持或防止热量积聚。

column2: This native plant form produces clear red fruit with a unique flavour. The plant is carnivorous and the berries contain blood plasma from its victims which is said to be an aid to slimming.
de: This native plant form produces clear red fruit with a unique flavour. The plant is carnivorous and the berries contain blood plasma from its victims which is said to be an aid to slimming.
es: Esta planta autóctona de Neritus produce un fruto de color rojo con un sabor único. La planta es carnívora, y las bayas contienen el plasma sanguíneo de sus víctimas, el cual se dice que es bueno para adelgazar.
fr: This native plant form produces clear red fruit with a unique flavour. The plant is carnivorous and the berries contain blood plasma from its victims which is said to be an aid to slimming.
pt: This native plant form produces clear red fruit with a unique flavour. The plant is carnivorous and the berries contain blood plasma from its victims which is said to be an aid to slimming.
ru: Местное растение плодоносит красными фруктами, обладающими отличительным привкусом. Это растение - хищник, в ягодах содержится плазма крови его жертв. Говорят, что именно это делает их столь склизкими.
zh: 当地的这种植物会长出口感独特的透明红色果实。这种植物是食肉的，而其浆果含有据说能帮助减肥的，其受害者的血浆。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech (Surface) and Military

Used in medical research, but because of the potential to be weaponised, it is a controlled substance in many jurisdictions.
de:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech (Surface) and Military

Used in medical research, but because of the potential to be weaponised, it is a controlled substance in many jurisdictions.
es:
Producido por: Refinería (superficie)
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología (superficie) y Militar

Usado en investigación médica, pero el potencial que posee como arma hace que sea una sustancia muy controlada en la mayoría de jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: Refinery (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech (Surface) and Military

Used in medical research, but because of the potential to be weaponised, it is a controlled substance in many jurisdictions.

Used in medical research, but because of the potential to be weaponised, it is a controlled substance in many jurisdictions.

Производится: Перерабатывающая на пов.
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная на пов. и Военная

Применяются в медицинских исследованиях. Из-за риска использования в виде оружия, регулируется в большинстве юрисдикций
zh:
产出于：精炼 (地面) 
消耗于：高科技 (地面) 与军事

用于医学研究，但由于其可被武器化的可能，它在许多法域都是管制物质。

column2: A particularly rich seam of high grade opals famed for their mesmerising fire-like reflections. Imperial citizens view them as a status symbol, representing the fire at the birth of the Empire. Their high market value has led to the planet being systematically strip-mined by Imperial slaves.
de: A particularly rich seam of high grade opals famed for their mesmerising fire-like reflections. Imperial citizens view them as a status symbol, representing the fire at the birth of the Empire. Their high market value has led to the planet being systematically strip-mined by Imperial slaves.
es: Una veta especialmente rica en ópalos de alta calidad famosos por sus hipnotizantes reflejos que parecen llamas. Los ciudadanos imperiales los ven como un símbolo de estatus, ya que para ellos representan el fuego del nacimiento del Imperio. Su gran valor en el mercado ha derivado a que el planeta sea sistemáticamente minado a cielo abierto por esclavos imperiales.
fr: A particularly rich seam of high grade opals famed for their mesmerising fire-like reflections. Imperial citizens view them as a status symbol, representing the fire at the birth of the Empire. Their high market value has led to the planet being systematically strip-mined by Imperial slaves.
pt: A particularly rich seam of high grade opals famed for their mesmerising fire-like reflections. Imperial citizens view them as a status symbol, representing the fire at the birth of the Empire. Their high market value has led to the planet being systematically strip-mined by Imperial slaves.
ru: Высококлассные опалы, знаменитые своей завораживающей игрой света, напоминающей дрожащее пламя. Имперские граждане видят в них символ статуса и олицетворение огня, в котором родилась империя. Высокая стоимость этих опалов привела к тому, что недра планеты регулярно опустошают имперские рабы-шахтёры.
zh: 一片矿藏特别丰富的高级蛋白石矿层的产物，因其迷人的火焰状折射光而闻名。帝国公民将它们视为地位的象征，认为这代表着帝国诞生时的烈焰。其极高的市场价值使得这颗星球正被用帝国奴隶系统化地露天开采。

column2: Local craftsmen are specialists in bringing the past into your life. Made from authentically accurate materials, each bears the mark of distinction.
de: Local craftsmen are specialists in bringing the past into your life. Made from authentically accurate materials, each bears the mark of distinction.
es: Los artesanos locales son especialistas en dar vida al pasado. Están elaboradas con los materiales tradicionales y cada una lleva su propia marca distintiva.
fr: Local craftsmen are specialists in bringing the past into your life. Made from authentically accurate materials, each bears the mark of distinction.
pt: Local craftsmen are specialists in bringing the past into your life. Made from authentically accurate materials, each bears the mark of distinction.
ru: Местные умельцы умеют привносить прошлое в современную жизнь, свои изделия они изготавливают из правильных материалов, что выгодно выделяет их на фоне конкурентов.
zh: 当地工匠都是让历史重获新生的专家。用符合史实的材料制造，每件古董都各不相同。

column2: The Saddlers of Njangari are renowned for their leather work, and their motto: No job to big or too invertebrate. Whether simple domestic supplies or custom saddles and tack for some of the more exotic species in the galaxy, they are the very best.
de: The Saddlers of Njangari are renowned for their leather work, and their motto: No job to big or too invertebrate. Whether simple domestic supplies or custom saddles and tack for some of the more exotic species in the galaxy, they are the very best.
es: Los talabarteros de Njangari son reconocidos por sus trabajos en cuero y por su lema "ningún trabajo es demasiado grande o demasiado invertebrado". "Ningún trabajo es demasiado grande o demasiado invertebrado". Ya sean simples accesorios domésticos o personalizadas sillas de montar tachonadas para algunas de las especies más exóticas de la galaxia, ellos son los mejores.
fr: The Saddlers of Njangari are renowned for their leather work, and their motto: No job to big or too invertebrate. Whether simple domestic supplies or custom saddles and tack for some of the more exotic species in the galaxy, they are the very best.
pt: The Saddlers of Njangari are renowned for their leather work, and their motto: No job to big or too invertebrate. Whether simple domestic supplies or custom saddles and tack for some of the more exotic species in the galaxy, they are the very best.
ru: Мастера производства сёдел Njangari славятся своими кожевническими навыками и своим лозунгом: «Нет сложной и бесхарактерной работы». Если вам нужны обычные или сделанные на заказ сёдла для самых экзотических видов в галактике, то вы обратились по адресу.
zh: Njangari的马具商因其皮革制品以及其格言“不为大型或无脊椎动物制造”而闻名。无论是简单的家庭用具或用来对付银河中更奇异生物的定制鞍，它们都是绝佳的。

column2: Produced under licence, and with the approval of a number of environmental groups, these tanks can be used to create a truly alien habitat capable of sustaining life forms from a variety of non earth like environments. They are available in a number of mind bending shapes.
de: Produced under licence, and with the approval of a number of environmental groups, these tanks can be used to create a truly alien habitat capable of sustaining life forms from a variety of non earth like environments. They are available in a number of mind bending shapes.
es: Fabricados con licencia y aprobados por varias agrupaciones medioambientales, estos tanques pueden ser empleados para crear un hábitat verdaderamente alienígena capaz de sostener formas de vida en una gran variedad de entornos no terrestres. Disponibles en una inimaginable cantidad de formas.
fr: Produced under licence, and with the approval of a number of environmental groups, these tanks can be used to create a truly alien habitat capable of sustaining life forms from a variety of non earth like environments. They are available in a number of mind bending shapes.
pt: Produced under licence, and with the approval of a number of environmental groups, these tanks can be used to create a truly alien habitat capable of sustaining life forms from a variety of non earth like environments. They are available in a number of mind bending shapes.
ru: Эти баки, производимые по лицензии и с одобрения нескольких проэкологических групп, могут использоваться для создания по-настоящему инопланетной среды для поддержания жизни в организмах с планет с условиями, далекими от земных. Они доступны в самых разных невероятных формах.
zh: 依照许可以及一系列环保团体的同意而生产的罐子，它们能用于制造一个异星栖息地，用来维持来自非地球环境生物的生命。有许多奇奇怪怪的形状可供挑选。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech and Military
Consumed by: All

Hand-held weapons used by law enforcement and for personal protection. They temporarily stun or incapacitate a human target, and are legal in most jurisdictions.
de:
Produced by: High Tech and Military
Consumed by: All

Hand-held weapons used by law enforcement and for personal protection. They temporarily stun or incapacitate a human target, and are legal in most jurisdictions.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología y Militar
Consumido por: Todos

Armas de mano utilizadas por las fuerzas del orden y para protección personal. Aturden o incapacitan temporalmente un objetivo humano, y son legales en la mayoría de las jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech and Military
Consumed by: All

ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная и Военная
Потребляется: Всеми

Ручное оружие, используемое правоохранительными органами или гражданами для самообороны. Обычно временно оглушает или обездвиживает цель, их ношение разрешено в большинстве юрисдикций.
zh:
产出于：高科技与军事
消耗于：所有

执法机关和保镖使用的手持武器。它们能暂时眩晕人类目标或令人丧失行动能力，在大多数法域合法。

column2: Escape pods are typically made from composite materials designed to withstand extremes of pressure and temperature, and can protect a single occupant in the event of ship destruction.
de: Rettungskapseln bestehen typischerweise aus Kompositmaterialien, die auch extremen Druck- und Temperaturverhältnissen standhalten. Sie können eine Einzelperson retten, sollte es zur Zerstörung des Schiffes kommen.
es: Las cápsulas de escape suelen estar fabricadas con materiales compuestos diseñados para soportar presiones o temperaturas extremas, y pueden proteger a su ocupante en caso de que su nave quede destruida.
fr: Escape pods are typically made from composite materials designed to withstand extremes of pressure and temperature, and can protect a single occupant in the event of ship destruction.
pt: Escape pods are typically made from composite materials designed to withstand extremes of pressure and temperature, and can protect a single occupant in the event of ship destruction.
ru: Спасательные капсулы обычно изготовляют из исключительно прочных и термостойких композитных материалов. Такая капсула способна защитить одного члена экипажа в случае уничтожения корабля.
zh: 逃生舱通常用复合材料制成，被设计出来以承受极端压强和温度，并可在舰船毁坏时保护一名乘客。

column2: Due to the relaxation of various genetic modification laws, Ochoeng prides itself on having produced the galaxy’s hottest chilli pepper. There have been numerous calls to reclassify the substances as toxic, however the produce remains legal in most systems.
de: Due to the relaxation of various genetic modification laws, Ochoeng prides itself on having produced the galaxy’s hottest chilli pepper. There have been numerous calls to reclassify the substances as toxic, however the produce remains legal in most systems.
es: Debido a la permisibilidad de diversas leyes de modificación genética, Ochoeng se enorgullece de haber conseguido el chile más picante de toda la galaxia. Se ha intentado reclasificar este producto como tóxico, sin embargo, sigue siendo legal en la mayoría de los sistemas.
fr: Due to the relaxation of various genetic modification laws, Ochoeng prides itself on having produced the galaxy’s hottest chilli pepper. There have been numerous calls to reclassify the substances as toxic, however the produce remains legal in most systems.
pt: Due to the relaxation of various genetic modification laws, Ochoeng prides itself on having produced the galaxy’s hottest chilli pepper. There have been numerous calls to reclassify the substances as toxic, however the produce remains legal in most systems.
ru: Ввиду смягчения некоторых законов, регулирующих проведение генной модификации, на Очоенге удалось изготовить самый острый перчик чили в галактике. По крайней мере, так считают жители этой планеты. Многие полагают, что перец токсичен и что его нужно записать в соответствующую категорию, однако до сих пор овощ находится в свободном доступе в большинстве систем.
zh: 由于其宽松的基因编辑法律，Ochoeng以其生产全银河最辣的辣椒为荣。有无数人呼吁将这种物质重新分类为有毒物质，但这种产品在大多数星系仍然合法。

column2: The Onionhead flower is native to HIP 55118, and its seeds contain the well-known psychedelic narcotic. Illegal in most jurisdictions.
de: The Onionhead flower is native to HIP 55118, and its seeds contain the well-known psychedelic narcotic. Illegal in most jurisdictions.
es: Es el nombre coloquial que recibe esta sustancia psicodélica, la cual proviene de las semillas de una planta nativa del sistema HIP 55118. Es ilegal en la mayoría de jurisdicciones.
fr: The Onionhead flower is native to HIP 55118, and its seeds contain the well-known psychedelic narcotic. Illegal in most jurisdictions.
pt: The Onionhead flower is native to HIP 55118, and its seeds contain the well-known psychedelic narcotic. Illegal in most jurisdictions.
ru: Цветок луковой головки растёт на HIP 55118 и содержит семена известного психоделического наркотика. В большинстве юрисдикций объявлен вне закона.
zh: 这种洋葱头花是HIP55118的原生物种，其种子包含一种声名远扬的神经麻醉剂。在大多数法域非法。

column2: A new and improved strain of the famous Onionhead narcotic. Onionhead Alpha Strain is a Legal Drug Rare Commodity exclusively sold by Navigator Market in the Xelabara system. It is considered illegal in some systems, and transporting it can result in a fine or bounty if scanned by system security. Onionhead Alpha Strain was the third strain of the controversial drug Onionhead to be developed. It was created by the Drug Empire of Xelabara faction for the consumer market, and went on sale for the first time in December 3301.

ru: Новый, улучшенный сорт знаменитого наркотика ’луковая головка’. Это легальный наркотик, редкий товар, продаваемый исключительно на Navigator Market в системе Xelabara. Он считается незаконным в некоторых системах, и его транспортировка может привести к штрафу или вознаграждению, если система безопасности просканирует его. Сорт альфа был третьим штаммом спорного наркотика ’луковая головка’, который был разработан. Он был создан фракцией Drug Empire of Xelabara для потребительского рынка и поступил в продажу впервые в декабре 3301 года.
zh: 远近闻名的麻醉洋葱头的一种新型改进亚种。洋葱头阿尔法种是一种合法药物类稀有商品，仅在Xelabara星系的Navigator Market出售。它在某些星系内非法，而运输它时被星系安保扫描可能会导致罚款或赏金。洋葱头阿尔法种是饱受争议的药物洋葱头第三个被开发出来的亚种。它由Xelabara星系的Drug Empire派系为消费者市场创造，并在3301年12月开始出售。

column2: An adapted strain of the Onionhead narcotic favourable to local conditions. Onionhead Beta Strain is a Legal Drug Rare Commodity exclusively sold by La Cosa City in the HIP 112974 system. It is considered illegal in some systems, and transporting it can result in a fine or bounty if scanned by system security. Onionhead Beta Strain was the fourth strain of the controversial drug Onionhead to be developed. It was created by the Green Party of HIP 112974 faction for the consumer market, and went on sale for the first time in January 3302.

fr: An adapted strain of the Onionhead narcotic favourable to local conditions. Onionhead Beta Strain is a Legal Drug Rare Commodity exclusively sold by La Cosa City in the HIP 112974 system. It is considered illegal in some systems, and transporting it can result in a fine or bounty if scanned by system security. Onionhead Beta Strain was the fourth strain of the controversial drug Onionhead to be developed. It was created by the Green Party of HIP 112974 faction for the consumer market, and went on sale for the first time in January 3302.
pt: An adapted strain of the Onionhead narcotic favourable to local conditions. Onionhead Beta Strain is a Legal Drug Rare Commodity exclusively sold by La Cosa City in the HIP 112974 system. It is considered illegal in some systems, and transporting it can result in a fine or bounty if scanned by system security. Onionhead Beta Strain was the fourth strain of the controversial drug Onionhead to be developed. It was created by the Green Party of HIP 112974 faction for the consumer market, and went on sale for the first time in January 3302.
ru: Адаптированный штамм наркотика ’луковая головка’, благоприятный для местных условий. Сорт бета — это легальный наркотик, редкий товар, продаваемый исключительно La Cosa City в системе HIP 112974. Он считается незаконным в некоторых системах, и его транспортировка может привести к штрафу или вознаграждению, если система безопасности просканирует его. Сорт бета был четвертым разработанным сортом спорного наркотика ’луковая головка’. Он был создан Green Party of HIP 112974 для потребительского рынка и впервые поступил в продажу в январе 3302 года.
zh: 根据当地情况改造过的麻醉洋葱头亚种。洋葱头贝塔种是一种合法药物类稀有商品，仅在HIP 112974星系的La Cosa City出售。它在某些星系内非法，而运输它时被星系安保扫描可能会导致罚款或赏金。洋葱头贝塔种是饱受争议的药物洋葱头第四个被开发出来的亚种。它由HIP 112974星系的Green Party派系为消费者市场创造，并在3302年1月开始出售。

column2: A new strain of Onionhead tailored to grow in local conditions. Onionhead Gamma Strain, also known as Helix, is a Legal Drug Commodity that is produced by 15% of independent and Alliance systems with Industrial economies. It is considered illegal in Federal and Imperial systems, as well as any port controlled by a minor faction with the Prison Colony government, and transporting it can result in a fine or bounty if scanned by system security.

ru: Новый сорт ’луковой головки’, адаптированный для выращивания в местных условиях. ’Луковая головка’, сорт гамма, также известный как Винт, является легальным наркотическим товаром, который производится на 15% независимых и Альянсовых систем с индустриальной экономикой. Он считается незаконным в Федеральных и Имперских системах, а также в любом порту, контролируемом фракцией с правительством Тюремной колонии, и его транспортировка может привести к штрафу или вознаграждению, если система безопасности просканирует его.
zh: 一种专门调整过以在当地环境生长的洋葱头亚种。洋葱头伽马种，又称Helix，是一种合法药物类货物，在15%的独立和联盟星系的工业站生产。它在联邦和帝国星系中，以及任何政府为监狱殖民地 (Prison Colony) 的派系控制下的站点中是非法的，而运输它时被星系安保扫描可能会导致罚款或赏金。

column2: Used by Onionhead’s supporters to fortify delivering to the desired control system., Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

ru: Используется сторонниками ’луковой головки’ для усиления доставки в желаемую систему управления. В противном случае он не имеет никакой ценности. Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Onionhead的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来加强控制，此外没有任何价值。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Used by Onionhead’s supporters to prepare systems by delivering to the desired system, it is of no value to anyone but her followers. Turn it in at any local security office for basic remuneration. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

Сдайте его в любой местный офис безопасности за базовое вознаграждение. Этот предмет будет недействительным к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Onionhead的支持者通过将其运输至目标星系来准备星系，这对于他们的追随者以外的人没有任何价值。将其上交至任何当地安保办公室以获取少量薪酬。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Void opals are a mineraloid prized by various cultures. Their lack of reflectivity means that they seem almost to absorb light, hence their name.
de:
Produktion: nur Abbau
Nachfrage: Tourismus, Hightech und Raffinerie

Leerenopale sind Mineraloide, die in diversen Kulturen wertgeschätzt werden. Durch die mangelnde Reflektivität erscheint es so, als ob sie Licht absorbieren würden, daher der Name.
es:
Producido: Minería
Consumido por: Turismo, Alta Tecnología y Refinería

Los ópalos de vacío son mineraloides muy preciados en varias culturas. No reflejan nada y parece que absorban la luz, de ahí su nombre.
fr: Void opals are a mineraloid prized by various cultures. Their lack of reflectivity means that they seem almost to absorb light, hence their name.
pt: Void opals are a mineraloid prized by various cultures. Their lack of reflectivity means that they seem almost to absorb light, hence their name.
ru: Опалы бездны — минералоиды, высоко ценимые в различных культурах. Они плохо отражают свет, и с виду почти полностью поглощают его, за что и получили своё название.
zh: 虚空蛋白石是一种许多文化都高度推崇的类矿物。它们的低反射率意味着它们看起来像是在吸收光线，并因此得名虚空蛋白石。

column2: These strange sculptures are believed by some to have been created by an extinct sentient race. Others have theorised that the sculptures are natural formations caused by local weather patterns. Most economists agree that there are massive profits to be made from the gullibility of wealthy collectors.
de: These strange sculptures are believed by some to have been created by an extinct sentient race. Others have theorised that the sculptures are natural formations caused by local weather patterns. Most economists agree that there are massive profits to be made from the gullibility of wealthy collectors.
es: Algunos creen que estas extrañas esculturas fueron creadas por una antigua raza ahora extinta. Otros han teorizado que son formaciones naturales causada por los patrones climáticos locales. Sean lo que sean, la mayoría de los economistas están de acuerdo en que harán enormes sumas de dinero gracias a la credulidad de los coleccionistas adinerados.
fr: These strange sculptures are believed by some to have been created by an extinct sentient race. Others have theorised that the sculptures are natural formations caused by local weather patterns. Most economists agree that there are massive profits to be made from the gullibility of wealthy collectors.
pt: These strange sculptures are believed by some to have been created by an extinct sentient race. Others have theorised that the sculptures are natural formations caused by local weather patterns. Most economists agree that there are massive profits to be made from the gullibility of wealthy collectors.
ru: Существует мнение, что эти странные скульптуры созданы древней разумной расой, ныне вымершей. Есть и гипотеза, что скульптуры образовались сами под воздействием погоды. Большинство же экономистов сходятся в одном: на доверчивости богатых коллекционеров можно очень неплохо заработать.
zh: 这些奇怪的雕像被有些人认为是被一个古老的已灭绝知性种族创造的。其他人则提出理论称这些雕像是当地天气自然塑造的。许多经济学家都同意，这东西能在人傻钱多的收藏家那换取巨额利润。

column2: This drink is so high in caffeine and natural sugars that it is often classed as a narcotic. The addictive properties and resulting sleep deprivation are famed.
de: This drink is so high in caffeine and natural sugars that it is often classed as a narcotic. The addictive properties and resulting sleep deprivation are famed.
es: Los niveles de cafeína y azúcares naturales de esta bebida son tan altos que es frecuentemente clasificada como un narcótico. Famosa por sus propiedades adictivas y de privación del sueño.
fr: This drink is so high in caffeine and natural sugars that it is often classed as a narcotic. The addictive properties and resulting sleep deprivation are famed.
pt: This drink is so high in caffeine and natural sugars that it is often classed as a narcotic. The addictive properties and resulting sleep deprivation are famed.
ru: В этом напитке столько кофеина и натуральных сахаров, что нередко он классифицируется как наркотик. Он известен своим свойством вызывать бессонницу.
zh: 这饮料中的咖啡因与天然糖分含量是如此之高，以至于其常被归类为麻醉剂。其成瘾性与造成失眠的能力名扬四海。

Osmium, Os, atomic number 76. Melting point 3306K. A very hard bluish-white metal. Provides extreme durability even at high temperatures, and is a valuable constituent in specialist alloys.

Osmio, Os, número atómico 76, punto de fusión 3.306K. Es un metal muy duro de color blanco-azulado. Presenta una extrema durabilidad incluso a altas temperaturas, y es un valioso integrante en aleaciones especiales.

Осмий, Os, атомный номер 76. Температура плавления - 3306 К. Очень твёрдый сине-белый металл. Сохраняет невероятную прочность даже при высоких температурах, широко используется в производстве специальных сплавов.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：高科技，工业，军事与环境改造

锇，Os，原子序数76，熔点3306开尔文。一种非常坚硬的蓝白色金属。哪怕在高温下也极为坚固，在特种合金中是重要的成分。

Painite: chemical formula CaZrAl9O15(BO3). Painite is an incredibly rare borate mineral that typically takes the form of a red gemstone. Highly sought after by socialites throughout occupied space, it is renowned for being one of the most valuable types of gemstone in the galaxy.

Fórmula química CaZrAl9O15(BO3). La painita es un mineral borato increíblemente raro que, por lo general, adquiere la forma de una piedra preciosa de color rojo. Altamente buscada por la sociedad en todo el espacio ocupado, es conocida por ser una de las piedras preciosas más valiosas de la galaxia.

Химическая формула CaZrAl9O15 (BO3). Пейнит — это невероятно редкий борный минерал. Как правило, он имеет вид красного самоцвета. Считается одним из самых ценных камней в обитаемой галактике.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：环境改造，开采与军事之外所有

红硅硼铝钙石，化学式CaZrAl9O15(BO3)。这是一种非常稀有的硼酸盐矿物，通常以红色宝石的形态出现。在宇宙中有人居住的地方被社交名人高度追捧，因身为全银河最有价值的宝石种类之一而名扬四海。

column2: These sacred items are said to bring wealth and prosperity to all who inhale their smoke, as can be seen by how prosperous the George Pantazis system has become.
de: These sacred items are said to bring wealth and prosperity to all who inhale their smoke, as can be seen by how prosperous the George Pantazis system has become.
es: Se dice que estos objetos sagrados traen salud y prosperidad a todos los que inhalen su humo, algo que puede comprobarse al ver como George Pantazis se ha convertido en un sistema floreciente.
fr: These sacred items are said to bring wealth and prosperity to all who inhale their smoke, as can be seen by how prosperous the George Pantazis system has become.
pt: These sacred items are said to bring wealth and prosperity to all who inhale their smoke, as can be seen by how prosperous the George Pantazis system has become.
ru: Говорят, что эти священные предметы приносят богатство и процветание всем, кто вдыхает их дым, что явственно видно по тому, как стала процветать система George Pantazis.
zh: 这些神圣的物品据说能为吸入其烟雾的任何人带来荣华富贵，而这点的真实性则体现在George Pantazis星系有多么繁荣富裕。

zh: 用于支持他正试图控制的星系中的行动，只对支持另一帝国人物的人有价值。如果如此，你可以通过拦截并将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Patreus，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

zh: 用于给Patreus的支持者通过将其运输至已占据的目标星系来加强控制。如果你支持另一个帝国人物，你可以通过将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Patreus，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Native to the harsh desert climate, these unpleasant creatures will burrow into any soft surface, including flesh, to avoid the hot sun. Their resemblance of a walking human ear lead to their name. Some slavers use these grubs as a restraining device for their captives, attaching a dormant extra ear to the forehead of their slave that can be remotely triggered.
de: Native to the harsh desert climate, these unpleasant creatures will burrow into any soft surface, including flesh, to avoid the hot sun. Their resemblance of a walking human ear lead to their name. Some slavers use these grubs as a restraining device for their captives, attaching a dormant extra ear to the forehead of their slave that can be remotely triggered.
es: Estas desagradables criaturas nativas del duro clima del desierto, reciben su nombre por el parecido que muestran con las orejas humanas. Para huir del calor del sol tienen como costumbre excavar sobre cualquier superficie, incluyendo carne. Este comportamiento es aprovechado por algunos esclavistas como dispositivo de retención, los cuales colocan una larvoreja inactiva en la frente de sus esclavos que puede ser activada remotamente.
fr: Native to the harsh desert climate, these unpleasant creatures will burrow into any soft surface, including flesh, to avoid the hot sun. Their resemblance of a walking human ear lead to their name. Some slavers use these grubs as a restraining device for their captives, attaching a dormant extra ear to the forehead of their slave that can be remotely triggered.
pt: Native to the harsh desert climate, these unpleasant creatures will burrow into any soft surface, including flesh, to avoid the hot sun. Their resemblance of a walking human ear lead to their name. Some slavers use these grubs as a restraining device for their captives, attaching a dormant extra ear to the forehead of their slave that can be remotely triggered.
ru: Эти неприятного вида существа, зародившиеся в суровом пустынном климате, прячутся в любую мягкую поверхность — в том числе и плоть — чтобы укрыться от палящего солнца. Своё название они получили от внешнего сходства с человеческим ухом. Некоторые рабовладельцы используют их как «ошейник» для рабов, прикрепляя на лоб невольнику дополнительное «ухо», которое можно пробудить удалённо.
zh: 来源于严酷的沙漠气候，这些令人不悦的生物会钻进任何软表面，包括血肉，来避开炎热的阳光。它们的名字来源于其外形与行走的人类耳朵的相似。有些奴隶主将这些虫子用作其奴隶的限制装置，在他们奴隶的额头上附着一个休眠的，可远程触发的第三只耳。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Colony, Agricultural, Industrial, Refinery, Extraction and Military

A broad category of engineered substances that enhance human physical, mental or emotional capabilities. Produced on High Tech worlds and widely consumed. There are some risks from excessive consumption, and they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
de:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Colony, Agricultural, Industrial, Refinery, Extraction and Military

A broad category of engineered substances that enhance human physical, mental or emotional capabilities. Produced on High Tech worlds and widely consumed. There are some risks from excessive consumption, and they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología
Consumido por: Colonia, Agrícola, Industrial, Refinería, Extracción y Militar

Una amplia gama de sustancias elaboradas que mejoran las capacidades físicas, mentales o emocionales humanas. Son producidos en mundos de alta tecnología y altamente consumidos, pero tienen ciertos riesgos si se consumen excesivamente y son ilegales en algunas jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Colony, Agricultural, Industrial, Refinery, Extraction and Military

Consumed by: Colony, Agricultural, Industrial, Refinery, Extraction and Military

A broad category of engineered substances that enhance human physical, mental or emotional capabilities. Produced on High Tech worlds and widely consumed. There are some risks from excessive consumption, and they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Колонии, Добывающая, Перерабатывающая, Сельско-хозяйственная, Промышленная, Военная

Широкий спектр синтетических веществ, призванных расширить физические, психические и эмоциональные возможности человека. Производятся в высокотехнологичных системах и потребляются по всей галактике. Чрезмерное употребление вредно для здоровья, объявлены вне закона в некоторых юрисдикциях.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：殖民地，农业，工业，精炼，开采与军事

一大类工程改造过的物质，能强化人类的物理，精神或情绪力量。产出于高科技世界，并被广泛使用。过量使用有一定风险，并且在有些法域内非法。

column2: Personal items are often transported and sometimes lost while travelling within and between star systems. They usually have little value except to their owners.
de: Personal items are often transported and sometimes lost while travelling within and between star systems. They usually have little value except to their owners.
es: Artículos de todo tipo que suelen llevarse en los viajes interestelares. Por lo general tienen poco valor, excepto para sus propietarios.
fr: Personal items are often transported and sometimes lost while travelling within and between star systems. They usually have little value except to their owners.
pt: Personal items are often transported and sometimes lost while travelling within and between star systems. They usually have little value except to their owners.
ru: Утерянные личные вещи межпланетных или межзвёздных путешественников. Особой ценности ни для кого, кроме владельцев, не имеют.
zh: 私人物品经常被到处运输，有时也会在星际间转移时丢失。它们对其所有者之外的人通常没什么价值。

column2: Colourfully wrapped presents for both the naughty and nice, although those for the nice do appear to be bigger!
de: Colourfully wrapped presents for both the naughty and nice, although those for the nice do appear to be bigger!
es: Regalos envueltos en papeles de muchos colores tanto para los que son traviesos como para los que se portan bien, ¡aunque los regalos de los buenos parecen ser más grandes!
fr: Colourfully wrapped presents for both the naughty and nice, although those for the nice do appear to be bigger!
pt: Colourfully wrapped presents for both the naughty and nice, although those for the nice do appear to be bigger!
ru: Красочно упакованные подарки как для непослушных, так и для хороших, хотя подарки для хороших кажутся больше!
zh: 五颜六色打包好的礼物，调皮的孩子和听话的孩子都有份！不过好孩子的那份看起来更大些！

column2:
Produced by: High Tech, Industrial and Military
Consumed by: All

Legal in feudal, dictatorship, co-operative, communist and independent corporate governed worlds., Personal firearms, designed for both self defence and offence, but intended to kill a human attacker. Illegal or highly controlled in many jurisdictions.
de:
Produced by: High Tech, Industrial and Military
Consumed by: All

Legal in feudal, dictatorship, co-operative, communist and independent corporate governed worlds., Personal firearms, designed for both self defence and offence, but intended to kill a human attacker. Illegal or highly controlled in many jurisdictions.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología, Industrial y Militar
Consumido por: Todos
Legal en mundos con gobiernos feudales, dictatoriales, cooperativistas, comunistas y de corporaciones independientes

Armas de fuego personales, diseñadas tanto para defensa propia como para atacar a otros, pero pensadas para matar a un atacante humano. Ilegal o fuertemente reguladas en muchas jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech, Industrial and Military
Consumed by: All

Legal in feudal, dictatorship, co-operative, communist and independent corporate governed worlds., Personal firearms, designed for both self defence and offence, but intended to kill a human attacker. Illegal or highly controlled in many jurisdictions.

Производится: Высоко-технологичная, Промышленная и Военная
Потребляется: Всеми

Личное летальное огнестрельное оружие, разработанное для самообороны и нападения. Объявлено вне закона или строго контролируется во многих системах.
zh:
产出于：高科技，工业与军事
消耗与：所有

在封建 (feudal) ，企业 (co-operative) ，共产 (communist) 与独立企业 (independent corporate) 控制的星系合法。个人武器，用于自卫与攻击，以及杀伤人类攻击者的目的。在许多法域非法或受到高度管控。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

Pesticides are targeted engineered substances, created to disrupt a particular part of the biological processes within a given organic pest. Used on Agricultural worlds to reduce pest damage to crops or livestock.
de:
Produktion: Hightech
Nachfrage: Landwirtschaft

Pestizide sind synthetisch hergestellte Substanzen, die auf landwirtschaftlichen Welten bestimmte biologische Vorgänge von als Schadorganismen eingestuften Pflanzen unterbinden, um Nutzpflanzen und Nutztiere vor Schaden zu bewahren.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología
Consumido por: Agrícola

Sustancias diseñadas para dirigirse a uno o más elementos de un ecosistema e interrumpir alguno de sus procesos biológicos. Utilizado en mundos agrícolas para reducir el daño por plagas en cosechas y corrales.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

Pesticides are targeted engineered substances, created to disrupt a particular part of the biological processes within a given organic pest. Used on Agricultural worlds to reduce pest damage to crops or livestock.
pt:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Agricultural

Pesticides are targeted engineered substances, created to disrupt a particular part of the biological processes within a given organic pest. Used on Agricultural worlds to reduce pest damage to crops or livestock.
ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Сельско-хозяйственная

Пестициды — это специально созданные вещества, которые прерывают определённые биологические процессы в отдельно взятом органическом вредителе. Применяются в сельскохозяйственных мирах для сокращения количества вредителей растений или скота.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：农业

杀虫剂是一种靶向药物，用于扰乱特定有机害虫体内的某个生化过程。农业星球上它被用于减少害虫对于庄稼与牲口的损害。

column2:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: All except Agri, Refinery, Extraction and Military

Platinum, Pt, atomic number 78. Melting point 2041K. A grey-white precious metal used as a catalyst within many industrial processes, in addition to its value in electronics and luxury goods because of its resistance to corrosion.
de:
Produktion: nur Abbau
Nachfrage: Alle außer Landwirtschaft, Raffinerie, Förderung und Militär

Platin, Elementsymbol Pt, Ordnungszahl 78, Schmelzpunkt 2041K. Ein grau-weißes Edelmetall, das aufgrund seiner katalytischen Eigenschaften in vielen industriellen Prozessen zum Einsatz kommt. Zudem findet es aufgrund seiner geringen Korrosionsbeständigkeit Verwendung in vielen elektronischen Geräten und Luxusartikeln.
es:
Producido por: Minería
Consumido por: Todos excepto Agrícola, Refinería, Extracción y Militar

Platino, Pt, número atómico 78, punto de fusión 2.041K. Es un metal precioso de color blanco-grisáceo usado como catalizador en muchos procesos industriales, además de ser valioso en componentes electrónicos y artículos de lujo debido a su resistencia a la corrosión.
fr:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: All except Agri, Refinery, Extraction and Military

Platinum, Pt, atomic number 78. Melting point 2041K. A grey-white precious metal used as a catalyst within many industrial processes, in addition to its value in electronics and luxury goods because of its resistance to corrosion.
pt:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: All except Agri, Refinery, Extraction and Military

Platinum, Pt, atomic number 78. Melting point 2041K. A grey-white precious metal used as a catalyst within many industrial processes, in addition to its value in electronics and luxury goods because of its resistance to corrosion.
ru:
Производится: Добыча с астероидов
Потребляется: Всеми, кроме Сельско-хозяйственная, Перерабатывающая, Добывающая и Военная

Платина, Pt, атомный номер 78. Температура плавления — 2041 К. Серо-белый драгоценный метал, использующийся в качестве катализатора во многих промышленных процессах. Имеет высокую сопротивляемость коррозии, за счёт чего часто применяется при изготовлении электропирборов и предметов роскоши.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：农业，精炼，开采与军事之外所有

铂，Pt，原子序数78，熔点2041开尔文。一种灰白色贵金属，在多种工业流程中被用作催化剂，此外由于其抗腐蚀性也被用于电子元件与奢侈品中。

column2: An ultra-strong metal alloy used in the manufacture of robotics, heavy machinery and weaponry., Due to the dangerous nature of mining and processing the alloy and fusing it with Platinum, most systems refused to produce it and the technique was almost lost., Now the factions of the Nahuatl system are the only people with the knowledge to create the metal.
de: An ultra-strong metal alloy used in the manufacture of robotics, heavy machinery and weaponry., Due to the dangerous nature of mining and processing the alloy and fusing it with Platinum, most systems refused to produce it and the technique was almost lost., Now the factions of the Nahuatl system are the only people with the knowledge to create the metal.
es: Una aleación de metal ultrafuerte usada para la fabricación de robots, maquinaria pesada y armamento.\nDebido a la naturaleza peligrosa de la extracción y procesamiento de la aleación al fundirla con platino, la mayoría de los sistemas se niegan a producirla y la técnica estuvo a punto de caer en el olvido.\nEn la actualidad, solo las facciones del sistema Nahuatl poseen el conocimiento necesario para crear el metal.
fr: An ultra-strong metal alloy used in the manufacture of robotics, heavy machinery and weaponry., Due to the dangerous nature of mining and processing the alloy and fusing it with Platinum, most systems refused to produce it and the technique was almost lost., Now the factions of the Nahuatl system are the only people with the knowledge to create the metal.
pt: An ultra-strong metal alloy used in the manufacture of robotics, heavy machinery and weaponry., Due to the dangerous nature of mining and processing the alloy and fusing it with Platinum, most systems refused to produce it and the technique was almost lost., Now the factions of the Nahuatl system are the only people with the knowledge to create the metal.
ru:
Сверхпрочный металлический сплав, используемый в производстве роботов, тяжёлой техники и вооружения.,
Из-за опасностей, связанных с добычей компонента сплава и их переработки, его не производят в большинстве звёздных систем, и технология его производства почти утрачена. Нынче, только мастера в системе Nahuatl умеют создавать этот сплав.
zh: 一种极为坚固的金属合金，用于制造机器人，重型机械与武器。由于开采与加工这种合金，以及将其与铂结合相当危险，许多星系都拒绝生产它，因而其生产技术几近失传。现在Nahuatl星系中派系的人是唯一仍保留了制造这种金属知识的人。

column2: Political prisoners are sometimes transported in cargo pods to help disguise their movement.
de: Political prisoners are sometimes transported in cargo pods to help disguise their movement.
es: A veces los prisioneros políticos son transportados en cápsulas de carga para disfrazar dicho traslado.
fr: Political prisoners are sometimes transported in cargo pods to help disguise their movement.
pt: Political prisoners are sometimes transported in cargo pods to help disguise their movement.
ru: Политических заключенных иногда тайно перевозят в грузовых капсулах.
zh: 政治犯有时会被装在货舱中运输以掩盖他们的行踪。

column2:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: Military, Terraforming and Industrial

Polymers are materials made of long chains of molecules. They are synthesised from mineral oil in refineries, and then used by industry to manufacture a very wide range of goods.
de:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: Military, Terraforming and Industrial

Polymers are materials made of long chains of molecules. They are synthesised from mineral oil in refineries, and then used by industry to manufacture a very wide range of goods.
es:
Producido por: Refinería
Consumido por: Industrial, Militar y Terraformación

Los polímeros son materiales hechos a partir de largas cadenas moleculares. Se sintetizan a partir de aceite mineral en refinerías y luego son utilizados por industrias para la fabricación de una amplia gama de bienes.
fr:
Produced by: Refinery
Consumed by: Military, Terraforming and Industrial

ru:
Производится: Перерабатывающая
Потребляется: Военная, Терраформирующая, Промышленная

Полимеры — это материалы, состоящие из длинных цепочек молекул. Их синтезируют из нефти на перерабатывающих заводах и используют для изготовления множества различных товаров.
zh:
产出于：精炼
消耗于：军事，环境改造与工业

聚合物是由分子长链制造成的材料。它们在精炼厂中由矿物油合成而来，随后在工业中被用于制造各种各样的货物。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial/Extraction near Lakota
Consumed by: High Tech

Power converter used to modify and regulate the energy coming from multiple sources so that it is tuned to the optimal operational requirements of all attached devices., These can be found at Shukor Dock in the Perun system.
de:
Produced by: Industrial/Extraction near Lakota
Consumed by: High Tech

Power converter used to modify and regulate the energy coming from multiple sources so that it is tuned to the optimal operational requirements of all attached devices., These can be found at Shukor Dock in the Perun system.
es:
Producido por: Industrial/Extracción cerca de Lakota
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología

Estos convertidores se usan para modificar y regular energía proveniente de múltiples fuentes y así optimizarla para las necesidades operacionales de todos los componentes conectados.
fr:
Produced by: Industrial/Extraction near Lakota
Consumed by: High Tech

Power converter used to modify and regulate the energy coming from multiple sources so that it is tuned to the optimal operational requirements of all attached devices., These can be found at Shukor Dock in the Perun system.

Consumed by: High Tech

Power converter used to modify and regulate the energy coming from multiple sources so that it is tuned to the optimal operational requirements of all attached devices., These can be found at Shukor Dock in the Perun system.
ru:
Производится: Добывающая и Перерабатывающая рядом с Lakota
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная

Преобразователь энергии используется для распределения потоков энергии из различных источников и управления ими, чтобы все подключённые устройства могли работать в оптимальных для них условиях. Можно найти в Shukor Dock в системе Perun.
zh:
产出于：Lakota附近的工业/开采
消耗于：高科技

能量转换器被用于改变与调制不同来源的能量，使其能符合所有连接到的仪器的最佳工作要求。它们可在Perun星系的Shukor Dock中买到。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All except Industrial

Industrially produced components for power generators, used throughout human space. Though the Sirius Corporation have a near-monopoly on manufacture of most new larger units, many other companies produce the vast amount of consumables, spares and ancillary parts for them.
de:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All except Industrial

Industrially produced components for power generators, used throughout human space. Though the Sirius Corporation have a near-monopoly on manufacture of most new larger units, many other companies produce the vast amount of consumables, spares and ancillary parts for them.
es:
Producido por: Industrial
Consumido por: Todos, excepto Industrial

Componentes de fabricación industrial para producir energía y utilizados en todo el espacio humano. Aunque Sirius Corporation tiene casi todo el monopolio en la fabricación de la mayoría de las unidades más grandes, muchas otras compañías producen una gran cantidad de consumibles, repuestos y piezas auxiliares para ellos.
fr:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All except Industrial

Industrially produced components for power generators, used throughout human space. Though the Sirius Corporation have a near-monopoly on manufacture of most new larger units, many other companies produce the vast amount of consumables, spares and ancillary parts for them.
pt:
Produced by: Industrial
Consumed by: All except Industrial

Industrially produced components for power generators, used throughout human space. Though the Sirius Corporation have a near-monopoly on manufacture of most new larger units, many other companies produce the vast amount of consumables, spares and ancillary parts for them.
ru:
Производится: Промышленная
Потребляется: Всеми остальными

Производимые на заводах детали для электрогенераторов, которые используются в человеческом космосе. Ввиду того, что корпорация Sirius практически монополизировала рынок производства больших генераторов, многие другие компании вынужденны заниматься изготовлением расходных элементов, запасных деталей и комплектующих.
zh:
产出于：工业
消耗于：工业之外所有

工业化生产的发电机零件，在各种有人居住的地方均有所运用。尽管天狼星公司已经几乎垄断了对新式大型发电机的生产，但许多其他公司仍在为它们制造数量巨大的耗材，备件与附加部件。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial/Refinery near Stafkarl
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

A specialised energy grid assembly for controlling power flow., These can be found at Pailes Enterprise in the 40 Ceti system.
de:
Produced by: Industrial/Refinery near Stafkarl
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

A specialised energy grid assembly for controlling power flow., These can be found at Pailes Enterprise in the 40 Ceti system.
es:
Producido por: Industrial/Refinería cerca de Stafkarl
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología y Militar

Una red de energía especializada en controlar la circulación de la misma.
Puede encontrarse en Pailes Enterprise en el sistema 40 Ceti.
fr:
Produced by: Industrial/Refinery near Stafkarl
Consumed by: High Tech and Military

ru:
Производится: Промышленная и Перерабатывающая рядом с 40 Ceti
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Промышленная

Специализированная электросеть в сборе обеспечивает поступление энергии на транспортное устройство. Можно найти на Pailes Enterprise в системе 40 Ceti.
zh:
产出于：Stafkarl附近的工业/精炼
消耗于：高科技与军事

一种专门用于控制能量流的电网组件。它们可在40 Ceti星系的Pailes Enterprise中买到。

column2:
Produced by: Industrial/Extraction near Cilbien Zu
Consumed by: High Tech (Surface)
 High energy power transfer units used to deliver power where it is needed.

These can be found at Haignere Orbital in the Wuthawchu system.

Consumed by: High Tech (Surface)

Consumido por: Alta Tecnología (superficie)

Unidades de transferencia de energía elevada usadas para proporcionar energía donde más se necesite.
Pueden encontrarse en Haignere Orbital en el sistema Wuthawchu.

Consumed by: High Tech (Surface)
 High energy power transfer units used to deliver power where it is needed.

These can be found at Haignere Orbital in the Wuthawchu system.
ru:
Производится: Промышленная, Перерабатывающая рядом с Cilbien Zu
Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная на пов.

Специализированные энергообменные элементы, направляющие энергию на нужные участки. Можно купить на Haignere Orbital в системе Wuthawchu.
zh:
产出于：Cilbien Zu附近的工业/开采
消耗于：高科技 (地面) 

用于将能量传输至需要能量的地方的高能电力输送单元。它们可在Wuthawchu星系的Haignere Orbital中买到。

column2:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Praseodymium, Pr, atomic number 59. Melting point 1208K. This is a soft and malleable metal. It is a rare mineral used for a variety of purposes including: a component in enhanced magnets, an alloy component for metals and laser optics.
de:
Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Praseodymium, Pr, atomic number 59. Melting point 1208K. This is a soft and malleable metal. It is a rare mineral used for a variety of purposes including: a component in enhanced magnets, an alloy component for metals and laser optics.

Producido: Minería
Consumido por: Alta Tecnología e Industrial

Praseodimio, Pr, número atómico 59, punto de fusión 1208K. Es un metal suave y maleable. Es un mineral exótico usado con muchos propósitos, como por ejemplo, componente en imanes mejorados, aleaciones y ópticas láser.

Produced by: Mining only
Consumed by: High Tech and Industrial

Praseodymium, Pr, atomic number 59. Melting point 1208K. This is a soft and malleable metal. It is a rare mineral used for a variety of purposes including: a component in enhanced magnets, an alloy component for metals and laser optics.

Потребляется: Высоко-технологичная и Промышленная

Празеодим, Pr, атомный номер: 59. Температура плавления: — 1208 К, Мягкий, ковкий и редкий металл, применяемый в различных отраслях, например, таких, как компонент усиленных магнитов или легирующая примесь в металлургии. Также используется в лазерной оптике.
zh:
产出于：仅采矿
消耗于：高科技与工业

镨，Pr，原子序数59，熔点1208开尔文。一种软而有延展性的金属。这是一种稀有矿物，用于一系列产品，例如强化磁铁中的组件，作为合金成分以及激光透镜。

column2: These materials have inherent value. They are very useful in maintaining stability in otherwise volatile economies. Alongside the wealth factor, precious gems and metals play a significant role in the generation of extravagant status symbols.
de: These materials have inherent value. They are very useful in maintaining stability in otherwise volatile economies. Alongside the wealth factor, precious gems and metals play a significant role in the generation of extravagant status symbols.
es: Estos materiales tienen un valor inherente; son muy útiles para mantener la estabilidad en economías otramente volátiles. Además del factor riqueza, las piedras preciosas y los metales juegan un papel importante en la generación de símbolos de estatus extravagantes.
fr: These materials have inherent value. They are very useful in maintaining stability in otherwise volatile economies. Alongside the wealth factor, precious gems and metals play a significant role in the generation of extravagant status symbols.
pt: These materials have inherent value. They are very useful in maintaining stability in otherwise volatile economies. Alongside the wealth factor, precious gems and metals play a significant role in the generation of extravagant status symbols.
ru: Материалы, ценные по определению. Очень полезны для поддержания стабильности в изменчивых экономиках. В дополнении к экономическим функциям, драгоценные камни и металлы играют важную роль в производстве экстравагантных символов статуса.
zh: 这些材料有着先天的价值。它们对于稳定动荡的经济体非常有用。除去其财富价值，珍贵的宝石与金属对于制造奢侈地位的象征也有重要意义。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Everywhere except High Tech and Terraforming

Targeted engineered cells to restore damage in older human cells. These can greatly extend the life of humans that take them. Some cultures believe it is immoral, especially as they tend to be used by the richest people, and so they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
de:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Everywhere except High Tech and Terraforming

Targeted engineered cells to restore damage in older human cells. These can greatly extend the life of humans that take them. Some cultures believe it is immoral, especially as they tend to be used by the richest people, and so they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
es:
Producido por: Alta Tecnología
Consumido por: Todos, Excepto Alta Tecnología y Terraformación

Células manipuladas genéticamente con la función de reparar daños en las células humanas más viejas, aumentando la longevidad de las personas que las toman. Algunas culturas lo consideran inmoral, especialmente porque tienden a ser consumidas por los más ricos, y por ello son ilegales en algunas jurisdicciones.
fr:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Everywhere except High Tech and Terraforming

Targeted engineered cells to restore damage in older human cells. These can greatly extend the life of humans that take them. Some cultures believe it is immoral, especially as they tend to be used by the richest people, and so they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
pt:
Produced by: High Tech
Consumed by: Everywhere except High Tech and Terraforming

Targeted engineered cells to restore damage in older human cells. These can greatly extend the life of humans that take them. Some cultures believe it is immoral, especially as they tend to be used by the richest people, and so they are illegal in some jurisdictions.
ru:
Производится: Высоко-технологичная
Потребляется: Всеми, кроме Высоко-технологичная и Терраформирование

Специально созданные клетки, которые могут восстанавливать старые человеческие клетки. Могут заметно увеличить срок жизни употребляющего их человека. В некоторых культурах использование клеток считается аморальным поступком, особенно если учесть, что чаще всего ими пользуются лишь самые богатые личности. По этой же причине в некоторых юрисдикциях они объявлены запрещёнными.
zh:
产出于：高科技
消耗于：高科技与环境改造之外所有

靶向改造过的细胞，用于修复老旧人体细胞受到的损伤。这能大大延长使用者的寿命。有些文化认为这就是永生，尤其是它们又更常被那些最富裕的人使用，所以它们在某些法域是非法的。

column2: Contains theoretical and experimental research, along with samples, the subject and contents of which are strictly prohibited by most authorities
de: Contains theoretical and experimental research, along with samples, the subject and contents of which are strictly prohibited by most authorities
es: Contiene material de investigación teórico y experimental, además de muestras, que están estrictamente prohibidos en la mayoría de jurisdicciones. Su existencia en sí ya es un crimen, pero sus contenidos suelen ser de gran valor.
fr: Contains theoretical and experimental research, along with samples, the subject and contents of which are strictly prohibited by most authorities
pt: Contains theoretical and experimental research, along with samples, the subject and contents of which are strictly prohibited by most authorities
ru: Теоретические и экспериментальные выкладки, а также образцы исследований, содержание и тема которых запрещены большей частью правительств; само их существование — уже преступление, но содержание их крайне ценно.
zh: 包含理论与实验的研究成果，附带样本，其课题和内容被大多数政府严格禁止。

column2:
Produced by: Extraction (Surface)
Consumed by: High Tech and Refinery

This phyllosilicate mineral is used in high pressure experiments. On some worlds it’s also a material for intricate art and crafts.

Este mineral filosilicato se emplea en experimentos bajo altas presiones. En algunos mundos también es un material empleado para intrincadas manufacturas artísticas.

Этот минерал — филлосиликат — используется при проведении экспериментов под высоким давлением. На некоторых мирах также применяется для создания изощренных предметов искусства или ремесленных поделок.
zh:
产出于：开采 (地面) 
消耗于：高科技与精炼

这种层状硅酸盐矿物被用于高压实验。在某些地方它也是精妙美术与工艺品的材料。

Produced by: Industrial/Extraction near Heget
Consumed by: Military

Radiation baffles are used to restrict and direct radiation emissions., These can be found at Sopwith Arsenal in the Taevaisa system.

Puede encontrarse en Sopwith Arsenal en el sistema Taevaisa.

Специализированные отражатели излучения сдерживают и контролируют выбросы излучения. Можно найти на Sopwith Arsenal в системе Taevaisa.
zh:
产出于：Heget附近的工业/开采
消耗于：军事

辐射隔板被用于限制和导引辐射。它们可在Taevaisa星系的Sopwith Arsenal中买到。

column2: Multipurpose stoves that can be operated using almost any fuel. Used on many frontier worlds where other technology cannot be relied on or just does not work. Galactic heritage approved. The famed rustic designs are in use on camp fires throughout the galaxy.
de: Multipurpose stoves that can be operated using almost any fuel. Used on many frontier worlds where other technology cannot be relied on or just does not work. Galactic heritage approved. The famed rustic designs are in use on camp fires throughout the galaxy.
es: Multipurpose stoves that can be operated using almost any fuel. Used on many frontier worlds where other technology cannot be relied on or just does not work. Galactic heritage approved. The famed rustic designs are in use on camp fires throughout the galaxy.

pt: Multipurpose stoves that can be operated using almost any fuel. Used on many frontier worlds where other technology cannot be relied on or just does not work. Galactic heritage approved. The famed rustic designs are in use on camp fires throughout the galaxy.
ru: Многофункциональные печи, которые можно обслуживать практически любым топливом. Используются на многих пограничных мирах, где другие технологии работают либо через раз, либо никогда. Одобрено галактическим наследием. Знаменитые незамысловатые устройства используются у костров по всей галактике.
zh: 多功能炉灶，能使用几乎任何燃料工作。在许多拓荒地带，其他科技产品很不可靠或者压根没法工作，它就会派上用场。已收录至银河系物质遗产名录。这种粗糙的设计风格在全银河的营火中都有所应用。

column2: Rapa Bao Snake Skins are famed throughout the galaxy for their size and strength. The snakes are free-range and many workers have lost their lives while tending to this vital crop.
de: Rapa Bao Snake Skins are famed throughout the galaxy for their size and strength. The snakes are free-range and many workers have lost their lives while tending to this vital crop.
es: Rapa Bao Snake Skins are famed throughout the galaxy for their size and strength. The snakes are free-range and many workers have lost their lives while tending to this vital crop.
fr: Rapa Bao Snake Skins are famed throughout the galaxy for their size and strength. The snakes are free-range and many workers have lost their lives while tending to this vital crop.
pt: Rapa Bao Snake Skins are famed throughout the galaxy for their size and strength. The snakes are free-range and many workers have lost their lives while tending to this vital crop.
ru: Змеиные шкуры с Rapa Bao славятся на всю галактику своим размером и прочностью. Змей выращивают в естественных условиях, и уже не один сотрудник простился с жизнью во время работы с этими опасными источниками дохода.
zh: Rapa Bao蛇皮因其尺寸和强度而相当有名。这些蛇都是放养的，许多工人都在照顾这种危险的动物时丢了命。

column2:
Produced by: High Tech and Military
Consumed by: All

Capable of actively dissipating large amounts of kinetic, electrical and thermal energy, reactive armour greatly increases the chance of survival of the wearer from sustained weapons fire.

Потребляется: Всеми

Реактивная защита может рассеивать большое количество кинетической, электрической или тепловой энергии. Заметно увеличивает шанс выживания в условиях непрекращающегося орудийного огня.
zh:
产出于：高科技与军事
消耗于：所有

反应装甲能主动消散掉大量的动能，电能或热能，大大增加穿戴者在持续火力打击下的生存率。

这些定制的加固架设板可用于强化对架设设备的支撑。它们可在Findalibila星系的Grassmann Station中买到。

column2: Used to support actions in systems Hudson is attempting to control, Only of interest if you are with another Federal power. If you are, you can oppose Hudson by intercepting and delivering this cargo to one of your control systems., Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

ru: Используется для поддержки действий в системах, которые пытается контролировать Хадсон. Представляет интерес, если вы с другой федеральной силой. Если вы с ней, вы можете противостоять Хадсону, перехватив и доставив этот груз в одну из ваших систем контроля. В противном случае он не представляет никакой ценности. Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于支持Hudson正试图控制的星系中的行动，只对支持另一联邦人物的人有价值。如果如此，你可以通过拦截并将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Hudson，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

column2: Used by Hudson’s supporters to fortify delivering to the desired control system., If you are with another Federal power you can oppose Hudson by delivering this cargo to one of your control systems., Otherwise it is of no value. de: Used by Hudson’s supporters to fortify delivering to the desired control system., If you are with another Federal power you can oppose Hudson by delivering this cargo to one of your control systems., Otherwise it is of no value. This Item will be out of date at the end of the powerplay week.

ru: Используется сторонниками Хадсона для усиления доставки в желаемую систему управления. Если вы с другой федеральной силой, вы можете противостоять Хадсону, доставив этот груз в одну из ваших систем управления. В противном случае он не имеет никакой ценности. Этот предмет устареет к концу недели политики.
zh: 用于给Hudson的支持者通过将其运输至已占据的目标星系来加强控制。如果你支持另一个联邦人物，你可以通过将其送至你控制下的星系来对抗Hudson，否则它毫无用处。该货物会在本权力游戏周的末尾过期。

Самокалибрующиеся настроенные генераторы колебаний, резонирующие на определённых частотах. Используются на перерабатывающих заводах для обработки большого количества руды.

产出于：高科技
消耗于：精炼

自校准振荡器能在一系列特定频率上产生共振。在精炼厂用于大批量处理矿石。

Producido: Minería
Consumido por: Turismo, Alta Tecnología y Refinería

La rhodplumsita es un sulfuro mineral de rodio y plomo que se caracteriza por mostrar distintos colores cuando se observa a través de ángulos distintos y en condiciones de luz distintas. Puede parecer blanca, rosa crema o azul grisáceo.

zh: 硫铑铅矿是一种含铑和铅的硫化物，在不同角度下呈现出白色，奶油粉色或蓝灰色等不同颜色是其显著特征。
